The_DT Deputy-Commissioners_NNS of_IN Kámrúp_NNP and_CC the_DT Khási_NNP Hills_NNP took_VBD more_JJR than_IN usual_JJ interest_NN in_IN the_DT matter_NN ,_, and_CC used_VBD their_PRP$ personal_JJ influence_NN in_IN the_DT villages_NNS while_IN on_IN tour_NN ._.

This_DT view_NN does_VBZ appear_VB to_TO be_VB borne_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT amount_NN of_IN work_NN done_VBN ._.

2_CD ._.
The_DT Report_NNP until_IN this_DT year_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN printed_VBN in_IN a_DT complete_JJ form_NN since_IN 1875_CD ,_, and_CC on_IN this_DT occasion_NN I_PRP have_VBP endeavoured_VBN to_TO illustrate_VB the_DT work_NN and_CC the_DT agency_NN employed_VBD as_RB clearly_RB as_IN possible_JJ ._.

In_IN 1875_CD a_DT scheme_NN for_IN circle_NN vaccination_NN was_VBD submitted_VBN by_IN this_DT office_NN to_TO the_DT Assam_NNP Administration_NNP and_CC the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP but_CC it_PRP was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO drop_VB out_IN of_IN sight_NN ,_, and_CC until_IN last_JJ season_NN no_DT addition_NN to_TO the_DT vaccination_NN staff_NN of_IN 17_CD or_CC 18_CD dispensary_JJ vaccinators_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN ._.
4_CD ._.
By_IN the_DT continued_JJ zeal_NN and_CC efforts_NNS of_IN Civil_NNP Medical_NNP Officers_NNP and_CC the_DT strengthening_VBG their_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, when_WRB circumstances_NNS warrant_VBP ,_, by_IN an_DT increase_NN of_IN the_DT vaccination_NN staff_NN ,_, time_NN will_MD doubtless_VB overcome_VB the_DT prejudices_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS and_CC the_DT vaccination_NN work_NN of_IN this_DT Province_NNP will_MD in_IN due_JJ course_NN take_VB a_DT fair_JJ stand_NN and_CC compare_NN favourably_RB with_IN that_DT of_IN other_JJ Provinces_NNS ._.

1_CD ._.

I._NN ,_, shows_VBZ the_DT agency_NN employed_VBN in_IN each_DT district_NN of_IN the_DT Province_NNP during_IN the_DT past_JJ two_CD years_NNS :_: OF_IN THE_NNP PROVINCE_NNP OF_NNP ASSAM_NNP ._.
3_CD the_DT highest_JJS in_IN the_DT Province_NNP ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT striking_JJ and_CC pleasing_VBG contrast_NN to_TO that_DT of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
Hospital-_NNP Assistants.4_NNP ANNUAL_NNP VACCINATION_NNP REPORT_NNP The_DT work_NN of_IN ex-inoculators_NNS shown_VBN in_IN Statement_NNP IV_NNP ._.

5_CD The_DT number_NN of_IN vacci-_JJ nations_NNS actually_RB in-_JJ spected_VBN by_IN Civil_NNP Medical_NNP Officers_NNP during_IN the_DT operating_NN season_NN is_VBZ shown_VBN in_IN Statement_NNP V._NNP STATEMENT_NNP V._NNP Showing_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS actually_RB inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN these_DT found_VBN successful_JJ during_IN the_DT year_NN 1881-82_RB ._.

1_CD Khási_NNP Hills_NNP ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: 153_CD 144_CD 9_CD 94.11_CD 2_CD Gára_NNP 6_CD ANNUAL_NNP VACCINATION_NNP REPORT_NNP does_VBZ it_PRP appear_VB to_TO me_PRP reasonable_VB on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN garden_NN managers_NNS to_TO expect_VB it_PRP ,_, for_IN they_PRP have_VBP or_CC should_MD have_VB ,_, their_PRP$ own_JJ medical_JJ staff_NN on_IN their_PRP$ gardens_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP should_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN that_DT staff_NN to_TO carry_VB out_RP efficiently_RB and_CC closely_RB to_TO supervise_VB so_RB important_JJ a_DT protective_JJ measure_NN among_IN the_DT garden_JJ population_NN of_IN whom_WP they_PRP have_VBP entire_JJ medical_JJ charge_NN ._.
And_CC so_RB again_RB with_IN lymph_NN :_: they_PRP should_MD procure_VB a_DT small_JJ supply_NN of_IN good_JJ lymph_NN from_IN England_NNP stored_VBD in_IN capillary_JJ tubes_NNS and_CC sent_VBD out_RP so_RB as_IN to_TO reach_VB Assam_NNP early_JJ in_IN October_NNP ,_, packed_VBD and_CC ready_JJ for_IN distribution_NN to_TO their_PRP$ several_JJ gardens_NNS ._.
By_IN such_PDT an_DT arrangement_NN ,_, at_IN a_DT very_RB trifling_JJ expense_NN and_CC independent_JJ of_IN Government_NNP help_NN ,_, which_WDT should_MD not_RB be_VB sought_VBN or_CC expected_VBN ,_, tea-garden_JJ managers_NNS might_MD perform_VB a_DT noble_JJ and_CC praiseworthy_JJ duty_NN which_WDT hitherto_NN has_VBZ been_VBN almost_RB universally_RB neglected_VBN ._.
Sanctioned_VBN scale_NN of_IN cost_NN of_IN vaccination_NN establishment_NN ,_, with_IN recommend-_JJ ations_NNS for_IN further_JJ strengthening_VBG the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT executive_NN ._.
11_CD ._.
The_DT subjoined_JJ statement_NN ,_, No_NNP ._.
VII._NNP ,_, sets_VBZ forth_VBP the_DT sanctioned_JJ scale_NN of_IN pay_NN of_IN the_DT vaccination_NN establishment_NN in_IN this_DT Province_NN for_IN the_DT past_JJ season_NN :_: OF_IN THE_NNP PROVINCE_NNP OF_NNP ASSAM_NNP ._.
7_CD sanctioned_VBN :_: these_DT will_MD be_VB put_VBN up_RP in_IN 11_CD packets_NNS of_IN 20_CD tubes_NNS each_DT and_CC despatched_VBN from_IN England_NNP so_RB as_IN to_TO reach_VB India_NNP not_RB later_RB than_IN the_DT 1st_CD September_NNP 1882_CD ,_, and_CC as_RB soon_RB as_IN these_DT packets_NNS are_VBP received_VBN by_IN me_PRP ,_, I_PRP will_MD at_IN once_RB distribute_VB them_PRP to_TO the_DT several_JJ district_NN medical_JJ officers_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP also_RB placed_VBN myself_PRP in_IN communication_NN with_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT hope_NN of_IN obtaining_VBG from_IN him_PRP a_DT small_JJ supply_NN of_IN calf_NN or_CC animal_JJ lymph_NN at_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN next_JJ vaccination_NN season_NN ._.
I_PRP entertained_VBD at_IN one_CD time_NN the_DT hope_NN of_IN raising_VBG animal_JJ or_CC calf_JJ lymph_NN myself_PRP ,_, but_CC as_IN the_DT procedure_NN is_VBZ somewhat_RB complicated_JJ and_CC in_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN an_DT establishment_NN of_IN any_DT kind_NN I_PRP doubt_VBP if_IN I_PRP shall_MD succeed_VB in_IN doing_VBG so_RB at_IN present_NN ._.
I_PRP would_MD suggest_VB to_TO Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP ,_, as_IN in_IN all_DT probability_NN practicable_JJ ,_, the_DT advisability_NN of_IN their_PRP$ securing_NN vaccine_NN lymph_NN in_IN capillary_JJ tubes_NNS ,_, or_CC on_IN ivory_JJ points_NNS ,_, at_IN or_CC towards_VB the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT next_JJ vaccination_NN season_NN ,_, and_CC sending_VBG such_JJ supply_NN as_IN they_PRP are_VBP assured_VBN is_VBZ of_IN good_JJ and_CC undoubted_JJ quality_NN to_TO me_PRP ._.
The_DT capillary_JJ tubes_NNS hermetically_RB sealed_VBD might_MD be_VB secured_VBN in_IN small_JJ pieces_NNS of_IN bamboo_NN with_IN a_DT pledget_NN of_IN cotton_NN wool_NN at_IN the_DT end_NN and_CC then_RB sealed_VBD ._.
The_DT ivory_NN points_NNS ,_, properly_RB charged_VBN ,_, should_MD be_VB slowly_RB dried_VBN and_CC then_RB placed_VBN in_IN a_DT small_JJ two-drachm_JJ bottle_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT bottom_NN of_IN which_WDT a_DT little_JJ cotton-wool_NN has_VBZ been_VBN previously_RB placed_VBN ,_, and_CC a_DT morsel_NN of_IN cotton-wool_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB put_VBN into_IN the_DT bottle_NN before_IN closing_VBG it_PRP with_IN an_DT accurately-fitting_JJ cork_NN ._.
These_DT ,_, when_WRB received_VBN ,_, I_PRP woud_VBP keep_VB stored_VBN in_IN a_DT cool_JJ place_NN until_IN the_DT next_JJ vaccination_NN season_NN ,_, when_WRB I_PRP would_MD distribute_VB to_TO the_DT Medical_NNP Officers_NNP to_TO whom_WP they_PRP might_MD belong_VB ,_, and_CC I_PRP see_VBP no_DT reason_NN why_WRB pure_NN good_JJ lymph_NN so_RB secured_VBD may_MD not_RB be_VB preserved_VBN during_IN the_DT hot_JJ season_NN at_IN Shillong_NNP ,_, and_CC be_VB ready_JJ at_IN hand_NN when_WRB the_DT vaccination_NN work_NN begins_VBZ ._.
The_DT sources_NNS whence_NN lymph_NN was_VBD supplied_VBN during_IN the_DT past_JJ vaccination_NN season_NN ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT following_JJ abstracts_NNS from_IN the_DT reports_NNS of_IN medical_JJ officers_NNS show_VBP the_DT sources_NNS from_IN which_WDT the_DT lymph_NN was_VBD supplied_VBN during_IN the_DT past_JJ season_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT success_NN of_IN the_DT various_JJ supplies_NNS :8_VBP ANNUAL_NNP VACCINATION_NNP REPORT_NNP the_DT subject_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, for_IN ,_, if_IN in_IN the_DT whole_JJ science_NN of_IN curative_NN or_CC preventive_JJ medicine_NN one_CD thing_NN more_JJR than_IN another_DT is_VBZ proved_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ that_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT direst_JJS scourges_NNS that_IN ever_RB afflicted_VBN humanity_NN is_VBZ controlled_VBN exactly_RB in_IN proportion_NN as_IN the_DT operation_NN of_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ well_RB and_CC thoroughly_RB performed_VBN among_IN the_DT population_NN ._.
The_DT earnest_JJS and_CC most_RBS untiring_JJ efforts_NNS of_IN medical_JJ officers_NNS will_MD be_VB necessary_JJ as_IN each_DT vaccination_NN season_NN comes_VBZ round_RB ,_, and_CC they_PRP should_MD not_RB ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, despair_NN of_IN ultimate_JJ success_NN even_RB among_IN a_DT people_NNS so_RB apparently_RB averse_JJ to_TO vaccination_NN as_IN the_DT Assamese_NNP are_VBP said_VBD to_TO be_VB ,_, or_CC yet_RB in_IN a_DT Province_NNP where_WRB the_DT difficulties_NNS of_IN transit_NN and_CC means_NNS of_IN moving_VBG about_IN among_IN the_DT population_NN are_VBP unsurpassed_VBN in_IN India_NNP ._.
The_DT duties_NNS of_IN Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP in_IN the_DT employ-_JJ ment_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS ._.
15_CD ._.
We_PRP have_VBP ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, no_DT reason_NN to_TO be_VB dissatisfied_VBN with_IN the_DT increase_NN of_IN work_NN done_VBN last_JJ year_NN by_IN the_DT increase_NN of_IN the_DT staff_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS ,_, especially_RB when_WRB we_PRP remember_VBP the_DT lateness_NN of_IN the_DT season_NN before_IN that_DT increase_NN could_MD be_VB made_VBN ;_: and_CC as_IN executive_JJ medical_JJ officers_NNS now_RB have_VBP the_DT assurance_NN of_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ ready_JJ to_TO sanction_VB an_DT increase_NN of_IN expenditure_NN to_TO meet_VB an_DT increase_NN of_IN the_DT staff_NN or_CC pay_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS ,_, if_IN he_PRP can_MD be_VB satisfied_VBN that_IN correspondingly_RB improved_VBN results_NNS will_MD be_VB obtained_VBN ,_, Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP should_MD consider_VB it_PRP a_DT part_NN of_IN their_PRP$ duty_NN to_TO secure_VB as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ the_DT services_NNS of_IN men_NNS of_IN some_DT family_NN respectability_NN ,_, as_IN I_PRP pointed_VBD out_RP in_IN paragraph_NN 7_CD of_IN my_PRP$ last_JJ year_NN 's_POS report_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP should_MD endeavour_VB to_TO raise_VB the_DT status_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinator_NN ,_, and_CC train_NN and_CC employ_JJ men_NNS in_IN whom_WP reliance_NN can_MD be_VB placed_VBN ,_, with_IN the_DT view_NN not_RB only_RB of_IN improving_VBG the_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT vaccination_NN work_NN ,_, but_CC of_IN raising_VBG the_DT standard_NN and_CC the_DT sense_NN of_IN responsibility_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS themselves_PRP ._.
In_IN such_JJ districts_NNS ,_, too_RB ,_, where_WRB a_DT disposition_NN is_VBZ shown_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS to_TO adopt_VB vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT work_NN appears_VBZ to_TO warrant_VB it_PRP ,_, the_DT advisability_NN of_IN the_DT appointment_NN of_IN a_DT head_NN vaccinator_NN ,_, or_CC even_RB a_DT native_JJ superintendent_NN ,_, should_MD claim_VB consideration_NN ._.
SHILLONG_NNP ._.
16_CD ._.
Khási_NNP and_CC Jaintia_NNP Hills.OF_NNP THE_NNP PROVINCE_NNP OF_NNP ASSAM_NNP ._.
9_CD from_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS in_IN the_DT station_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD three_CD ex-inoculators_NNS who_WP worked_VBD ,_, and_CC reported_VBD having_VBG performed_VBN 305_CD operations_NNS ._.
But_CC their_PRP$ work_NN was_VBD not_RB inspected_VBN ._.
Two_CD or_CC three_CD severe_JJ outbreaks_NNS of_IN small-pox_NNS have_VBP prevailed_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN in_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, one_CD especially_RB in_IN the_DT north-east_JJ quarter_NN ,_, where_WRB Mr._NNP McNaught_NNP ,_, a_DT Hospital-_NNP Assistant_NNP ,_, and_CC two_CD vaccinators_NNS proceeded_VBD ,_, and_CC rendered_VBD during_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ every_DT possible_JJ service_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD four_CD vaccinators_NNS employed_VBD for_IN eight_CD months_NNS in_IN this_DT district_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Deputy-Commissioner_NNP and_CC Medical_NNP Officer_NNP appear_VBP to_TO be_VB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN with_IN a_DT stronger_JJR staff_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS the_DT Gáros_NNP would_MD be_VB brought_VBN to_TO adopt_VB vaccination_NN entirely_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT scourges_NNS of_IN small-pox_JJ might_MD be_VB diminished_VBN ,_, if_IN not_RB in_IN due_JJ course_NN stamped_VBD out_RP altogether_RB ._.
One_CD fact_NN appears_VBZ clear_JJ ,_, that_IN the_DT greater_JJR the_DT success_NN of_IN vaccination_NN and_CC the_DT more_JJR the_DT system_NN is_VBZ encouraged_VBN ,_, the_DT readier_NN the_DT people_NNS are_VBP to_TO adopt_VB it_PRP and_CC to_TO discountenance_VB inoculation_NN ._.
DHUBRI_NNP ._.

Goálpára_NNP District.10_NNP ANNUAL_NNP VACCINATION_NNP REPORT_NNP Both_NNP the_DT Deputy-Commissioner_NNP and_CC Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP speak_VB very_RB highly_RB of_IN the_DT hearty_JJ co-operation_NN in_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN vaccination_NN given_VBN during_IN the_DT season_NN by_IN Mr._NNP H._NNP Bell_NNP ,_, Manager_NNP ,_, Lower_NNP Assam_NNP Tea_NNP Company_NNP ,_, not_RB only_RB as_IN regards_NNS the_DT tea-garden_JJ population_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB by_IN extending_VBG vaccination_NN to_TO neighbouring_JJ villages_NNS ._.
The_DT work_NN was_VBD entirely_RB done_VBN by_IN the_DT Native_NNP Doctor_NNP of_IN the_DT tea-garden_JJ ,_, who_WP successfully_RB vaccinated_VBD 165_CD cases_NNS ._.
This_DT hearty_JJ co-operation_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Bell_NNP 's_POS in_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ a_DT worthy_JJ example_NN ,_, and_CC might_MD with_IN great_JJ advantage_NN be_VB followed_VBN by_IN every_DT tea-garden_JJ manager_NN in_IN Assam_NNP ._.
Messrs._NNP Gilman_NNP Bros._NNP ,_, Sonapur_NNP ,_, also_RB gave_VBD marked_VBN and_CC careful_JJ attention_NN to_TO the_DT vaccination_NN of_IN their_PRP$ tea-garden_JJ coolies_NNS ._.
NOWGONG_NNP ._.

Nowgong_RB District.OF_NNP THE_NNP PROVINCE_NNP OF_NNP ASSAM_NNP ._.

SIBSÁGAR_NNP ._.
22_CD ._.
Sibságar_NNP District.12_NNP ANNUAL_NNP VACCINATION_NNP REPORT_NNP performed_VBD 647_CD primary_JJ operations_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 429_CD were_VBD successful_JJ ._.
By_IN this_DT dispensary_JJ agency_NN there_EX was_VBD a_DT total_NN of_IN 1,552_CD vaccinations_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 1,104_CD were_VBD successful_JJ ;_: against_IN 1,454_CD vaccinations_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 1,251_CD were_VBD successful_JJ ._.
One_CD ex-inoculator_NN vaccinated_VBD 537_CD persons_NNS ,_, with_IN a_DT reported_JJ success_NN of_IN 100_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
which_WDT is_VBZ absurdly_RB improbable_JJ ._.
Surgeon_NNP Shewan_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT civil_JJ ,_, as_IN a_DT collateral_JJ charge_NN to_TO those_DT of_IN his_PRP$ military_JJ ,_, medical_JJ duties_NNS ,_, visited_VBD the_DT vaccination_NN work_NN carried_VBD on_IN around_IN the_DT station_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP supervised_VBD that_IN of_IN the_DT Hospital-Assistant_NNP ,_, but_CC he_PRP did_VBD not_RB record_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN his_PRP$ inspections_NNS ._.
Inoculation_NN is_VBZ practised_VBN in_IN the_DT district_NN ;_: and_CC outbreaks_NNS of_IN small-pox_JJ often_RB occur_VBP ,_, but_CC they_PRP do_VBP not_RB appear_VB so_RB prevalent_JJ or_CC so_RB virulent_JJ as_IN in_IN some_DT other_JJ districts_NNS ._.
The_DT lymph_NN was_VBD obtained_VBN from_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, but_CC its_PRP$ quality_NN was_VBD at_IN first_JJ doubtful_NN ._.
The_DT indigenous_JJ population_NN do_VBP not_RB appear_VB very_RB averse_JJ to_TO vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC better_JJR work_NN than_IN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN may_MD be_VB expected_VBN ,_, and_CC should_MD be_VB shown_VBN next_JJ season_NN ._.
SYLHET_NNP ._.

13_CD SILCHAR_NNP ._.
26_CD ._.
Cachar_NNP District.14_NNP ANNUAL_NNP VACCINATION_NNP REPORT_NNP APPENDIX_NNP A_NNP ._.
INSTRUCTIONS_NNP FOR_NNP VACCINATORS_NNP ._.
(_( Prescribed_VBN by_IN the_DT Order_NN of_IN the_DT Privy_NNP Council_NNP ,_, 29th_CD July_NNP 1871_CD ._. )_)
1_CD ._.
Except_IN so_RB far_RB as_IN any_DT immediate_JJ danger_NN of_IN small-pox_NN may_MD require_VB ,_, vaccinate_VB only_JJ subjects_NNS who_WP are_VBP in_IN good_JJ health_NN ._.
As_IN regards_NNS infants_NNS ,_, ascertain_VBP that_IN there_EX is_VBZ not_RB any_DT febrile_JJ state_NN ,_, nor_CC any_DT irritation_NN of_IN the_DT bowels_NNS ,_, nor_CC any_DT unhealthy_JJ state_NN of_IN skin_NN ;_: especially_RB no_DT chafing_NN or_CC eczema_NN behind_IN the_DT ears_NNS ,_, or_CC in_IN the_DT groin_NN ,_, or_CC elsewhere_RB in_IN folds_NNS of_IN skin_NN ._.
Do_NNP not_RB ,_, except_IN of_IN necessity_NN ,_, vaccinate_NN in_IN cases_NNS where_WRB there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN recent_JJ exposure_NN to_TO the_DT infection_NN of_IN measles_NNS or_CC scarlatina_NN ,_, nor_CC where_WRB erysipelas_NN is_VBZ prevailing_VBG in_IN or_CC about_IN the_DT place_NN of_IN residence_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
In_IN all_DT ordinary_JJ cases_NNS of_IN primary_JJ vaccination_NN ,_, if_IN you_PRP vaccinate_VBP by_IN separate_JJ punctures_NNS ,_, make_VBP such_JJ punctures_NNS as_IN will_MD produce_VB at_IN least_JJS four_CD separate_JJ good-sized_JJ vesicles_NNS ,_, not_RB less_JJR than_IN half_PDT an_DT inch_NN from_IN one_CD another_DT ;_: or_CC ,_, if_IN you_PRP vaccinate_VBP otherwise_RB than_IN by_IN separate_JJ punctures_NNS ,_, take_VBP care_NN to_TO produce_VB local_JJ effects_NNS equal_JJ to_TO those_DT just_RB mentioned_VBN ._.
3_CD ._.
Direct_NNP care_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN for_IN keeping_VBG the_DT vesicles_NNS uninjured_VBD during_IN their_PRP$ progress_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN avoiding_VBG afterwards_NNS the_DT premature_NN removal_NN of_IN the_DT crusts_NNS ._.
4_CD ._.
Enter_NNP all_DT cases_NNS in_IN your_PRP$ Register_NN on_IN the_DT day_NN when_WRB you_PRP vaccinate_VBP them_PRP ,_, and_CC with_IN all_DT particulars_NNS required_VBN in_IN the_DT Register_NNP up_RP to_TO column_VB 9_CD ,_, inclusive_NN ._.
Enter_NNP the_DT results_NNS on_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN inspection_NN ._.
Never_RB enter_VBP any_DT results_NNS which_WDT have_VBP not_RB been_VBN inspected_VBN by_IN yourself_PRP or_CC your_PRP$ legally_RB qualified_VBN deputy_NN ._.
In_IN cases_NNS of_IN primary_JJ vaccination_NN ,_, register_NN as_IN &_CC quot_NN ;_: successful_JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: only_RB those_DT cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT normal_JJ vaccine_NN vesicle_NN has_VBZ been_VBN produced_VBN ;_: in_IN cases_NNS of_IN re-vaccination_NN ,_, register_NN as_IN &_CC quot_NN ;_: successful_JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: only_RB those_DT cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT either_DT vesicles_NNS ,_, normal_JJ or_CC modified_VBN ,_, or_CC papules_NNS surrounded_VBN by_IN areolæ_NN ,_, have_VBP resulted_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT vaccination_NN of_IN an_DT unsuccessful_JJ case_NN is_VBZ repeated_VBN ,_, it_PRP should_MD be_VB entered_VBN as_IN a_DT fresh_JJ case_NN in_IN the_DT register_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
Endeavour_CD to_TO maintain_VB in_IN your_PRP$ district_NN such_PDT a_DT succession_NN of_IN cases_NNS as_IN will_MD enable_VB you_PRP uniformly_RB to_TO vaccinate_VB with_IN liquid_JJ lymph_NNS directly_RB from_IN arm_NN to_TO arm_NN ;_: and_CC do_VB not_RB ,_, under_IN ordinary_JJ circumstances_NNS ,_, adopt_VBP any_DT other_JJ method_NN of_IN vaccinating_VBG ._.
To_TO provide_VB against_IN emergencies_NNS ,_, always_RB have_VBP in_IN reserve_NN some_DT stored_VBD lymph_NN ;_: either_CC dry_JJ ,_, as_IN on_IN thickly-charged_JJ ivory_NN points_NNS constantly_RB well_RB protected_VBN from_IN damp_NN ,_, or_CC liquid_NN ,_, in_IN fine_JJ ,_, short_JJ ,_, uniformly_JJ capillary_NN (_( not_RB bulbed_VBN )_) tubes_NNS ,_, hermetically_RB sealed_VBN at_IN both_DT extremities_NNS ._.
Lymph_NNP ,_, successfully_RB preserved_VBN by_IN either_DT of_IN these_DT methods_NNS ,_, may_MD be_VB used_VBN without_IN definite_JJ restriction_NN as_IN to_TO time_NN ;_: but_CC with_IN all_DT stored_VBN lymph_NN caution_NN is_VBZ necessary_JJ ,_, lest_JJS in_IN time_NN it_PRP have_VBP become_VBN inert_JJ ,_, or_CC otherwise_RB unfit_JJ for_IN use_NN ._.
If_IN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO vaccinate_VB with_IN recent_JJ liquid_NN lymph_NN ,_, you_PRP convey_VBP it_PRP from_IN case_NN to_TO case_NN otherwise_RB than_IN in_IN hermetically-sealed_JJ capillary_JJ tubes_NNS ,_, do_VBP not_RB ever_RB let_VB more_JJR than_IN eight_CD hours_NNS intervene_NN before_IN it_PRP is_VBZ used_VBN ._.
6_CD ._.
Consider_VB yourself_PRP strictly_RB responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT quality_NN of_IN whatever_WDT lymph_NN you_PRP use_VBP or_CC furnish_JJ for_IN vaccination_NN ._.
Never_RB either_DT use_NN or_CC furnish_JJ lymph_NN which_WDT has_VBZ in_IN it_PRP any_DT ,_, even_RB the_DT slightest_JJS ,_, admixture_NN of_IN blood_NN ._.
In_IN storing_VBG lymph_NN ,_, be_VB careful_JJ to_TO keep_VB separate_VB the_DT charges_NNS obtained_VBN from_IN different_JJ subjects_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO affix_VB to_TO each_DT set_NN of_IN charges_NNS the_DT name_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT number_NN in_IN your_PRP$ register_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT subject_NN from_IN whom_WP the_DT lymph_NN was_VBD derived_VBN ._.
Keep_VB such_JJ note_NN of_IN all_DT supplies_NNS of_IN lymph_NN which_WDT you_PRP use_VBP or_CC furnish_JJ as_IN will_MD always_RB enable_VB you_PRP ,_, in_IN any_DT case_NN of_IN complaint_NN ,_, to_TO identify_VB the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
Never_RB take_VBP lymph_NN from_IN cases_NNS of_IN re-vaccination_NN ._.
Take_VB lymph_NN only_RB from_IN subjects_NNS who_WP are_VBP in_IN good_JJ health_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN you_PRP can_MD ascertain_VB ,_, of_IN healthy_JJ parentage_NN ;_: preferring_VBG children_NNS whose_WP$ families_NNS are_VBP known_VBN to_TO you_PRP ,_, and_CC who_WP have_VBP elder_VBN brothers_NNS or_CC sisters_NNS of_IN undoubted_JJ healthiness_NN ._.
Always_NNS carefully_RB examine_VBP the_DT subject_NN as_IN to_TO any_DT existing_VBG skin_NN disease_NN ,_, and_CC especially_RB as_IN to_TO any_DT signs_NNS of_IN hereditary_JJ syphilis_NN ._.
Take_VB lymph_NN only_RB from_IN well-characterised_JJ uninjured_JJ vesicles_NNS ._.
Take_VB it_PRP (_( as_IN may_MD be_VB done_VBN in_IN all_DT regular_JJ cases_NNS on_IN the_DT day_NN week_NN after_IN vaccination_NN )_) at_IN the_DT stage_NN when_WRB the_DT vesicles_NNS are_VBP fully-formed_JJ and_CC plump_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB there_EX is_VBZ no_DT perceptible_JJ commencement_NN of_IN areola_NN ._.
Open_VB the_DT vesicles_NNS with_IN scrupulous_JJ care_NN to_TO avoid_VB drawing_VBG blood_NN ._.
Take_VB no_DT lymph_NN which_WDT ,_, as_IN it_PRP issues_NNS from_IN the_DT vesicle_NN ,_, is_VBZ not_RB perfectly_RB clear_JJ and_CC trans-_JJ parent_NN ,_, or_CC is_VBZ at_IN all_DT thin_JJ and_CC watery_NN ._.
From_IN such_PDT a_DT vesicle_NN as_IN vaccination_NN by_IN puncture_NN commonly_RB produces_VBZ ,_, do_VBP not_RB ,_, under_IN ordinary_JJ circumstances_NNS ,_, take_VB more_JJR lymph_NN than_IN will_MD suffice_VB for_IN the_DT immediate_JJ vaccination_NN of_IN five_CD subjects_NNS ,_, or_CC for_IN the_DT charging_NN of_IN seven_CD ivory_NN points_NNS ,_, or_CC for_IN the_DT filling_NN of_IN three_CD capilla-_JJ ry_NN tubes_NNS ;_: and_CC from_IN larger_JJR or_CC smaller_JJR vesicles_NNS take_VBP only_RB in_IN like_JJ proportion_NN to_TO their_PRP$ size_NN ._.
Never_RB squeeze_NN or_CC drain_VB any_DT vesicle_NN ._.
Be_VB careful_JJ never_RB to_TO transfer_VB blood_NN from_IN the_DT subject_NN you_PRP vaccinate_VBP to_TO the_DT subject_NN from_IN whom_WP you_PRP take_VBP lymph_NNS ._.
8_CD ._.
Scrupulously_RB observe_MD in_IN your_PRP$ inspections_NNS every_DT sign_NN which_WDT tests_VBZ the_DT efficiency_NN and_CC purity_NN of_IN your_PRP$ lymph_NN ._.
Note_NNP any_DT case_NN wherein_VBZ the_DT vaccine_NN vesicle_NN is_VBZ unduly_RB hastened_JJ or_CC otherwise_RB irregular_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ development_NN ,_, or_CC wherein_VB any_DT undue_JJ local_JJ irritation_NN arises_NNS ;_: and_CC ,_, if_IN similar_JJ results_NNS ensue_NN in_IN other_JJ cases_NNS ,_, vaccinated_VBN with_IN the_DT same_JJ lymph_NN ,_, desist_NN at_IN once_RB from_IN employing_VBG it_PRP ._.
Consider_VB that_DT your_PRP$ lymph_NN ought_MD to_TO be_VB changed_VBN ,_, if_IN your_PRP$ ,_, cases_NNS ,_, at_IN the_DT usual_JJ time_NN of_IN inspection_NN on_IN the_DT day_NN week_NN after_IN vaccination_NN ,_, have_VBP not_RB ,_, as_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, their_PRP$ vesicles_NNS entirely_RB free_JJ from_IN areolæ_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
Keep_VB in_IN good_JJ condition_NN the_DT lancets_NNS or_CC other_JJ instruments_NNS which_WDT you_PRP use_VBP for_IN vaccinating_NN ,_, and_CC do_VBP not_RB use_VB them_PRP for_IN other_JJ surgical_JJ operations_NNS ._.
When_WRB you_PRP vaccinate_VBP ,_, have_VBP water_NN and_CC a_DT napkin_NN at_IN your_PRP$ side_NN ,_, with_IN which_WDT invariably_RB to_TO cleanse_VB your_PRP$ instrument_NN after_IN one_CD operation_NN before_IN proceeding_VBG to_TO another_DT ._.
OF_IN THE_NNP PROVINCE_NNP OF_NNP ASSAM_NNP ._.

4,450_CD ,_, dated_VBN Shillong_NNP ,_, the_DT 17th_CD August_NNP 1882_CD ._.
READ_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) patients_NNS ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, he_PRP thinks_VBZ that_IN vaccination_NN might_MD successfully_RB be_VB made_VBN compul-_JJ sory_NN by_IN law_NN in_IN Sylhet_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT opposition_NN to_TO it_PRP arises_VBZ partly_RB from_IN a_DT distrust_NN of_IN the_DT intentions_NNS of_IN Government_NNP and_CC of_IN the_DT arguments_NNS used_VBN to_TO induce_VB voluntary_JJ submission_NN to_TO it_PRP ._.
Average_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN vaccinators_NNS in_IN each_DT district_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT other_JJ additions_NNS to_TO the_DT staff_NN were_VBD in_IN the_DT districts_NNS of_IN the_DT Assam_NNP Valley_NNP :_: the_DT increase_NN was_VBD ,_, as_IN Dr._NNP Clarke_NNP explains_VBZ ,_, made_VBN in_IN October_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD too_RB late_JJ to_TO enable_VB the_DT men_NNS to_TO be_VB set_VBN to_TO work_VB as_RB early_JJ as_IN was_VBD desirable_JJ ._.
The_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP hopes_VBZ for_IN better_JJR results_NNS during_IN next_JJ season_NN ._.
An_DT average_NN of_IN at_IN least_JJS 1,000_CD operations_NNS for_IN each_DT vaccinator_NN employed_VBD should_MD be_VB capable_JJ of_IN attainment_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ actually-_JJ attained_VBN in_IN many_JJ other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP ._.
Yet_RB Appendix_NNP B_NNP ,_, Statement_NNP III._NNP ,_, shows_VBZ that_IN this_DT moderate_JJ figure_NN is_VBZ approached_VBN only_RB in_IN Cachar_NNP (_( 913_CD )_) and_CC the_DT Khási_NNP Hills_NNP (_( 900_CD )_) ,_, where_WRB no_DT additional_JJ men_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN ._.
The_DT average_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS per_IN man_NN in_IN other_JJ districts_NNS is_VBZ shown_VBN below_IN :_: (_( 3_CD )_) of_IN all_DT persons_NNS passing_VBG through_IN contractors_NNS '_POS depôts_NN (_( which_WDT description_NN till_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN last_JJ year_NN included_VBD not_RB only_RB contractors_NNS '_POS but_CC also_RB the_DT bulk_NN of_IN sardári_JJ coolies_NNS )_) not_RB already_RB protected_VBN from_IN small-pox_NN ._.
And_CC thus_RB the_DT unprotected_JJ population_NN on_IN the_DT plantations_NNS should_MD consist_VB only_RB of_IN free_JJ labourers_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT children_NNS of_IN contract_NN coolies_NNS born_VBN in_IN the_DT Province_NNP ._.
From_IN what_WP he_PRP has_VBZ seen_VBN on_IN his_PRP$ tours_NN among_IN the_DT tea-gardens_NNS ,_, Mr._NNP Elliott_NNP believes_VBZ that_IN planters_NNS are_VBP already_RB fully_RB alive_JJ to_TO the_DT advantage_NN of_IN thoroughly_RB carrying_VBG out_RP vaccination_NN on_IN their_PRP$ gardens_NNS ,_, an_DT advantage_NN which_WDT is_VBZ of_IN the_DT most_RBS direct_JJ kind_NN ,_, as_IN a_DT small-pox_JJ outbreak_NN would_MD seriously_RB interfere_VB with_IN the_DT efficiency_NN of_IN their_PRP$ labour_JJ force_NN ;_: and_CC he_PRP has_VBZ found_VBN vaccination_NN practised_VBD wherever_NN he_PRP has_VBZ enquired_VBN into_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.
He_PRP can_MD not_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, altogether_RB accept_JJ Dr._NNP Clarke_NNP 's_POS view_NN (_( paragraph_JJ 10_CD of_IN the_DT report_NN )_) that_IN the_DT matter_NN has_VBZ been_VBN neglected_VBN by_IN tea-planters_NNS ;_: and_CC he_PRP has_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN that_IN if_IN facilities_NNS are_VBP afforded_VBN them_PRP for_IN obtaining_VBG lymph_NN from_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS already_RB established_VBN in_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, they_PRP will_MD do_VB all_DT in_IN their_PRP$ power_NN to_TO spread_VB vaccination_NN among_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ employ_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ ,_, he_PRP thinks_VBZ ,_, too_RB much_JJ to_TO expect_VB that_IN planters_NNS should_MD import_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ lymph_NN ,_, except_IN where_WRB gardens_NNS are_VBP in_IN charge_NN of_IN European_JJ Doctors_NNS ,_, who_WP are_VBP aware_JJ of_IN the_DT sources_NNS of_IN supply_NN and_CC the_DT procedure_NN to_TO be_VB adopted_VBN for_IN procuring_VBG it_PRP ._.
But_CC all_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP should_MD ,_, on_IN application_NN ,_, arrange_NN for_IN the_DT Hospital-Assistant_NNP on_IN each_DT garden_NN where_WRB the_DT manager_NN desires_VBZ it_PRP being_VBG supplied_VBN with_IN virus_NN from_IN some_DT properly_RB established_VBN vesicle_NN in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN ._.
Proportion_NN of_IN success_NN attained_VBN ._.
8_CD ._.
Turning_VBG now_RB to_TO the_DT success_NN attained_VBN by_IN the_DT different_JJ classes_NNS of_IN operators_NNS ,_, the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP finds_VBZ that_IN of_IN the_DT primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS (_( including_VBG tea-garden_JJ cases_NNS )_) ,_, 44,230_CD in_IN number_NN ,_, 38,741_CD ,_, or_CC 87.5_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, are_VBP returned_VBN as_IN successful_JJ ._.
Of_IN re-vaccinations_NNS ,_, 1,181_CD in_IN number_NN ,_, the_DT unusually_RB large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN 1,118_CD ,_, or_CC 94.6_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, were_VBD successful_JJ ._.
Last_JJ year_NN the_DT figures_NNS were_VBD 87.6_CD for_IN primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS ;_: none_NN of_IN the_DT re-vaccinations_NNS in_IN 1880-81_CD ,_, 12_CD in_IN number_NN ,_, were_VBD successful_JJ ._.
The_DT table_NN below_IN shows_VBZ the_DT proportion_NN of_IN success_NN attained_VBN by_IN each_DT class_NN of_IN operators_NNS with_IN primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS :_: (_( 4_CD )_) Nága_NNP Hills_NNP ,_, Sibságar_NNP ,_, and_CC Cachar_NNP ._.
The_DT inspection_NN done_VBN was_VBD greatest_JJS in_IN the_DT Gáro_NNP Hills_NNP and_CC Nowgong_NNP ,_, and_CC least_JJS in_IN Goálpára_NNP ._.
The_DT improvement_NN in_IN the_DT second_NN of_IN these_DT districts_NNS ,_, as_IN compared_VBN with_IN last_JJ year_NN ,_, is_VBZ very_RB creditable_JJ to_TO the_DT Civil_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
Supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
The_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP has_VBZ noticed_VBN the_DT important_JJ question_NN of_IN the_DT supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN at_IN considerable_JJ length_NN in_IN the_DT Report_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP 's_POS special_JJ acknowledgments_NNS are_VBP due_JJ to_TO him_PRP for_IN the_DT care_NN and_CC thought_NN he_PRP has_VBZ bestowed_VBN on_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.
The_DT record_NN of_IN failures_NNS is_VBZ still_RB too_RB long_RB ,_, but_CC probably_RB the_DT arrangements_NNS which_WDT Dr._NNP Clarke_NNP has_VBZ recently_RB made_VBN will_MD show_VB better_JJR results_NNS in_IN the_DT coming_VBG season_NN ._.
In_IN many_JJ instances_NNS the_DT ultimate_JJ source_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN obtained_VBN is_VBZ not_RB stated_VBN :_: it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN supplied_VBN by_IN such_JJ and_CC such_JJ an_DT officer_NN ,_, but_CC no_DT information_NN is_VBZ given_VBN as_IN to_TO whether_IN it_PRP came_VBD originally_RB from_IN England_NNP (_( as_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP ascertained_VBD to_TO be_VB the_DT case_NN at_IN Dhubri_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT lymph_NN is_VBZ shown_VBN in_IN the_DT report_NN as_IN supplied_VBN by_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Bengal_NNP )_) ,_, or_CC from_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT depôts_NN established_VBN in_IN the_DT Himalayas_NNP ._.
So_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT report_NN shows_VBZ ,_, it_PRP would_MD seem_VB that_IN the_DT best_JJS results_NNS were_VBD obtained_VBN from_IN virus_NN supplied_VBN from_IN England_NNP and_CC from_IN the_DT Almorah_NNP depôt_NN in_IN the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS ._.
Mr._NNP Elliott_NNP believes_VBZ that_IN ,_, if_IN the_DT indent_NN is_VBZ received_VBN in_IN time_NN ,_, the_DT Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP in_IN those_DT Provinces_NNS is_VBZ always_RB ready_JJ to_TO supply_VB as_RB much_JJ lymph_NN as_IN is_VBZ required_VBN by_IN applicants_NNS ;_: its_PRP$ transport_NN by_IN post_NN is_VBZ easy_JJ and_CC speedy_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP should_MD therefore_VB find_VB any_DT difficulty_NN in_IN providing_VBG himself_PRP ,_, at_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT vaccination_NN season_NN ,_, with_IN good_JJ and_CC efficient_JJ virus_NN with_IN which_WDT to_TO commence_VB operations_NNS ._.
A_DT separate_JJ correspondence_NN has_VBZ recently_RB passed_VBN on_IN this_DT subject_NN ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Elliott_NNP does_VBZ not_RB therefore_VB discuss_NN it_PRP further_RBR ;_: but_CC he_PRP trusts_VBZ that_IN next_JJ year_NN 's_POS report_NN will_MD show_VB not_RB only_RB a_DT much_RB smaller_JJR proportion_NN of_IN failures_NNS ,_, but_CC a_DT much_RB earlier_RBR successful_JJ establishment_NN of_IN vaccination_NN for_IN the_DT season_NN than_IN that_DT for_IN 1881-82_JJ shows_NNS for_IN several_JJ districts_NNS ._.
Increase_NN to_TO vaccinating_VBG staff_NN ._.
11_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Clarke_NNP again_RB urges_VBZ an_DT increase_NN to_TO the_DT vaccinating_JJ staff_NN ,_, the_DT entertainment_NN of_IN a_DT native_JJ superintendent_NN or_CC head_NN vaccinator_NN to_TO supervise_VB the_DT ex-inoculators_NNS in_IN Kámrúp_NNP (_( paragraph_VB 19_CD )_) ,_, of_IN more_JJR vaccinators_NNS in_IN the_DT Gáro_NNP Hills_NNP (_( paragraph_VB 17_CD )_) ,_, and_CC generally_RB the_DT introduction_NN of_IN the_DT &_CC quot_NN ;_: circle_NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: system_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ found_VBN possible_JJ to_TO carry_VB it_PRP out_RP ._.
Regarding_VBG these_DT proposals_NNS ,_, the_DT Chief_NNP Commissoner_NNP can_MD only_RB repeat_VB what_WP he_PRP said_VBD last_JJ year_NN ,_, ANNUAL_NNP VACCINATION_NNP REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP PROVINCE_NNP OF_NNP ASSAM_NNP FOR_IN THE_NNP Year_NNP 1883-84_CD ._.

FROM_IN A._NNP ETESON_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Deputy-Surgeon-General_NNP ,_, Eastern_NNP Frontier_NNP District_NNP ,_, and_CC Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Assam_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_NNP SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP THE_NNP CHIEF_NNP COMMISSIONER_NNP OF_NNP ASSAM_NNP ._.
Dated_VBN Shillong_NNP ,_, the_DT 12th_CD July_NNP 1884_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO forward_VB ,_, for_IN submission_NN to_TO the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, the_DT Report_NNP on_IN Vaccination_NNP in_IN the_DT Province_NNP of_IN Assam_NNP for_IN the_DT season_NN 1883-84_JJ ._.
2_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ gratifying_VBG to_TO find_VB that_IN the_DT marked_JJ progress_NN of_IN recent_JJ years_NNS has_VBZ continued_VBN ;_: and_CC that_IN the_DT great_JJ personal_JJ interest_NN taken_VBN in_IN the_DT department_NN by_IN Dr._NNP Clarke_NNP ,_, late_RB Sanitary_JJ Commissioner_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT increased_JJ funds_NNS ,_, allotted_VBN under_IN the_DT liberality_NN and_CC ,_, fostering_VBG attention_NN of_IN the_DT Administration_NNP ,_, are_VBP being_VBG rewarded_VBN by_IN the_DT healthy_JJ growth_NN and_CC spread_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN nearly_RB every_DT district_NN of_IN Assam_NNP ._.
3_CD ._.
It_PRP only_RB remains_VBZ for_IN the_DT Local_NNP Boards_NNP and_CC Municipalities_NNPS to_TO follow_VB the_DT lead_NN thus_RB wisely_RB given_VBN to_TO them_PRP by_IN Government_NNP ,_, and_CC also_RB that_IN the_DT medical_JJ staff_NN should_MD take_VB care_VB their_PRP$ operations_NNS are_VBP successful_JJ both_DT in_IN word_NN and_CC deed_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
At_IN present_JJ ,_, the_DT chief_NN difficulty_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB in_IN the_DT belief_NN among_IN the_DT common_JJ people_NNS that_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ not_RB so_RB protective_JJ as_IN inoculation_NN ._.
With_IN more_RBR careful_JJ inspection_NN that_IN results_NNS are_VBP genuine_JJ in_IN both_DT present_JJ and_CC past_JJ years_NNS ,_, such_PDT a_DT belief_NN will_MD ultimately_RB be_VB dispelled_VBN ;_: and_CC Assam_NNP ,_, otherwise_RB ,_, offers_VBZ few_JJ obstacles_NNS to_TO material_JJ progress_NN in_IN vaccina-_JJ tion_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO be_VB ,_, SIR_NNP ,_, Your_NNP most_RBS obedient_JJ Servant_NNP ,_, A._NNP ETESON_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Deputy-Surgeon-General_NNP and_CC Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Assam_NNP ._.
REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP THE_NNP PROVINCE_NNP OF_NNP ASSAM_NNP FOR_IN THE_NNP YEAR_NNP 1883-84_CD ._.
Plan_NN of_IN the_DT report_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT report_NN is_VBZ prepared_VBN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT system_NN adopted_VBN in_IN previous_JJ years_NNS ._.
First_RB ,_, a_DT series_NN of_IN tables_NNS are_VBP introduced_VBN showing_VBG the_DT work_NN as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ distributed_VBN ,_, its_PRP$ general_JJ results_NNS ,_, and_CC expenditure_NN ._.
Second_NNP ,_, a_DT brief_JJ review_NN of_IN the_DT district_NN operations_NNS as_IN obtained_VBN from_IN medical_JJ officers_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ annual_JJ reports_NNS ._.
Third_NNP ,_, the_DT general_JJ statistics_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN throughout_IN the_DT Province_NNP ._.
Source_NN and_CC character_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_JJ em-_JJ ployed_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN was_VBD ,_, as_IN usual_JJ ,_, obtained_VBN from_IN many_JJ sources_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN variable_JJ quality_NN ._.
The_DT English_NNP lymph_NN ,_, obtained_VBN on_IN indent_NN through_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP with_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, was_VBD a_DT limited_JJ supply_NN ,_, intended_VBN only_RB to_TO assist_VB Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP to_TO begin_VB work_NN ._.
In_IN this_DT respect_NN it_PRP was_VBD not_RB generally_RB successful_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT Gáro_NNP Hills_NNP 10_CD tubes_NNS failed_VBD to_TO produce_VB a_DT single_JJ vesicle_NN ._.
At_IN Gauháti_NNP 10_CD operations_NNS produced_VBD three_CD vesicles_NNS ,_, but_CC these_DT were_VBD very_RB good_JJ ones_NNS ._.
At_IN Nowgong_NNP 7_CD tubes_NNS of_IN English_NNP lymph_VBP all_DT failed_VBD ._.
At_IN Lakhimpur_NNP the_DT record_NN was_VBD lost_VBN ._.
At_IN Cachar_NNP 8_CD tubes_NNS English_JJ lymph_VBP entirely_RB failed_VBN both_DT with_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP and_CC other_JJ medical_JJ men_NNS in_IN the_DT district_NN ._.
Bovine_NNP lymph_VBZ not_RB successful_JJ ._.
3_CD ._.
Similarly_RB ,_, bovine_JJ lymph_NN obtained_VBN from_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP and_CC Bengal_NNP Sanitary_NNP Departments_NNP was_VBD unsuccessful_JJ with_IN very_RB few_JJ exceptions_NNS ._.
Darjiling_NNP ,_, Punjab_NNP ,_, Almora_NNP supply_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
Of_IN lymph_NN supplied_VBN from_IN the_DT depôts_NN at_IN Darjiling_NNP and_CC Almora_NNP ,_, the_DT former_JJ was_VBD unreliable_JJ ;_: the_DT latter_JJ very_RB good_JJ ._.
In_IN a_DT general_JJ way_NN ,_, both_DT vaccinators_NNS and_CC ex-inoculators_NNS prefer_VBP beginning_VBG with_IN a_DT macerated_VBN crust_NN and_CC afterwards_NNS with_IN armed_JJ points_NNS or_CC from_IN arm_NN to_TO arm_NN ._.
Attempts_NNS to_TO maintain_VB local_JJ lymph_NN not_RB successful_JJ ._.
5_CD ._.
Attempts_NNS were_VBD made_VBN ,_, both_DT last_JJ year_NN and_CC this_DT ,_, to_TO store_VB lymph_JJ locally_RB ;_: but_CC I_PRP do_VBP not_RB recommend_VB its_PRP$ adoption_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ less_RBR likely_JJ to_TO produce_VB a_DT healthy_JJ pock_NN than_IN a_DT fresh_JJ importation_NN from_IN regular_JJ depôts_NN in_IN another_DT province_NN ._.
Vernacular_JJ instructions_NNS to_TO operators_NNS ,_, Appendix_NNP A_NNP ._.
6_CD ._.
Appendix_NNP A_NNP ,_, which_WDT follows_VBZ this_DT report_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT reprint_NN of_IN the_DT instructions_NNS to_TO vacci-_JJ nators_NNS prescribed_VBN by_IN the_DT order_NN of_IN the_DT Privy_NNP Council_NNP ,_, 29th_CD July_NNP 1871_CD ._.
Vernacular_JJ translations_NNS in_IN Bengali_NNP and_CC Assamese_NNP will_MD as_VB usual_JJ be_VB issued_VBN to_TO Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP for_IN the_DT next_JJ season_NN ._.
Total_JJ results_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN during_IN the_DT season_NN 7_CD ._.
In_IN Appendix_NNP B_NNP ,_, Annual_NNP Statement_NNP III._NNP ,_, the_DT vaccination_NN of_IN the_DT Province_NNP during_IN the_DT season_NN by_IN the_DT different_JJ classes_NNS of_IN operators_NNS is_VBZ fully_RB illustrated_VBN ._.
Dealing_VBG with_IN the_DT figures_NNS only_RB ,_, the_DT results_NNS are_VBP a_DT very_RB great_JJ advance_NN on_IN any_DT statistics_NNS of_IN the_DT Province_NNP previously_RB recorded_VBD ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ especially_RB satisfactory_JJ in_IN being_VBG now_RB the_DT third_JJ year_NN in_IN succession_NN in_IN which_WDT such_JJ marked_VBD success_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN ._.
Comparison_NNP of_IN results_NNS with_IN previous_JJ years_NNS ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT increase_NN of_IN 1881-82_JJ was_VBD 87.2_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
over_IN the_DT figures_NNS of_IN 1880-81_JJ ._.
In_IN 1882-83_CD there_EX were_VBD 12,593_CD vaccinations_NNS (_( paragraph_VB 7_CD )_) more_JJR than_IN in_IN 1881-82_JJ ,_, equal_JJ to_TO 27.8_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
;_: and_CC now_RB for_IN 1883-84_JJ ,_, 88,693_CD total_JJ vaccinations_NNS have_VBP been_VBN performed_VBN ,_, being_VBG an_DT advance_NN of_IN 53.4_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
on_IN the_DT figures_NNS of_IN 1882-83_JJ ,_, and_CC an_DT advance_NN of_IN 267.1_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
on_IN the_DT totals_NNS of_IN only_RB four_CD years_NNS ago_RB ._.
Details_NNS of_IN the_DT season_NN 's_POS work_NN further_RB exam-_JJ ined_VBN ._.
9_CD ._.

10_CD ._.

Statistics_NNS of_IN work_NN in_IN the_DT tea-gardens_NNS ._.
11_CD ._.
Vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT tea-gardens_NNS has_VBZ made_VBN considerable_JJ advance_NN ._.
In_IN 1882-83_JJ statistics_NNS of_IN 2,243_CD operations_NNS ,_, and_CC 1,746_CD successful_JJ ,_, were_VBD submitted_VBN ._.
This_DT year_NN the_DT total_NN recorded_VBD reaches_NNS 10,336_CD ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN one-third_JJ at_IN least_JJS of_IN the_DT gardens_NNS in_IN Cachar_NNP and_CC Nowgong_NNP have_VBP not_RB been_VBN taken_VBN into_IN account_NN ._.

13_CD ._.

In_IN 1882-83_CD the_DT figures_NNS were_VBD 89.6_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN 1881-82_JJ 88.7_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Macnamara_NNP considers_VBZ vaccination_NN on_IN tea-gardens_NNS by_IN the_DT &_CC quot_NN ;_: Doctor_NNP Babu_NNP &_CC quot_NN ;_: are_VBP &_CC quot_VBP ;_: illusory_NN ;_: &_CC quot_NN ;_: on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, there_EX are_VBP numbers_NNS of_IN the_DT gardens_NNS under_IN direct_JJ European_JJ medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT returns_NNS have_VBP probably_RB been_VBN submitted_VBN by_IN the_DT latter_NN ._.

26_CD ._.

The_DT reason_NN assigned_VBD for_IN so_RB small_JJ a_DT ratio_NN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT lymph_NN in_IN tubes_NNS as_IN first_JJ supplied_VBD failed_VBN generally_RB ,_, not_RB only_RB when_WRB used_VBN by_IN the_DT Govern-_NNP ment_NN operators_NNS ,_, but_CC also_RB in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT medical_JJ men_NNS and_CC private_JJ practitioners_NNS on_IN the_DT tea-gardens_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD only_RB with_IN crusts_NNS received_VBD later_RB that_IN good_JJ lymph_NN was_VBD established_VBN ._.
Results_NNS of_IN '_'' a_DT special_JJ examination_NN as_IN to_TO protection_NN enjoyed_VBN by_IN civil_JJ population_NN ._.
126_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Monteath_NNP gives_VBZ a_DT table_NN showing_VBG the_DT protection_NN variously_RB afforded_VBD among_IN three_CD classes_NNS of_IN the_DT population_NN who_WP were_VBD examined_VBN ,_, viz._FW ,_, prisoners_NNS ,_, dispensary_JJ patients_NNS ,_, and_CC school-boys_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ given_VBN below_IN :_: REPORT_NN ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP ASSAM_NNP ._.
21_CD APPENDIX_NNP A_NNP ._.
INSTRUCTIONS_NNP FOR_NNP VACCINATORS_NNP ._.
(_( Prescribed_VBN by_IN the_DT Order_NN of_IN the_DT Privy_NNP Council_NNP ,_, 29th_CD July_NNP 1871_CD ._. )_)
1_CD ._.
Except_IN so_RB far_RB as_IN any_DT immediate_JJ danger_NN of_IN small-pox_NN may_MD require_VB ,_, vaccinate_VB only_JJ subjects_NNS who_WP are_VBP in_IN good_JJ health_NN ._.
As_IN regards_NNS infants_NNS ,_, ascertain_VBP that_IN there_EX is_VBZ not_RB any_DT febrile_JJ state_NN ,_, nor_CC any_DT irritation_NN of_IN the_DT bowels_NNS ,_, nor_CC any_DT unhealthy_JJ state_NN of_IN skin_NN ;_: especially_RB no_DT chafing_NN or_CC eczema_NN behind_IN the_DT ears_NNS ,_, or_CC in_IN the_DT groin_NN ,_, or_CC elsewhere_RB in_IN folds_NNS of_IN skin_NN ._.
Do_NNP not_RB ,_, except_IN of_IN necessity_NN ,_, vaccinate_NN in_IN cases_NNS where_WRB there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN recent_JJ exposure_NN to_TO the_DT infection_NN of_IN measles_NNS or_CC scarlatina_NN ,_, nor_CC where_WRB erysipelas_NN is_VBZ prevailing_VBG in_IN or_CC about_IN the_DT place_NN of_IN residence_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
In_IN all_DT ordinary_JJ cases_NNS of_IN primary_JJ vaccination_NN ,_, if_IN you_PRP vaccinate_VBP by_IN separate_JJ punctures_NNS ,_, make_VBP such_JJ punctures_NNS as_IN will_MD produce_VB at_IN least_JJS four_CD separate_JJ good-sized_JJ vesicles_NNS ,_, not_RB less_JJR than_IN half_PDT an_DT inch_NN from_IN one_CD another_DT ;_: or_CC ,_, if_IN you_PRP vaccinate_VBP otherwise_RB than_IN by_IN separate_JJ punctures_NNS ,_, take_VBP care_NN to_TO produce_VB local_JJ effects_NNS equal_JJ to_TO those_DT just_RB mentioned_VBN ._.
3_CD ._.
Direct_NNP care_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN for_IN keeping_VBG the_DT vesicles_NNS uninjured_VBD during_IN their_PRP$ progress_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN avoiding_VBG afterwards_NNS the_DT premature_NN removal_NN of_IN the_DT crusts_NNS ._.
4_CD ._.
Enter_NNP all_DT cases_NNS in_IN your_PRP$ Register_NN on_IN the_DT day_NN when_WRB you_PRP vaccinate_VBP them_PRP ,_, and_CC with_IN all_DT particulars_NNS required_VBN in_IN the_DT Register_NNP up_RP to_TO column_VB 9_CD ,_, inclusive_NN ._.
Enter_NNP the_DT results_NNS on_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN inspection_NN ._.
Never_RB enter_VBP any_DT results_NNS which_WDT have_VBP not_RB been_VBN inspected_VBN by_IN yourself_PRP or_CC your_PRP$ legally-qualified_JJ deputy_NN ._.
In_IN cases_NNS of_IN primary_JJ vaccination_NN ,_, register_NN as_IN &_CC quot_NN ;_: successful_JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: only_RB those_DT cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT normal_JJ vaccine_NN vesicle_NN has_VBZ been_VBN produced_VBN ;_: in_IN cases_NNS of_IN re-vaccination_NN ,_, register_NN as_IN &_CC quot_NN ;_: successful_JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: only_RB those_DT cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT either_DT vesicles_NNS ,_, normal_JJ or_CC modified_VBN ,_, or_CC papules_NNS surrounded_VBN by_IN areolæ_NN ,_, have_VBP resulted_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT vaccination_NN of_IN an_DT unsuccessful_JJ case_NN is_VBZ repeated_VBN ,_, it_PRP should_MD be_VB entered_VBN as_IN a_DT fresh_JJ case_NN in_IN the_DT register_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
Endeavour_CD to_TO maintain_VB in_IN your_PRP$ district_NN such_PDT a_DT succession_NN of_IN cases_NNS as_IN will_MD enable_VB you_PRP uniformly_RB to_TO vaccinate_VB with_IN liquid_JJ lymph_NNS directly_RB from_IN arm_NN to_TO arm_NN ;_: and_CC do_VB not_RB ,_, under_IN ordinary_JJ circumstances_NNS ,_, adopt_VBP any_DT other_JJ method_NN of_IN vaccinating_VBG ._.
To_TO provide_VB against_IN emergencies_NNS ,_, always_RB have_VBP in_IN reserve_NN some_DT stored_VBD lymph_NN ;_: either_CC dry_JJ ,_, as_IN on_IN thickly-charged_JJ ivory_NN points_NNS constantly_RB well_RB protected_VBN from_IN damp_NN ,_, or_CC liquid_NN ,_, in_IN fine_JJ ,_, short_JJ ,_, uniformly_JJ capillary_NN (_( not_RB bulbed_VBN )_) tubes_NNS ,_, hermetically_RB sealed_VBN at_IN both_DT extremities_NNS ._.
Lymph_NNP ,_, successfully_RB preserved_VBN by_IN either_DT of_IN these_DT methods_NNS ,_, may_MD be_VB used_VBN without_IN definite_JJ restriction_NN as_IN to_TO time_NN ;_: but_CC with_IN all_DT stored_VBN lymph_NN caution_NN is_VBZ necessary_JJ ,_, lest_JJS in_IN time_NN it_PRP have_VBP become_VBN inert_JJ ,_, or_CC otherwise_RB unfit_JJ for_IN use_NN ._.
If_IN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO vaccinate_VB with_IN recent_JJ liquid_NN lymph_NN ,_, you_PRP convey_VBP it_PRP from_IN case_NN to_TO case_NN otherwise_RB than_IN in_IN hermetically-sealed_JJ capillary_JJ tubes_NNS ,_, do_VBP not_RB ever_RB let_VB more_JJR than_IN eight_CD hours_NNS intervene_NN before_IN it_PRP is_VBZ used_VBN ._.
6_CD ._.
Consider_VB yourself_PRP strictly_RB responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT quality_NN of_IN whatever_WDT lymph_NN you_PRP use_VBP or_CC furnish_JJ for_IN vaccination_NN ._.
Never_RB either_DT use_NN or_CC furnish_JJ lymph_NN which_WDT has_VBZ in_IN it_PRP any_DT ,_, even_RB the_DT slightest_JJS ,_, admixture_NN of_IN blood_NN ._.
In_IN storing_VBG lymph_NN ,_, be_VB careful_JJ to_TO keep_VB separate_VB the_DT charges_NNS obtained_VBN from_IN different_JJ subjects_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO affix_VB to_TO each_DT set_NN of_IN charges_NNS the_DT name_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT number_NN in_IN your_PRP$ register_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT subject_NN from_IN whom_WP the_DT lymph_NN was_VBD derived_VBN ._.
Keep_VB such_JJ note_NN of_IN all_DT supplies_NNS of_IN lymph_NN which_WDT you_PRP use_VBP or_CC furnish_JJ as_IN will_MD always_RB enable_VB you_PRP ,_, in_IN any_DT case_NN of_IN complaint_NN ,_, to_TO identify_VB the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
Never_RB take_VBP lymph_NN from_IN cases_NNS of_IN re-vaccination_NN ._.
Take_VB lymph_NN only_RB from_IN subjects_NNS who_WP are_VBP in_IN good_JJ health_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN you_PRP can_MD ascertain_VB ,_, of_IN healthy_JJ parentage_NN ;_: preferring_VBG children_NNS whose_WP$ families_NNS are_VBP known_VBN to_TO you_PRP ,_, and_CC who_WP have_VBP elder_VBN brothers_NNS or_CC sisters_NNS of_IN undoubted_JJ healthiness_NN ._.
Always_NNS carefully_RB examine_VBP the_DT subject_NN as_IN to_TO any_DT existing_VBG skin_NN disease_NN ,_, and_CC specially_RB as_IN to_TO any_DT signs_NNS of_IN hereditary_JJ syphilis_NN ._.
Take_VB lymph_NN only_RB from_IN well-characterised_JJ uninjured_JJ vesicles_NNS ._.
Take_VB it_PRP (_( as_IN may_MD be_VB done_VBN in_IN all_DT regular_JJ cases_NNS on_IN the_DT day_NN week_NN after_IN vaccination_NN )_) at_IN the_DT stage_NN when_WRB the_DT vesicles_NNS are_VBP fully-formed_JJ and_CC plump_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB there_EX is_VBZ no_DT perceptible_JJ commencement_NN of_IN areolæ_NN ._.
Open_VB the_DT vesicles_NNS with_IN scrupulous_JJ care_NN to_TO avoid_VB drawing_VBG blood_NN ._.
Take_VB no_DT lymph_NN which_WDT ,_, as_IN it_PRP issues_NNS from_IN the_DT vesicle_NN ,_, is_VBZ not_RB perfectly_RB clear_JJ and_CC trans-_JJ parent_NN ,_, or_CC is_VBZ at_IN all_DT thin_JJ and_CC watery_NN ._.
From_IN such_PDT a_DT vesicle_NN as_IN vaccination_NN by_IN puncture_NN commonly_RB produces_VBZ ,_, do_VBP not_RB ,_, under_IN ordinary_JJ circumstances_NNS ,_, take_VB more_JJR lymph_NN than_IN will_MD suffice_VB for_IN the_DT immediate_JJ vaccination_NN of_IN five_CD subjects_NNS ,_, or_CC for_IN the_DT charging_NN of_IN seven_CD ivory_NN points_NNS ,_, or_CC for_IN the_DT filling_NN of_IN three_CD capillary_JJ tubes_NNS ;_: and_CC from_IN larger_JJR or_CC smaller_JJR vesicles_NNS take_VBP only_RB in_IN like_JJ proportion_NN to_TO their_PRP$ size_NN ._.
Never_RB squeeze_NN or_CC drain_VB any_DT vesicle_NN ._.
Be_VB careful_JJ never_RB to_TO transfer_VB blood_NN from_IN the_DT subject_NN you_PRP vaccinate_VBP to_TO the_DT subject_NN from_IN whom_WP you_PRP take_VBP lymph_NNS ._.
8_CD ._.
Scrupulously_RB observe_MD in_IN your_PRP$ inspections_NNS every_DT sign_NN which_WDT tests_VBZ the_DT efficiency_NN and_CC purity_NN of_IN your_PRP$ lymph_NN ._.
Note_NNP any_DT case_NN wherein_VBZ the_DT vaccine_NN vesicle_NN is_VBZ unduly_RB hastened_JJ or_CC otherwise_RB irregular_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ development_NN ,_, or_CC wherein_VB any_DT undue_JJ local_JJ irritation_NN arises_NNS ;_: and_CC ,_, if_IN similar_JJ results_NNS ensue_NN in_IN other_JJ cases_NNS ,_, vaccinated_VBN with_IN the_DT same_JJ lymph_NN ,_, desist_NN at_IN once_RB from_IN employing_VBG it_PRP ._.
Consider_VB that_DT your_PRP$ lymph_NN ought_MD to_TO be_VB changed_VBN ,_, if_IN your_PRP$ cases_NNS ,_, at_IN the_DT usual_JJ time_NN of_IN inspection_NN on_IN the_DT day_NN week_NN after_IN vaccination_NN ,_, have_VBP not_RB ,_, as_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, their_PRP$ vesicles_NNS entirely_RB free_JJ from_IN areolæ_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
Keep_VB in_IN good_JJ condition_NN the_DT lancets_NNS or_CC other_JJ instruments_NNS which_WDT you_PRP use_VBP for_IN vaccinating_NN ,_, and_CC do_VBP not_RB use_VB them_PRP for_IN other_JJ surgical_JJ operations_NNS ._.
When_WRB you_PRP vaccinate_VBP ,_, have_VBP water_NN and_CC a_DT napkin_NN at_IN your_PRP$ side_NN ,_, with_IN which_WDT invariably_RB to_TO cleanse_VB your_PRP$ instrument_NN after_IN one_CD operation_NN before_IN proceeding_VBG to_TO another_DT ._.

25_CD ABSTRACT_NNP OF_NNP APPENDIX_NNP B.26_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP ASSAM_NNP ._.
APPENDIX_NNP C.Resolution_NNP on_IN the_DT Assam_NNP Vaccination_NNP Report_NNP for_IN 1883-84_JJ ._.
Extract_NN from_IN the_DT Proceedings_NNP of_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Assam_NNP in_IN the_DT General_NNP Department_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
6,036_CD ,_, dated_VBN Shillong_NNP ,_, the_DT 18th_CD September_NNP 1884_CD ._.
READ_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) departmental_NN agency_NN ;_: the_DT exact_JJ ratio_NN was_VBD 33_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
in_IN 1882-83_JJ and_CC 32_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
in_IN 1883-84_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN inspections_NNS (_( 25,090_CD against_IN 18,021_CD in_IN 1882-83_JJ )_) is_VBZ very_RB evenly_RB divided_VBN between_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP and_CC Native_NNP Superintendents_NNP (_( 12,310_CD by_IN the_DT former_JJ ,_, and_CC 12,780_CD by_IN the_DT latter_NN )_) ,_, but_CC the_DT results_NNS arrived_VBD at_IN by_IN these_DT two_CD classes_NNS of_IN officers_NNS are_VBP widely_RB different_JJ ,_, the_DT former_JJ finding_NN 85_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT operations_NNS successful_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT latter_JJ 95_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
Nearly_RB half_NN of_IN the_DT inspection_NN work_NN done_VBN by_IN Native_JJ Superintendents_NNS was_VBD in_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Sylhet_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT percentage_NN of_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS is_VBZ shown_VBN as_IN 99.6_CD ._.
Work_NN of_IN this_DT kind_NN is_VBZ obviously_RB untrustworthy_JJ ,_, and_CC suggests_VBZ a_DT doubt_NN whether_IN the_DT inspecting_JJ officer_NN is_VBZ really_RB able_JJ to_TO distinguish_VB a_DT successful_JJ operation_NN from_IN a_DT failure_NN ._.
Secondary_JJ operations_NNS ._.
6_CD ._.
Secondary_JJ operations_NNS were_VBD only_RB 570_CD in_IN number_NN ,_, all_DT performed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP agency_NN ._.
The_DT number_NN returned_VBN as_IN successful_JJ was_VBD 421_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT proportion_NN 73.8_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
Vaccinating_VBG staff_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT agency_NN by_IN which_WDT the_DT department_NN worked_VBD in_IN 1882-83_JJ and_CC 1883-84_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN each_DT class_NN of_IN officers_NNS ,_, are_VBP detailed_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ table_NN :_: (_( 3_CD )_) 1882-83_CD ._.
1883-84_JJ ._.
Dhubri_NN ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: .._VBZ 1_CD Gauhati_NNP ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: 1_CD 1_CD Sibságar_NN ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: 2_CD 1_CD Golághat_NNPS ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: .._VBZ 1_CD Sylhet_NN ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: 1_CD 1_CD Sichar_NN ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: 1_CD Total_NN ..._: 4_CD 6_CD 8_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS maintained_VBN by_IN municipalities_NNS ,_, towns_NNS ,_, and_CC stations_NNS ,_, is_VBZ shown_VBN in_IN the_DT margin_NN ._.
The_DT addition_NN of_IN two_CD vaccinators_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN followed_VBN by_IN an_DT increase_NN of_IN only_RB 187_CD in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT average_JJ per_NN man_NN has_VBZ fallen_VBN from_IN 325_CD to_TO 248_CD ,_, being_VBG highest_JJS in_IN Sibságar_NNP (_( 369_CD )_) ,_, and_CC lowest_JJS in_IN Gauháti_NNP (_( 147_CD )_) ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN municipal_JJ vaccinators_NNS in_IN Sylhet_NNP and_CC Gauháti_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, is_VBZ stated_VBN differently_RB in_IN the_DT municipal_JJ administration_NN reports_NNS of_IN these_DT places_NNS ,_, i.e._FW ,_, two_CD vaccinators_NNS to_TO each_DT municipality_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT discrepancy_NN will_MD have_VB to_TO be_VB enquired_VBN into_IN ._.
Local_JJ Fund_NNP vaccinators_NNS ._.

Sylhet_NNP was_VBD the_DT first_JJ district_NN to_TO set_VB the_DT example_NN of_IN paying_VBG vaccinators_NNS out_IN of_IN Local_JJ Funds_NNS ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ example_NN has_VBZ been_VBN followed_VBN in_IN 1883-84_CD by_IN five_CD other_JJ districts_NNS ._.

Supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN ._.
16_CD ._.

Compulsory_JJ vaccination_NN ._.
17_CD ._.
Dr.Eteson_NNP remarks_NNS that_IN the_DT Compulsory_NNP Vaccination_NNP Act_NNP has_VBZ hitherto_VBN been_VBN practically_RB a_DT dead_JJ letter_NN in_IN Assam_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ in_IN force_NN only_RB in_IN the_DT municipalities_NNS of_IN Sylhet_NNP ,_, Gauháti_NNP ,_, and_CC Dibrugarh_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN Dibrugarh_NNP cantonment_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT work_NN done_VBN in_IN the_DT three_CD municipalities_NNS in_IN 1883-84._JJ as_IN compared_VBN with_IN the_DT population_NN ,_, is_VBZ shown_VBN below_IN ._.
These_DT figures_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN from_IN the_DT municipal_JJ Administration_NNP Reports_NNP ,_, and_CC include_VBP all_DT vaccinations_NNS performed_VBD within_IN municipal_JJ limits_NNS ,_, whether_IN by_IN municipal_JJ vaccinators_NNS or_CC others_NNS :_: (_( 6_CD )_) Dr._NNP Eteson_NNP remarks_NNS that_IN mention_NN is_VBZ nowhere_RB made_VBN of_IN any_DT officials_NNS who_WP are_VBP responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT carrying_VBG out_IN of_IN the_DT Act_NNP ._.
The_DT Sylhet_NNP and_CC Dibrugarh_NNP rules_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, state_NN very_RB plainly_RB who_WP is_VBZ responsible_JJ ._.
The_DT Hospital-Assistant_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT dispen-_JJ sary_NN is_VBZ the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, under_IN the_DT direct_JJ orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ;_: he_PRP keeps_VBZ the_DT register_NN of_IN unprotected_JJ children_NNS ,_, issues_NNS notices_NNS to_TO parents_NNS and_CC guardians_NNS ,_, and_CC institutes_VBZ prosecutions_NNS under_IN the_DT Act_NNP if_IN they_PRP neglect_VBP to_TO have_VB the_DT child_NN vaccinated_VBD within_IN a_DT week_NN ._.
The_DT Gauháti_NNP rules_NNS are_VBP less_RBR detailed_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT same_JJ duties_NNS and_CC responsi-_JJ bilities_NNS devolve_VBP on_IN the_DT Hospital-Assistant_NNP of_IN the_DT dispensary_NN here_RB also_RB ,_, in_IN virtue_NN of_IN his_PRP$ function_NN as_IN Superintendent_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP in_IN the_DT municipal_JJ circle_NN ._.
If_IN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, there_EX is_VBZ any_DT failure_NN to_TO enforce_VB the_DT Act_NNP (_( and_CC the_DT figures_NNS quoted_VBN above_IN certainly_RB suggest_VBP such_PDT a_DT suspicion_NN )_) ,_, it_PRP can_MD only_RB arise_VB from_IN a_DT neglect_NN of_IN the_DT plain_NN provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT rules_NNS ,_, and_CC Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP can_MD easily_RB satisfy_VB themselves_PRP whether_IN this_DT is_VBZ the_DT case_NN or_CC not_RB ._.
A_DT special_JJ section_NN upon_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT Act_NNP in_IN the_DT three_CD municipalities_NNS and_CC in_IN the_DT cantonment_NN of_IN Dibrugarh_NNP should_MD be_VB appended_VBN to_TO the_DT Report_NNP for_IN 1884-85_JJ ,_, showing_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN children_NNS on_IN the_DT registers_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT protection_NN has_VBZ been_VBN carried_VBN since_IN the_DT Act_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN force_NN ._.

Attitude_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS towards_IN vaccina-_JJ tion_NN ._.
18_CD ._.
The_DT district_NN officers_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ reports_NNS are_VBP summarised_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Eteson_NNP ,_, consider_VB that_DT ,_, though_RB religious_JJ prejudices_NNS sometimes_RB interfere_RB ,_, no_DT active_JJ opposition_NN to_TO vaccination_NN exists_NNS generally_RB among_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN Assam_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN that_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN the_DT Barpeta_NNP Shastra_NNP was_VBD unfavourable_JJ in_IN the_DT Goálpára_NNP sub-division_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN Barpeta_NNP itself_PRP one_CD section_NN of_IN the_DT Hindus_NNP was_VBD opposed_VBN to_TO vaccination_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT other_JJ admits_VBZ it_PRP ._.
The_DT sects_NNS here_RB intended_VBN are_VBP doubtless_JJ the_DT two_CD sects_NNS known_VBN as_IN Mahapurushias_NNP and_CC Damo-_NNP darias_NN ,_, the_DT former_JJ being_VBG hostile_JJ to_TO vaccination_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT Damodarias_NNP are_VBP not_RB ._.
In_IN the_DT Jorhát_NNP sub-division_NN ,_, again_RB ,_, the_DT reports_NNS state_NN that_IN there_EX are_VBP communities_NNS who_WP consider_VBP it_PRP inconsistent_NN with_IN their_PRP$ character_NN as_IN bhakats_NNS to_TO be_VB either_RB vaccinated_VBN or_CC inoculated_VBN even_RB when_WRB epidemic_JJ small-pox_NN is_VBZ raging_VBG ._.
But_CC the_DT general_JJ view_NN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT chief_NN difficulty_NN which_WDT vaccination_NN in_IN Assam_NNP has_VBZ to_TO overcome_VB is_VBZ the_DT preference_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS for_IN inoculation_NN ,_, a_DT preference_NN founded_VBN partly_RB on_IN old_JJ custom_NN ,_, and_CC partly_RB on_IN a_DT belief_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, not_RB ill-_JJ grounded_VBD ,_, that_DT inoculation_NN affords_NNS more_RBR certain_JJ protection_NN ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Sylhet_NNP writes_NNS :_: (_( 7_CD )_) ber_NN of_IN operations_NNS was_VBD the_DT result_NN :_: but_CC the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP has_VBZ since_IN heard_NN that_IN this_DT letter_NN was_VBD a_DT fraud_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT Goshain_NNP subsequently_RB levied_VBD fines_NNS from_IN those_DT who_WP relied_VBD on_IN it_PRP ._.
No_DT Deputy-Commissioner_NNP ,_, no_DT Government_NNP officer_NN ,_, wields_VBZ half_PDT the_DT authority_NN or_CC power_NN which_WDT these_DT saintly_RB personages_VBZ possess_NN ._.
They_PRP make_VBP progresses_NNS through_IN the_DT districts_NNS with_IN semi-_JJ regal_NN state_NN ,_, are_VBP attended_VBN by_IN crowds_NN of_IN followers_NNS ,_, are_VBP paid_VBN by_IN the_DT contributions_NNS of_IN the_DT villa-_JJ gers_NNS ,_, .levy_NN dues_NNS through_IN their_PRP$ subordinate_NN officials_NNS who_WP are_VBP spread_VBN over_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, and_CC hold_VB courts_NNS of_IN enquiry_NN ,_, at_IN which_WDT reports_NNS are_VBP received_VBN of_IN all_DT lapses_NNS from_IN the_DT religious_JJ ordinances_NNS which_WDT govern_VBP social_JJ life_NN ,_, and_CC punishment_NN is_VBZ inflicted_VBN ._.
Mr._NNP Elliott_NNP in_IN the_DT last_JJ winter_NN received_VBD a_DT graphic_JJ account_NN from_IN an_DT old_JJ mauzadar_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD not_RB apparently_RB lying_VBG ,_, of_IN what_WP he_PRP him-_JJ self_NN had_VBD witnessed_VBN when_WRB one_CD of_IN these_DT Goshains_NNS came_VBD to_TO a_DT village_NN where_WRB one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ disciples_NNS had_VBD violated_VBN the_DT anti-vaccination_JJ ordinance_NN :_: how_WRB his_PRP$ followers_NNS seized_VBD hold_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT Goshain_NNP 's_POS ,_, presence_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN his_PRP$ orders_NNS ,_, beat_VBD him_PRP till_IN they_PRP were_VBD tired_VBN ,_, and_CC then_RB levied_VBD a_DT fine_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
40_CD :_: No_DT complaint_NN has_VBZ ever_RB been_VBN made_VBN in_IN the_DT criminal_JJ courts_NNS of_IN these_DT acts_NNS of_IN violence_NN and_CC exaction_NN ._.
Large_JJ sections_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN are_VBP no_DT doubt_NN free_RB from_IN this_DT religious_JJ subjection_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ among_IN them_PRP that_DT vaccination_NN makes_VBZ progress_NN :_: but_CC among_IN the_DT classes_NNS higher_RBR in_IN the_DT social_JJ scale_NN it_PRP can_MD make_VB little_JJ advance_NN till_VB some_DT means_NNS are_VBP found_VBN of_IN diverting_VBG the_DT opposition_NN of_IN the_DT Goshains_NNP ,_, or_CC till_VB the_DT superstitious_JJ veneration_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP held_VBN melts_RB away_RB ._.
District_NNP reports_NNS ._.
19_CD ._.
The_DT table_NN given_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 2_CD of_IN this_DT review_NN affords_VBZ a_DT comparative_JJ view_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN in_IN all_PDT the_DT districts_NNS of_IN the_DT Province_NNP ._.
Sylhet_NN shows_NNS by_IN far_RB the_DT largest_JJS number_NN of_IN operations_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT development_NN of_IN vaccination_NN work_NN from_IN 1,948_CD operations_NNS in_IN 1881-82_JJ to_TO 23,241_CD in_IN 1883-84_JJ reflects_VBZ high_JJ credit_NN upon_IN Dr._NNP Macnamara_NNP ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN upon_IN the_DT Deputy-Commissioner_NNP and_CC the_DT sub-divisional_JJ officers_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Macnamara_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, takes_VBZ too_RB favourable_JJ a_DT view_NN of_IN the_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN by_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS ,_, and_CC had_VBD his_PRP$ inspections_NNS extended_VBD over_RP 1,500_CD or_CC 2.000_CD cases_NNS ,_, instead_RB of_IN 281_CD only_RB ,_, he_PRP would_MD probably_RB have_VB found_VBN a_DT smaller_JJR proportion_NN of_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS than_IN 90_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
What_WP is_VBZ wanted_VBN in_IN Sylhet_NNP is_VBZ closer_JJR supervision_NN of_IN the_DT large_JJ staff_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS now_RB at_IN work_NN ._.
Cachar_NNP ._.
(_( 8_CD )_) in_IN 1882-83_JJ ,_, and_CC has_VBZ only_RB risen_VBN to_TO 3,606_CD in_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP three_CD Government_NNP vaccinators_NNS ,_, two_CD municipal_JJ vaccinators_NNS (_( Sibságar_NNP and_CC Golághát_NNP )_) ,_, and_CC one_CD man_NN paid_VBN from_IN Local_JJ Funds_NNS ;_: and_CC these_DT six_CD men_NNS performed_VBD only_RB 3,064_CD operations_NNS between_IN them_PRP ,_, or_CC one-half_JJ the_DT number_NN that_IN the_DT Government_NNP has_VBZ a_DT right_NN to_TO expect_VB ._.
There_EX are_VBP three_CD ex-inoculators_NNS ,_, who_WP performed_VBD 323_CD operations_NNS ._.
and_CC ought_MD to_TO be_VB got_VBN rid_JJ of_IN ._.
The_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP trusts_VBZ that_IN Dr._NNP Partridge_NNP will_MD give_VB his_PRP$ particular_JJ attention_NN to_TO vaccination_NN during_IN the_DT coming_VBG season_NN ,_, and_CC expects_VBZ the_DT district_NN officers_NNS to_TO co-operate_VB with_IN him_PRP towards_NNS ensuring_VBG a_DT better_JJR outturn_NN of_IN work_NN in_IN 1884-85_JJ ._.

1_CD ._.

First_RB ,_, a_DT series_NN of_IN tables_NNS is_VBZ introduced_VBN showing_VBG the_DT distribution_NN ,_, expenditure_NN ,_, and_CC general_JJ results_NNS ;_: second_JJ ,_, a_DT review_NN of_IN the_DT district_NN operations_NNS ;_: third_CC ,_, the_DT general_JJ provincial_JJ statistics_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.

2_CD ._.
The_DT supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN was_VBD ,_, in_IN the_DT first_JJ instance_NN ,_, obtained_VBN from_IN England_NNP on_IN a_DT general_JJ indent_NN through_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP with_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.
200_CD tubes_NNS were_VBD required_VBN ,_, but_CC only_RB 100_CD were_VBD sanctioned_VBN ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT small_JJ stock_NN available_JJ ,_, compared_VBN with_IN the_DT demand_NN from_IN India_NNP at_IN large_JJ ._.
The_DT lymph_NN arrived_VBD on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD September_NNP 1884_CD ,_, and_CC was_VBD immediately_RB distributed_VBN to_TO the_DT several_JJ Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP ._.
This_DT selected_VBN pure_NN lymph_NN is_VBZ ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, intended_VBD only_RB to_TO begin_VB vaccination_NN ;_: and_CC for_IN this_DT purpose_NN special_JJ care_NN should_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO use_VB it_PRP on_IN particularly_RB healthy_JJ infants_NNS ,_, of_IN four_CD to_TO eight_CD months_NNS ,_, to_TO secure_VB a_DT properly_JJ developed_NN and_CC uninjured_JJ natural_JJ vesicle_NN ._.
The_DT reports_NNS are_VBP by_IN no_DT means_NNS uniform_RB as_IN to_TO the_DT quality_NN of_IN this_DT year_NN 's_POS supply_NN ._.
From_IN some_DT districts_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN very_RB good_JJ ,_, in_IN others_NNS fair_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN others_NNS a_DT failure_NN ._.
Its_PRP$ quality_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB relied_VBN upon_IN as_IN uniform_NN throughout_IN ,_, notwithstanding_VBG every_DT care_NN in_IN its_PRP$ collection_NN in_IN England_NNP ;_: but_CC I_PRP can_MD not_RB help_VB thinking_VBG that_IN the_DT results_NNS are_VBP mostly_RB proportionate_JJ to_TO the_DT care_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT first_JJ operations_NNS are_VBP performed_VBN and_CC watched_VBN ._.

Indian_JJ lymph_NN ._.
3_CD ._.

1-1-3_JJ ._.
