It_PRP may_MD be_VB as_RB well_RB to_TO explain_VB here_RB how_WRB the_DT supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN for_IN the_DT Province_NNP is_VBZ arranged_VBN ._.
Early_RB in_IN each_DT year_NN an_DT indent_NN is_VBZ prepared_VBN in_IN this_DT office_NN for_IN English_NNP lymph_NN in_IN tubes_NNS and_CC passed_VBN on_IN to_TO the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP with_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP for_IN supply_NN ._.
The_DT indent_NN for_IN 1884-85_JJ asked_VBD for_IN 200_CD tubes_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN reply_NN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP intimated_VBD it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN reduced_VBN to_TO 100_CD in_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT difficulty_NN in_IN obtaining_VBG a_DT large_JJ supply_NN of_IN good_JJ lymph_NN ._.
The_DT lymph_NN was_VBD received_VBN on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD September_NNP ,_, and_CC immediately_RB distributed_VBN ._.
Dr._NNP Partridge_NNP states_NNS that_IN three_CD tubes_NNS were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO Cachar_NNP ,_, but_CC this_DT is_VBZ probably_RB a_DT mistake_NN :_: eight_CD English_NNP tubes_NNS ,_, and_CC one_CD of_IN calf_NN lymph_NN from_IN Bombay_NNP were_VBD forwarded_VBN to_TO Cachar_VB on_IN the_DT 6th_CD October_NNP ._.
Beside_IN this_DT initial_JJ supply_NN ,_, every_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP is_VBZ in_IN communication_NN direct_NN with_IN the_DT Sanitary_JJ Commissioners_NNS of_IN Bengal_NNP and_CC the_DT North-West_NNP Provinces_NNPS ,_, and_CC obtains_VBZ periodical_JJ or_CC emergent_JJ supplies_NNS ._.
Manifestly_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT proper_JJ way_NN that_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP should_MD make_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ arrangements_NNS for_IN Indian_JJ lymph_NN ._.
It_PRP would_MD be_VB a_DT useless_JJ circumlocution_NN that_IN all_DT supply_NN should_MD first_RB be_VB centralised_VBN at_IN Shillong_NNP ,_, then_RB again_RB radiated_VBN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP heard_VBN of_IN no_DT difficulties_NNS elsewhere_RB ;_: the_DT quality_NN varies_NNS ,_, but_CC supply_NN by_IN crust_NN or_CC tubes_NNS is_VBZ always_RB ample_JJ ._.
Probably_RB ,_, Dr._NNP Monteath_NNP 's_POS ill-health_NN was_VBD the_DT cause_NN of_IN this_DT ,_, as_IN of_IN many_JJ other_JJ shortcomings_NNS where_WRB the_DT civil_JJ medical_JJ duties_NNS had_VBD been_VBN allowed_VBN to_TO fall_VB altogether_RB to_TO subordinates_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Partridge_NNP says_VBZ that_IN the_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN from_IN this_DT office_NN and_CC from_IN the_DT North-West_NNP Provinces_NNP was_VBD good_JJ ,_, that_IN from_IN Calcutta_NNP bad_JJ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ of_IN course_NN understood_NN that_IN the_DT first_JJ limited_JJ supply_NN of_IN selected_VBN English_NNP lymph_PRP shall_MD be_VB used_VBN in_IN the_DT sadr_NN station_NN only_RB on_IN selected_VBN cases_NNS and_CC under_IN the_DT personal_JJ supervision_NN of_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ._.
When_WRB once_RB the_DT local_JJ supply_NN has_VBZ been_VBN established_VBN ,_, the_DT vaccinators_NNS themselves_PRP should_MD be_VB held_VBN responsible_JJ for_IN keeping_VBG it_PRP up_RP ,_, but_CC in_IN practice_NN no_DT doubt_NN many_JJ of_IN them_PRP are_VBP exceedingly_RB careless_JJ ,_, and_CC without_IN constant_JJ inspection_NN they_PRP fail_VBP to_TO keep_VB up_RP tubes_NNS or_CC they_PRP carry_VBP on_IN work_NN with_IN bad_JJ lymph_NN ._.
Working_JJ staff_NN ._.
139_CD ._.
The_DT staff_NN of_IN operators_NNS employed_VBN in_IN Cachar_NNP was_VBD increased_VBN to_TO ten_VB ,_, which_WDT included_VBD three_CD provincial_NN ,_, one_CD municipal_NN ,_, and_CC three_CD Local_NNP Fund_NNP vacci-_JJ nators_NNS ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, one_CD Hospital-Assistant_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD compounder_NN added_VBD their_PRP$ quota_NN ._.
If_IN three_CD or_CC four_CD more_JJR vaccinators_NNS are_VBP entertained_VBN by_IN the_DT Local_NNP Board_NNP ,_, an_DT application_NN for_IN a_DT native_JJ inspector_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ much_RB needed_VBN ,_, would_MD probably_RB be_VB sanctioned_VBN ._.
From_IN the_DT annual_JJ report_NN it_PRP is_VBZ evident_JJ that_IN each_DT operator_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN given_VBN a_DT definite_JJ area_NN in_IN which_WDT alone_RB to_TO work_VB ;_: there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT inspection_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ the_DT favourable_JJ statistics_NNS of_IN past_JJ years_NNS are_VBP to_TO a_DT large_JJ extent_NN untrue_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Partridge_NNP has_VBZ much_RB before_IN him_PRP to_TO put_VB vaccination_NN under_IN thorough_NN organised_VBN command_NN ._.
Statistics_NNS ._.
140_CD ._.
Notwithstanding_VBG an_DT increase_NN of_IN three_CD local_JJ operators_NNS ,_, the_DT total_NN reaches_VBZ only_RB 4,744_CD cases_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 3,738_CD ,_, or_CC 78.79_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, are_VBP reported_VBN to_TO be_VB successful_JJ ._.
There_EX were_VBD 13_CD re-vaccinations_NNS ,_, and_CC 9_CD successful_JJ ._.
In_IN 1883-84_CD there_EX were_VBD 5,073_CD cases_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 3,926_CD ,_, or_CC 77_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, were_VBD successful_JJ ._.
Examination_NN of_IN particular_JJ classes_NNS as_IN to_TO protection_NN ._.
141_CD ._.
The_DT following_VBG table_JJ gives_VBZ in_IN this_DT year_NN 's_POS report_NN details_NNS of_IN particular_JJ classes_NNS examined_VBN with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO ascer-_NN tain_VB the_DT amount_NN of_IN protection_NN afforded_VBD :24_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP ASSAM_NNP ._.
surprising_VBG they_PRP should_MD have_VB been_VBN inoculated_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ very_RB desirable_JJ that_IN Dr._NNP Mullane_NNP 's_POS examination_NN of_IN schools_NNS haphazard_NN should_MD be_VB followed_VBN in_IN every_DT district_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN we_PRP may_MD learn_VB to_TO what_WP extent_VB the_DT protection_NN from_IN inoculation_NN and_CC vaccination_NN is_VBZ advancing_VBG and_CC receding_VBG ._.
Small-pox_JJ very_RB severe_RB in_IN 1884_CD ._.
143_CD ._.
Last_JJ year_NN small-pox_NN was_VBD widely_RB and_CC severely_RB prevalent_JJ throughout_IN Cachar_NNP ,_, affecting_VBG the_DT garden_NN labourers_NNS :_: REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP ASSAM_NNP ._.
25_CD APPENDIX_NNP A_NNP ._.
INSTRUCTIONS_NNP FOR_NNP VACCINATORS_NNP ._.
(_( Prescribed_VBN by_IN the_DT Order_NN of_IN the_DT Privy_NNP Council_NNP ,_, 29th_CD July_NNP 1871_CD ._. )_)
1_CD ._.
Except_IN so_RB far_RB as_IN any_DT immediate_JJ danger_NN of_IN small-pox_NN may_MD require_VB ,_, vaccinate_VB only_JJ subjects_NNS who_WP are_VBP in_IN good_JJ health_NN ._.
As_IN regards_NNS infants_NNS ,_, ascertain_VBP that_IN there_EX is_VBZ not_RB any_DT febrile_JJ state_NN ,_, nor_CC any_DT irritation_NN of_IN the_DT bowels_NNS ,_, nor_CC any_DT unhealthy_JJ state_NN of_IN skin_NN ;_: specially_RB no_DT chafing_NN or_CC eczema_NN behind_IN the_DT ears_NNS ,_, or_CC in_IN the_DT groin_NN ,_, or_CC elsewhere_RB in_IN folds_NNS of_IN skin_NN ._.
Do_NNP not_RB ,_, except_IN of_IN necessity_NN ,_, vaccinate_NN in_IN cases_NNS where_WRB there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN recent_JJ exposure_NN to_TO the_DT infection_NN of_IN measles_NNS or_CC scarlatina_NN ,_, nor_CC where_WRB erysipelas_NN is_VBZ prevailing_VBG in_IN or_CC about_IN the_DT place_NN of_IN residence_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
In_IN all_DT ordinary_JJ cases_NNS of_IN primary_JJ vaccination_NN ,_, if_IN you_PRP vaccinate_VBP by_IN separate_JJ punctures_NNS ,_, make_VBP such_JJ punctures_NNS as_IN will_MD produce_VB at_IN least_JJS four_CD separate_JJ good-sized_JJ vesicles_NNS ,_, not_RB less_JJR than_IN half_PDT an_DT inch_NN from_IN one_CD another_DT ;_: or_CC ,_, if_IN you_PRP vaccinate_VBP otherwise_RB than_IN by_IN separate_JJ punctures_NNS ,_, take_VBP care_NN to_TO produce_VB local_JJ effects_NNS equal_JJ to_TO those_DT just_RB mentioned_VBN ._.
3_CD ._.
Direct_NNP care_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN for_IN keeping_VBG the_DT vesicles_NNS uninjured_VBD during_IN their_PRP$ progress_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN avoiding_VBG afterwards_NNS the_DT premature_NN removal_NN of_IN the_DT crusts_NNS ._.
4_CD ._.
Enter_NNP all_DT cases_NNS in_IN your_PRP$ Register_NN on_IN the_DT day_NN when_WRB you_PRP vaccinate_VBP them_PRP ,_, and_CC with_IN all_DT particulars_NNS required_VBN in_IN the_DT Register_NNP up_RP to_TO column_VB 9_CD ,_, inclusive_NN ._.
Enter_NNP the_DT results_NNS on_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN inspection_NN ._.
Never_RB enter_VBP any_DT results_NNS which_WDT have_VBP not_RB been_VBN inspected_VBN by_IN yourself_PRP or_CC your_PRP$ legally-qualified_JJ deputy_NN ._.
In_IN cases_NNS of_IN primary_JJ vaccination_NN ,_, register_NN as_IN &_CC quot_NN ;_: successful_JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: only_RB those_DT cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT normal_JJ vaccine_NN vesicle_NN has_VBZ been_VBN produced_VBN ;_: in_IN cases_NNS of_IN re-vaccination_NN ,_, register_NN as_IN &_CC quot_NN ;_: successful_JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: only_RB those_DT cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT either_DT vesicles_NNS ,_, normal_JJ or_CC modified_VBN ,_, or_CC papules_NNS surrounded_VBN by_IN areolæ_NNS have_VBP resulted_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT vaccination_NN of_IN an_DT unsuccessful_JJ case_NN is_VBZ repeated_VBN ,_, it_PRP should_MD be_VB entered_VBN as_IN a_DT fresh_JJ case_NN in_IN the_DT register_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
Endeavour_CD to_TO maintain_VB in_IN your_PRP$ district_NN such_PDT a_DT succession_NN of_IN cases_NNS as_IN will_MD enable_VB you_PRP uniformly_RB to_TO vaccinate_VB with_IN liquid_JJ lymph_NNS directly_RB from_IN arm_NN to_TO arm_NN ;_: and_CC do_VB not_RB ,_, under_IN ordinary_JJ circumstances_NNS ,_, adopt_VBP any_DT other_JJ method_NN of_IN vaccinating_VBG ._.
To_TO provide_VB against_IN emergencies_NNS ,_, always_RB have_VBP in_IN reserve_NN some_DT stored_VBD lymph_NN ;_: either_CC dry_JJ ,_, as_IN on_IN thickly-charged_JJ ivory_NN points_NNS constantly_RB well_RB protected_VBN from_IN damp_NN ,_, or_CC liquid_NN in_IN fine_JJ ,_, short_JJ ,_, uniformly_JJ capillary_NN (_( not_RB bulbed_VBN )_) tubes_NNS ,_, hermetically_RB sealed_VBN at_IN both_DT extremities_NNS ._.
Lymph_NNP ,_, successfully_RB preserved_VBN by_IN either_DT of_IN these_DT methods_NNS ,_, may_MD be_VB used_VBN without_IN definite_JJ restriction_NN as_IN to_TO time_NN ;_: but_CC with_IN all_DT stored_VBN lymph_NN caution_NN is_VBZ necessary_JJ ,_, lest_JJS in_IN time_NN it_PRP have_VBP become_VBN inert_JJ ,_, or_CC otherwise_RB unfit_JJ for_IN use_NN ._.
If_IN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO vaccinate_VB with_IN recent_JJ liquid_NN lymph_NN ,_, you_PRP convey_VBP it_PRP from_IN case_NN to_TO case_NN otherwise_RB than_IN in_IN hermetically-sealed_JJ capillary_JJ tubes_NNS ,_, do_VBP not_RB ever_RB let_VB more_JJR than_IN eight_CD hours_NNS intervene_NN before_IN it_PRP is_VBZ used_VBN ._.
6_CD ._.
Consider_VB yourself_PRP strictly_RB responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT quality_NN of_IN whatever_WDT lymph_NN you_PRP use_VBP or_CC furnish_JJ for_IN vaccination_NN ._.
Never_RB either_DT use_NN or_CC furnish_JJ lymph_NN which_WDT has_VBZ in_IN it_PRP any_DT ,_, even_RB the_DT slightest_JJS ,_, admixture_NN of_IN blood_NN ._.
In_IN storing_VBG lymph_NN ,_, be_VB careful_JJ to_TO keep_VB separate_VB the_DT charges_NNS obtained_VBN from_IN different_JJ subjects_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO affix_VB to_TO each_DT set_NN of_IN charges_NNS the_DT name_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT number_NN in_IN your_PRP$ register_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT subject_NN from_IN whom_WP the_DT lymph_NN was_VBD derived_VBN ._.
Keep_VB such_JJ note_NN of_IN all_DT supplies_NNS of_IN lymph_NN which_WDT you_PRP use_VBP or_CC furnish_JJ as_IN will_MD always_RB enable_VB you_PRP ,_, in_IN any_DT case_NN of_IN complaint_NN ,_, to_TO identify_VB the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
Never_RB take_VBP lymph_NN from_IN cases_NNS of_IN re-vaccination_NN ._.
Take_VB lymph_NN only_RB from_IN subjects_NNS who_WP are_VBP in_IN good_JJ health_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN you_PRP can_MD ascertain_VB ,_, of_IN healthy_JJ parentage_NN ;_: preferring_VBG children_NNS whose_WP$ families_NNS are_VBP known_VBN to_TO you_PRP ,_, and_CC who_WP have_VBP elder_VBN brothers_NNS or_CC sisters_NNS of_IN undoubted_JJ healthiness_NN ._.
Always_NNS carefully_RB examine_VBP the_DT subject_NN as_IN to_TO any_DT existing_VBG skin_NN disease_NN ,_, and_CC specially_RB as_IN to_TO any_DT signs_NNS of_IN hereditary_JJ syphilis_NN ._.
Take_VB lymph_NN only_RB from_IN well-characterised_JJ uninjured_JJ vesicles_NNS ._.
Take_VB it_PRP (_( as_IN may_MD be_VB done_VBN in_IN all_DT regular_JJ cases_NNS on_IN the_DT day_NN week_NN after_IN vaccination_NN )_) at_IN the_DT stage_NN when_WRB the_DT vesicles_NNS are_VBP fully-formed_JJ and_CC plump_NN ,_, but_CC ,_, when_WRB there_EX is_VBZ no_DT perceptible_JJ commencement_NN of_IN areolæ_NN ._.
Open_VB the_DT vesicles_NNS with_IN scrupulous_JJ care_NN to_TO avoid_VB drawing_VBG blood_NN ._.
Lake_NNP no_DT lymph_NN which_WDT ,_, as_IN it_PRP issues_NNS from_IN the_DT vesicle_NN ,_, is_VBZ not_RB perfectly_RB clear_JJ and_CC trans-_JJ parent_NN ,_, or_CC is_VBZ at_IN all_DT thin_JJ and_CC watery_NN ._.
From_IN such_PDT a_DT vesicle_NN as_IN vaccination_NN by_IN puncture_NN commonly_RB produces_VBZ ,_, do_VBP not_RB ,_, under_IN ordinary_JJ circumstances_NNS ,_, take_VB more_JJR lymph_NN than_IN will_MD suffice_VB for_IN the_DT immediate_JJ vaccination_NN of_IN five_CD subjects_NNS ,_, or_CC for_IN the_DT charging_NN of_IN seven_CD ivory_NN points_NNS ,_, or_CC for_IN the_DT filling_NN of_IN three_CD capillary_JJ tubes_NNS ;_: and_CC from_IN larger_JJR or_CC smaller_JJR vesicles_NNS take_VBP only_RB in_IN like_JJ proportion_NN to_TO their_PRP$ size_NN ._.
Never_RB squeeze_NN or_CC drain_VB any_DT vesicle_NN ._.
Be_VB careful_JJ never_RB to_TO transfer_VB blood_NN from_IN the_DT subject_NN you_PRP vaccinate_VBP to_TO the_DT subject_NN from_IN whom_WP you_PRP take_VBP lymph_NNS ._.
8_CD ._.
Scrupulously_RB observe_MD in_IN your_PRP$ inspections_NNS every_DT sign_NN which_WDT tests_VBZ the_DT efficiency_NN and_CC purity_NN of_IN your_PRP$ lymph_NN ._.
Note_NNP any_DT case_NN wherein_VBZ the_DT vaccine_NN vesicle_NN is_VBZ unduly_RB hastened_JJ or_CC otherwise_RB irregular_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ development_NN ,_, or_CC wherein_VB any_DT undue_JJ local_JJ irritation_NN arises_NNS ;_: and_CC ,_, if_IN similar_JJ results_NNS ensue_NN in_IN other_JJ cases_NNS ,_, vaccinated_VBN with_IN the_DT same_JJ lymph_NN ,_, desist_NN at_IN once_RB from_IN employing_VBG it_PRP ._.
Consider_VB that_DT your_PRP$ lymph_NN ought_MD to_TO be_VB changed_VBN ,_, if_IN your_PRP$ cases_NNS ,_, at_IN the_DT usual_JJ time_NN of_IN inspection_NN on_IN the_DT day_NN week_NN after_IN vaccination_NN ,_, have_VBP not_RB ,_, as_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, their_PRP$ vesicles_NNS entirely_RB free_JJ from_IN areolæ_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
Keep_VB in_IN good_JJ condition_NN the_DT lancets_NNS or_CC other_JJ instruments_NNS which_WDT you_PRP use_VBP for_IN vaccinating_NN ,_, and_CC do_VBP not_RB use_VB them_PRP for_IN other_JJ surgical_JJ operations_NNS ._.
When_WRB you_PRP vaccinate_VBP ,_, have_VBP water_NN and_CC a_DT napkin_NN at_IN your_PRP$ side_NN ,_, with_IN which_WDT invariably_RB to_TO cleanse_VB your_PRP$ instrument_NN after_IN one_CD operation_NN before_IN proceeding_VBG to_TO another_DT ._.
APPENDIX_NNP B_NNP ._.
Memorandum_NN on_IN the_DT vaccination_NN seen_VBN during_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP 's_POS tour_NN ,_, Nowgong_NNP District_NNP ._.
11th_CD and_CC 12th_CD March_NNP 1885.26_CD REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP ASSAM_NNP ._.
has_VBZ been_VBN but_CC rarely_RB carried_VBD out_RP ._.
The_DT vaccinator_NN states_VBZ that_IN the_DT people_NNS often_RB object_VBP to_TO even_RB two_CD marks_NNS being_VBG done_VBN ,_, as_IN the_DT inoculators_NNS generally_RB do_VBP one_CD mark_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP has_VBZ to_TO comply_VB with_IN their_PRP$ prejudice_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO have_VB vaccination_NN done_VBN ._.
Many_JJ of_IN the_DT scars_NNS on_IN the_DT 41_CD persons_NNS were_VBD through_IN scratching_NN or_CC other_JJ causes_NNS ,_, without_IN the_DT distinctive_JJ character_NN that_WDT would_MD without_IN doubt_NN indicate_VBP a_DT true_JJ vaccine_NN mark_NN ._.
The_DT vac-_JJ cine_NN virus_NN used_VBN is_VBZ crusts_NNS ._.
He_PRP does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB to_TO know_VB how_WRB to_TO properly_VB select_NN and_CC perform_VB vaccination_NN by_IN lymph_NN only_RB ,_, either_RB arm_NN to_TO arm_VB or_CC from_IN supply_NN stored_VBN in_IN tubes_NNS ._.
I_PRP was_VBD able_JJ to_TO see_VB the_DT recent_JJ vacci-_JJ nation_NN in_IN various_JJ stages_NNS of_IN five_CD to_TO seven_CD days_NNS ._.
These_DT were_VBD mostly_RB spurious_JJ ,_, having_VBG dried-up_JJ crusts_NNS then_RB ._.
The_DT virus_NN in_IN use_NN must_MD be_VB bad_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT so-called_JJ vaccination_NN now_RB being_VBG done_VBN by_IN him_PRP must_MD cease_VB ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB to_TO be_VB depended_VBN upon_IN ._.
His_PRP$ return_NN to_TO Nowgong_NNP is_VBZ directed_VBN ,_, and_CC he_PRP should_MD at_IN once_RB total_JJ up_RP his_PRP$ work_NN of_IN the_DT season_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT good_JJ virus_NN now_RB available_JJ ._.
A_DT telegram_NN is_VBZ now_RB being_VBG sent_VBN in_IN for_IN despatch_NN to_TO Dacca_NNP for_IN a_DT fresh_JJ supply_NN of_IN trustworthy_JJ lymph_NN ._.
Vaccinator_NNP states_VBZ that_IN he_PRP finds_VBZ considerable_JJ difficul-_JJ ty_NN in_IN places_NNS to_TO persuade_VB the_DT people_NNS to_TO be_VB vaccinated_VBN ._.
He_PRP states_VBZ that_IN the_DT potter_NN caste_NN (_( Kuwar_NNP )_) will_MD not_RB be_VB vaccinated_VBN unless_IN the_DT Gossain_NNP ,_, name_NN unknown_JJ ,_, who_WP lives_VBZ in_IN Dibrugarh_NNP district_NN ,_, Halmora_NNP ,_, mauza_NN Chamagurihuttra_NNP ,_, will_MD permit_VB them_PRP ;_: also_RB the_DT Hut_NNP Kulia_NNP ,_, a_DT caste_NN whose_WP$ Gossain_NNP is_VBZ Peali_NNP of_IN Khola_NNP Katiahuttra_NNP ,_, Nowgong_NNP district_NN ._.
Perhaps_RB something_NN may_MD be_VB done_VBN to_TO move_VB the_DT Gossains_NNP to_TO permit_VB their_PRP$ followers_NNS to_TO be_VB vaccinated_VBN in_IN approaching_VBG cold_JJ weather_NN ._.
The_DT work_NN done_VBN is_VBZ scattered_VBN over_IN large_JJ areas_NNS ,_, a_DT few_JJ here_RB and_CC there_RB ,_, and_CC with_IN difficulty_NN found_VBN and_CC examined_VBN ._.
The_DT vaccinator_NN does_VBZ not_RB keep_VB up_RP a_DT proper_JJ diary_NN ,_, and_CC has_VBZ no_DT printed_JJ register_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
13th_CD to_TO 15th_CD March_NNP 1885.REPORT_CD ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP ASSAM_NNP ._.
27_CD be_VB better_JJR off_RP than_IN others_NNS ;_: but_CC often_RB the_DT class_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS found_VBN comprises_NNS those_DT who_WP are_VBP ex-inocula-_JJ tors_NNS ,_, those_DT who_WP are_VBP wanting_VBG in_IN intelligence_NN to_TO understand_VB the_DT plain_NN instructions_NNS placed_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, those_DT who_WP ,_, though_IN willing_JJ and_CC active_JJ ,_, lack_VB a_DT proper_JJ training_NN ;_: sometimes_RB men_NNS who_WP can_MD neither_DT read_VB nor_CC write_VB ;_: men_NNS deficient_VBP in_IN energy_NN and_CC truthfulness_NN ,_, making_VBG up_RP for_IN their_PRP$ laziness_NN or_CC ill_VB success_NN by_IN plenty_NN of_IN book-entered_JJ successes_NNS ,_, with_IN a_DT tolerable_JJ sprinkling_NN of_IN good_JJ men_NNS who_WP can_MD be_VB trusted_VBN ,_, and_CC these_DT all_DT are_VBP the_DT principal_JJ channels_NNS through_IN which_WDT vaccination_NN is_VBZ brought_VBN to_TO the_DT people_NNS ._.
If_IN bad_JJ vaccination_NN is_VBZ done_VBN no_DT amount_NN of_IN supervision_NN afterwards_NNS will_MD remedy_VB it_PRP ._.
4_CD ._.
To_TO open_VB out_RP good_JJ prospects_NNS and_CC encourage_VB respectable_JJ men_NNS to_TO engage_VB in_IN vaccination_NN ,_, there_EX might_MD be_VB apprentices_NNS on_IN Rs_NNP ._.
5_CD per_IN month_NN ;_: these_DT ,_, after_IN passing_VBG ,_, being_VBG appointed_VBN vaccinators_NNS on_IN Rs_NNP ._.
10_CD ,_, and_CC ,_, after_IN showing_VBG themselves_PRP trustworthy_JJ ,_, to_TO be_VB eligible_JJ as28_JJ REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP ASSAM_NNP ._.
13_CD ._.
There_EX seems_VBZ some_DT doubt_NN about_IN the_DT rule_NN in_IN the_DT register_NN if_IN a_DT vaccine_NN operation_NN fails_VBZ ;_: whether_IN to_TO write_VB the_DT person_NN 's_POS name_NN again_RB further_RB down_RB on_IN the_DT date_NN upon_IN which_WDT other_JJ attempts_NNS are_VBP made_VBN to_TO vaccinate_VB ,_, or_CC to_TO note_VB opposite_IN the_DT original_JJ entry_NN the_DT successful_JJ repetition_NN of_IN the_DT operation_NN ,_, even_RB if_IN occurring_VBG after_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD attempts_NNS ._.
The_DT practice_NN varies_VBZ both_DT in_IN the_DT different_JJ districts_NNS and_CC amongst_JJ vaccinators_NNS in_IN the_DT same_JJ district_NN ._.
The_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Statements_NNP I._NNP to_TO VI_NNP ._.
in_IN annual_JJ return_NN show_NN individuals_NNS ,_, not_RB operations_NNS or_CC attempts_NNS at_IN vaccination_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT same_JJ individual_NN ,_, after_IN having_VBG undergone_JJ two_CD or_CC more_JJR attempts_NNS at_IN vaccination_NN ,_, is_VBZ entered_VBN by_IN name_NN on_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT different_JJ dates_NNS attempted_VBD ,_, it_PRP causes_VBZ an_DT error_NN in_IN the_DT total_NN of_IN individuals_NNS vaccinated_VBN ,_, as_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT practical_JJ means_NNS of_IN eliminating_VBG these_DT double_JJ entries_NNS so_RB as_IN to_TO show_VB persons_NNS only_RB ,_, vide_IN heading_NN of_IN Statement_NNP I._NNP ,_, Vaccination_NNP Return_NNP ._.
The_DT concluding_VBG part_NN of_IN paragraph_NN 4_CD of_IN Rules_NNS for_IN performing_VBG vaccination_NN is_VBZ the_DT cause_NN of_IN doubt_NN ;_: of_IN course_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ evident_JJ that_IN the_DT successful_JJ result_NN could_MD only_RB be_VB entered_VBN once_RB ._.
14_CD ._.
A_DT rule_NN obtains_VBZ in_IN some_DT districts_NNS for_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS to_TO each_DT send_NN in_IN a_DT copy_NN of_IN the_DT register_NN of_IN names_NNS of_IN persons_NNS vaccinated_VBN monthly_RB ._.
A_DT numerical_JJ abstract_NN would_MD be_VB preferable_JJ ,_, entail_JJ less_RBR labour_JJ ,_, and_CC be_VB useful_JJ for_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN the_DT annual_JJ vaccination_NN return_NN ._.
A_DT copy_NN of_IN the_DT vaccination_NN diary_NN should_MD also_RB be_VB sent_VBN in_IN ._.
The_DT vaccinators_NNS do_VBP not_RB keep_VB up_RP a_DT regular_JJ diary_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP should_MD ,_, as_IN this_DT is_VBZ very_RB essential_JJ as_IN a_DT check_NN upon_IN their_PRP$ movements_NNS and_CC work_NN ._.

15_CD ._.
The_DT Compulsory_NNP Vaccination_NNP Act_NNP V._NNP (_( B_NNP C._NNP )_) of_IN 1880_CD was_VBD in_IN force_NN in_IN the_DT areasmentioned_JJ below_IN ,_, and_CC the_DT accompanying_VBG table_JJ gives_VBZ the_DT available_JJ information_NN regarding_VBG the_DT work_NN done_VBN in_IN them_PRP during_IN 1884-85_JJ ,_, as_IN compared_VBN with_IN the_DT two_CD previous_JJ years_NNS :_: (_( 5_CD )_) provincial_JJ vaccinators_NNS is_VBZ only_RB 514._CD and_CC for_IN local_JJ board_NN vaccinators_NNS only_RB 433_CD ._.
As_IN regards_NNS inspection_NN work_NN ,_, the_DT report_NN shows_VBZ that_IN 403_CD cases_NNS were_VBD inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP ,_, and_CC 3,593_CD by_IN hospital-assistants_NNS ;_: the_DT results_NNS of_IN these_DT inspections_NNS are_VBP not_RB separately_RB shown_VBN ,_, but_CC in_IN the_DT total_JJ 89.36_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
are_VBP entered_VBN as_IN successful_JJ ._.
On_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ much_JJ room_NN for_IN improvement_NN still_RB ._.
The_DT work_NN done_VBN in_IN Lakhimpur_NNP was_VBD 6,629_CD ,_, against_IN 5,398_CD operations_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Whitwell_NNP inspected_VBD 2,604_CD cases_NNS ,_, finding_VBG 81.6_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
successful_JJ ._.
This_DT district_NN has_VBZ more_JJR than_IN trebled_VBD its_PRP$ number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS since_IN 1881-82_CD ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Ward_NNP trusts_VBZ that_IN it_PRP will_MD continue_VB to_TO make_VB progress_NN under_IN Dr._NNP Whitwell_NNP 's_POS charge_NN ._.
Considerable_JJ advance_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN in_IN vaccination_NN work_NN in_IN the_DT Nága_NNP Hills_NNP ,_, 1,228_CD operations_NNS having_VBG been_VBN performed_VBN ,_, as_IN compared_VBN with_IN 473_CD in_IN 1883-84_JJ ._.
The_DT low_JJ percentage_NN of_IN inspections_NNS (_( 16_CD per_IN cent_NN ._. )_)
deducts_NNS from_IN the_DT value_NN attached_VBN to_TO the_DT reported_VBN results_NNS :_: 1,182_CD ,_, or_CC 96.25_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT operations_NNS ,_, are_VBP said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN successful_JJ ,_, but_CC among_IN the_DT inspections_NNS 84.65_CD only_RB were_VBD found_VBN successful_JJ ._.
The_DT persons_NNS vaccinated_VBN were_VBD chiefly_JJ Mikirs_NNP ,_, but_CC there_EX were_VBD 382_CD Lhota_NNP Nágas_NNP and_CC 80_CD Angámis_NNP ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS in_IN the_DT Khási_NNP Hills_NNP rose_VBD from_IN 1,861_CD to_TO 3,545_CD ._.
Considerable_JJ impetus_NN has_VBZ been_VBN given_VBN to_TO the_DT cause_NN of_IN vaccination_NN among_IN the_DT Khásis_NNP by_IN a_DT serious_JJ outbreak_NN of_IN small-pox_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, the_DT disease_NN having_VBG been_VBN propagated_VBN by_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN inoculation_NN ._.
This_DT visitation_NN has_VBZ opened_VBN the_DT eyes_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS to_TO the_DT risks_NNS attending_VBG inoculation_NN ,_, and_CC disposed_VBD them_PRP to_TO accept_VB the_DT preventive_JJ offered_VBN them_PRP by_IN the_DT Government_NNP ._.
The_DT success_NN attained_VBN in_IN the_DT Gáro_NNP Hills_NNP in_IN 1883-84_JJ continued_JJ during_IN 1884-85_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS has_VBZ risen_VBN from_IN 7,263_CD to_TO 8,683_CD ,_, of_IN which_WDT 8,464_CD ,_, or_CC 97.47_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, are_VBP reported_VBN as_IN successful_JJ ._.
Inspection_NNP work_NN was_VBD efficiently_RB performed_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP McNaught_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ successor_NN Dr._NNP Gupta_NNP ,_, the_DT former_JJ examining_VBG 1,370_CD cases_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 96.35_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
were_VBD considered_VBN successful_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT latter_JJ 533_CD cases_NNS ,_, finding_VBG only_RB 7_CD unsuccessful_JJ ._.
The_DT Officiating_NNP Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP observes_VBZ with_IN satisfaction_NN the_DT favourable_JJ mention_NN of_IN Dr._NNP McNaught_NNP in_IN the_DT Report_NNP ,_, and_CC agrees_VBZ in_IN ascribing_VBG in_IN a_DT large_JJ measure_NN to_TO his_PRP$ exertions_NNS the_DT signal_JJ success_NN of_IN vaccination_NN among_IN the_DT Gáros_NNP ._.
The_DT progress_NN recorded_VBN in_IN Sylhet_NNP has_VBZ fallen_VBN back_RB after_IN the_DT great_JJ advance_NN made_VBN in_IN 1883-84_JJ ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS has_VBZ decreased_VBN from_IN 22,993_CD to_TO 18,818_CD ._.
This_DT backsliding_NN is_VBZ attributed_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Macnamara_NNP to_TO the_DT disadvantages_NNS of_IN working_VBG with_IN a_DT temporary_JJ staff_NN ,_, especially_RB where_WRB the_DT number_NN of_IN men_NNS employed_VBN is_VBZ so_RB large_JJ as_IN in_IN Sylhet_NNP ,_, This_DT is_VBZ a_DT question_NN which_WDT has_VBZ beentouched_VBN on_IN by_IN Dr._NNP Eteson_NNP in_IN paragraphs_NN 36_CD and_CC 37_CD of_IN his_PRP$ Report_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Officiating_NNP Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP will_MD be_VB glad_JJ to_TO consider_VB any_DT proposals_NNS he_PRP may_MD have_VB to_TO make_VB for_IN giving_VBG greater_JJR permanency_NN to_TO the_DT etsablishment_NN ,_, always_RB remem-_JJ bering_NN that_IN the_DT present_JJ is_VBZ not_RB a_DT favourable_JJ time_NN for_IN increased_JJ expenditure_NN of_IN any_DT kind_NN In_IN Cachar_NNP also_RB the_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS fell_VBD from_IN 5,073_CD to_TO 4,757_CD ,_, though_RB three_CD new_JJ local_JJ board_NN vaccinators_NNS were_VBD added_VBN ._.
Here_RB the_DT cause_NN was_VBD the_DT change_NN of_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Dr.Monteath_NNP was_VBD incapacitated_VBN by_IN illness_NN ,_, and_CC Dr._NNP Banarjea_NNP ,_, who_WP held_VBD charge_NN during_IN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, was_VBD confined_VBN to_TO the_DT station_NN by_IN his_PRP$ regimental_JJ duties_NNS ._.
The_DT present_JJ Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Partridge_NNP ,_, must_MD endeavour_VB to_TO show_VB an_DT improve-_JJ ment_NN during_IN the_DT coming_VBG season_NN ._.
Conclusion_NN ._.
17_CD ._.

Plan_NN of_IN the_DT Annual_NNP Report_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT report_NN is_VBZ prepared_VBN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT plan_NN adopted_VBN in_IN previous_JJ years_NNS :_: first_RB ,_, a_DT series_NN of_IN tables_NNS is_VBZ introduced_VBN ,_, showing_VBG the_DT establish-_JJ ment_NN ,_, operations_NNS ,_, expenditure_NN ,_, and_CC general_JJ results_NNS in_IN detail_NN ;_: second_JJ ,_, a_DT review_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN in_IN each_DT district_NN ;_: third_JJ ,_, the_DT general_JJ provincial_JJ statistics_NNS of_IN the_DT season_NN ._.

Sources_NNS from_IN which_WDT supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN is_VBZ obtained_VBN ._.
From_IN England_NNP very_RB good_JJ ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN was_VBD obtained_VBN in_IN the_DT first_JJ instance_NN by_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Com-_NNP missioner_NN of_IN Assam_NNP from_IN England_NNP on_IN indent_NN through_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP with_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.
125tubes_CD were_VBD received_VBN and_CC distributed_VBN to_TO the_DT head-quarters_NNS of_IN each_DT district_NN on_IN the_DT 30th_JJ Sep-_JJ tember_NN ._.
It_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN of_IN exceptionally_RB good_JJ quality_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD favourably_RB mentioned_VBN by_IN all_PDT the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP ,_, except_IN at_IN Shillong_NNP ,_, where_WRB only_RB one_CD tube_NN out_RB often_RB gave_VBD a_DT successful_JJ result_NN ._.
From_IN India_NNP of_IN variable_JJ quality_NN 3_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT season_NN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP also_RB received_VBD periodical_JJ supplies_NNS on_IN theirown_JJ application_NN direct_NN from_IN the_DT vaccine_NN depôts_NN in_IN Dacca_NNP ,_, Darjiling_NNP ,_, Calcutta_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT few_JJ from_IN Almorah_NNP ._.
As_IN usual_JJ ,_, the_DT accounts_NNS differ_VBP widely_RB regarding_VBG the_DT value_NN of_IN these_DT country_NN resources_NNS ._.
Many_JJ were_VBD very_RB good_JJ ,_, but_CC there_EX were_VBD also_RB many_JJ failures_NNS ._.
In_IN particular_JJ ,_, the_DT bovine_NN lymph_NN is_VBZ rarely_RB vital_JJ on_IN reaching_VBG Assam_NNP ._.
It_PRP does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB to_TO be_VB as_IN yet_RB capable_JJ of_IN reproduction_NN after_IN a_DT week_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP fear_VBP this_DT will_MD disqualify_VB its_PRP$ introduction_NN into_IN Manipur_NNP ,_, towards_IN the_DT fulfilment_NN of_IN which_WDT Colonel_NNP J._NNP Johnstone_NNP ,_, the_DT Political_NNP Agent_NNP ,_, took_VBD so_RB much_JJ trouble_NN in_IN 1885_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, superior_JJ to_TO former_JJ years_NNS ._.
4_CD ._.
But_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, there_EX seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN more_JJR pains_NNS taken_VBN to_TO secure_VB whole-_JJ some_DT pure_JJ vaccination_NN at_IN first_JJ ;_: and_CC there_EX have_VBP been_VBN ,_, in_IN Mr._NNP Kennedy_NNP 's_POS words_NNS ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: fewer_JJR complaints_NNS &_CC quot_NN ;_: of_IN the_DT quality_NN than_IN formerly_RB ._.
The_DT complete_JJ directions_NNS on_IN this_DT subject_NN which_WDT were_VBD drawn_VBN up_RP by_IN Mr._NNP McNaught_NNP and_CC published_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP B_NNP to_TO the_DT Report_NNP of_IN last_JJ season_NN ,_, will_MD ,_, if_IN attended_VBN to_TO ,_, go_VB far_RB to_TO remove_VB the_DT serious_JJ objections_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN in_IN past_JJ years_NNS to_TO bad_JJ lymph_NN ._.

co-operation_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS by_IN a_DT direct_JJ appeal_NN to_TO their_PRP$ affections_NNS and_CC family_NN interests_NNS ,_, rather_RB than_IN to_TO force_VB on_IN them_PRP any_DT system_NN which_WDT is_VBZ attended_VBN with_IN local_JJ distress_NN and_CC followed_VBN by_IN inadequate_JJ benefits_NNS ._.
Improved_VBN quality_NN of_IN vaccination_NN resulting_VBG ._.
7_CD ._.
This_DT higher_JJR standard_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB attained_VBN without_IN constant_JJ care_NN and_CC thoroughinspection_NN ._.
The_DT men_NNS selected_VBN for_IN this_DT superior_JJ grade_NN should_MD be_VB reliable_JJ ,_, hard-working_JJ ,_, and_CC capable_JJ ;_: those_DT who_WP are_VBP merely_RB plausible_JJ and_CC superficial_JJ must_MD be_VB dismissed_VBN ._.
It_PRP too_RB often_RB happens_VBZ that_IN old_JJ vaccinators_NNS are_VBP promoted_VBN on_IN the_DT grounds_NNS of_IN past_JJ efficient_JJ service_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT real_JJ test_NN should_MD be_VB their_PRP$ present_JJ ,_, not_RB their_PRP$ past_NN ,_, fitness_NN ._.
Additional_JJ inspection_NN in_IN South_NNP Sylhet_NNP yet_RB necessary_JJ ._.
Where_WRB licensed_VBN vaccinators_NNS are_VBP being_VBG employed_VBN anew_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
In_IN Sylhet_NNP there_EX is_VBZ ample_JJ space_NN and_CC work_NN for_IN a_DT third_JJ native_JJ inspector_NN ,_, who_WP musthave_VB his_PRP$ head-quarters_NNS at_IN Habiganj_NNP ._.
The_DT Local_NNP Board_NNP have_VBP this_DT season_NN re-opened_VBD on_IN trial_NN the_DT system_NN of_IN licensed_JJ vacci-_JJ nators_NNS ;_: men_NNS who_WP are_VBP paid_VBN by_IN fees_NNS on_IN successful_JJ results_NNS ,_, and_CC who_WP are_VBP under_IN no_DT efficient_JJ inspection_NN ._.
This_DT system_NN is_VBZ to_TO go_VB backwards_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT result_NN will_MD be_VB figures_NNS only_RB ,_, and_CC not_RB protection_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN pointed_VBN out_RP in_IN past_JJ annual_JJ reports_NNS that_IN vaccination_NN so_RB performedis_RB pernicious_JJ ,_, and_CC brings_NNS good_JJ work_NN elsewhere_RB in_IN disrepute_NN ._.
If_IN a_DT native_JJ inspector_NN is_VBZ sanctioned_VBN for_IN South_NNP Sylhet_NNP and_CC located_VBN at_IN Habiganj_NNP ,_, there_EX will_MD be_VB no_DT objection_NN to_TO a_DT limited_JJ number_NN of_IN licensed_JJ vaccinators_NNS working_VBG within_IN his_PRP$ beat_NN ,_, under_IN his_PRP$ orders_NNS ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT terms_NNS of_IN private_JJ remuneration_NN which_WDT obtain_VB in_IN Goálpára_NNP and_CC Kámrúp_NNP ;_: but_CC ,_, except_IN under_IN such_JJ conditions_NNS ,_, the_DT re-employment_NN of_IN these_DT men_NNS should_MD be_VB prohibited_VBN ._.
A_DT native_JJ Inspector_NN is_VBZ also_RB wanted_VBN in_IN Lakhimpur_NNP ._.
9_CD ._.

From_IN Statement_NNP II_NNP ._.
of_IN the_DT district_NN report_NN it_PRP is_VBZ clear_JJ that_IN all_PDT the_DT operators_NNS worked_VBD with_IN energy_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN Hailákándi_NNP sub-division_NN the_DT average_NN is_VBZ excellent_JJ ._.

of_IN 1880_CD ._.

GENERAL_NNP REMARKS_NNP ._.

134_CD ._.
There_EX would_MD seem_VB to_TO be_VB little_JJ doubt_NN but_CC that_DT inoculation_NN is_VBZ losing_VBG ground_NN in_IN Assam_NNP ._.

The_DT professional_JJ inoculators_NNS are_VBP mostly_RB Bengali_NNP immigrants_NNS ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ time_NN of_IN business_NN corresponds_NNS very_RB nearly_RB to_TO the_DT busiest_JJS time_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS ._.

In_IN South_NNP Sylhet_NNP ,_, the_DT Local_NNP Board_NNP employed_VBD unofficially_RB two_CD or_CC three_CD ex-inoculators_NNS and_CC paid_VBD them_PRP by_IN results_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, 3_CD annas_NNS each_DT the_DT first_JJ hundred_VBD and_CC 2_CD annas_NNS each_DT in_IN excess_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Resolution_NNP of_IN the_DT Honourable_NNP the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP on_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP Vaccination_NNP Report_NNP for_IN 1884-85_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ noticed_VBN that_IN in_IN Dera_NNP Ismail_NNP Khan_NNP &_CC quot_NN ;_: an_DT effort_NN is_VBZ being_VBG made_VBN to_TO extend_VB vaccination_NN by_IN the_DT entertainment_NN of_IN local_JJ vaccinators_NNS instead_RB of_IN outsiders_NNS ,_, who_WP are_VBP to_TO be_VB paid_VBN by_IN results_NNS at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN one_CD anna_NN for_IN each_DT successful_JJ operation_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT small_JJ reward_NN of_IN 2_CD to_TO 4_CD pies_NNS to_TO each_DT mother_NN from_IN whose_WP$ child_JJ lymph_NN may_MD be_VB taken._JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: There_EX seems_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, to_TO be_VB no_DT lack_NN of_IN customers_NNS in_IN Goálpára_NNP ,_, who_WP pay_VBP the_DT local_JJ men_NNS at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN 2_CD annas_NNS ,_, instead_RB of_IN being_VBG paid_VBN one_CD anna_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, where_WRB the_DT population_NN is_VBZ fairly_RB plentiful_JJ and_CC transit_JJ easy_JJ ,_, as_IN in_IN South_NNP Sylhet_NNP ,_, this_DT system_NN should_MD at_IN least_JJS be_VB tried_VBN in_IN the_DT beginning_NN ,_, Progress_NNP in_IN the_DT feelings_NNS of_IN the_DT natives_NNS owards_NNS vaccination_NN ._.
135_CD ._.
The_DT district_NN reports_NNS touch_RB slightly_RB on_IN the_DT feeling_NN of_IN the_DT natives_NNS regarding_VBG vaccination_NN ._.
&_CC quot_NN ;_: 'In_CC general_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ passive_JJ acquiescence_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, as_IN heretofore_NN ,_, accepted_VBD more_RBR or_CC less_JJR unwillingly_RB ._.

136_CD ._.

APPENDIX_NNP B_NNP ._.
MEMORANDUM_NNP OF_NNP DUTIES_NNP REQUIRED_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INSPECTOR_NNP OF_NNP VACCINATION_NNP ._.
To_TO be_VB constantly_RB visiting_VBG the_DT areas_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN turn_NN ._.
To_TO inspect_VB the_DT vaccination_NN work_NN done_VBN in_IN each_DT area_NN in_IN respect_NN to_TO the_DT vesicle_NN or_CC scar_NN ,_, the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT children_NNS from_IN whom_WP the_DT lymph_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN ,_, the_DT manner_NN of_IN storing_VBG or_CC conveying_VBG the_DT lymph_NN to_TO other_JJ villages_NNS ._.
To_TO test_VB the_DT accuracy_NN or_CC otherwise_NN of_IN the_DT registers_NNS ,_, diary_JJ ,_, and_CC returns_NNS of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS ,_, noting_VBG on_IN the_DT registers_NNS and_CC village_NN vaccination_NN rolls_VBZ the_DT date_NN of_IN his_PRP$ inspection_NN ,_, number_NN seen_VBN ,_, how_WRB many_JJ success-_JJ ful_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, and_CC to_TO note_VB opposite_JJ each_DT name_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN vaccination_NN roll_VBD the_DT number_NN of_IN successful_JJ marks_NNS ,_, failure_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, failure_NN being_VBG at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN remedied_VBN if_IN possible_JJ ._.
REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP ASSAM_NNP ._.
29_CD To_TO examine_VB the_DT instruments_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, in_IN possession_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS ,_, and_CC report_VB their_PRP$ condition_NN by_IN entry_NN in_IN his_PRP$ diary_NN ._.
To_TO examine_VB the_DT vaccinator_NN as_IN to_TO his_PRP$ acquaintance_NN and_CC compliance_NN with_IN the_DT procedure_NN laid_VBD down_RB in_IN the_DT rules_NNS for_IN performing_VBG vaccination_NN and_CC to_TO instruct_VB him_PRP when_WRB deficient_NN ._.
He_PRP should_MD ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, see_VB the_DT vaccinator_NN perform_NN vaccination_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN any_DT error_NN may_MD be_VB corrected_VBN ._.
He_PRP should_MD encourage_VB him_PRP to_TO to_TO careful_VB and_CC good_JJ work_NN ._.
To_TO vaccinate_VB as_IN many_JJ himself_PRP as_IN can_MD conveniently_RB be_VB done_VBN ,_, and_CC show_VB the_DT vaccinator_NN the_DT proper_JJ procedure_NN ._.
To_TO explain_VB the_DT nature_NN of_IN vaccination_NN and_CC its_PRP$ many_JJ advantages_NNS to_TO the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC encourage_VB them_PRP to_TO accept_VB it_PRP ._.
To_TO keep_VB up_RP and_CC submit_VB to_TO the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP a_DT half-monthly_JJ diary_NN ._.
This_DT should_MD be_VB carefully_RB filled_VBN lp_NN and_CC he_PRP should_MD clearly_RB note_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN successful_JJ vaccinations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN each_DT vaccinator_NN separately_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN those_DT seen_VBN by_IN himself_PRP ._.
He_PRP should_MD be_VB provided_VBN with_IN vaccine_JJ instruments_NNS ,_, registers_NNS and_CC forms_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT supply_NN of_IN good_JJ lymph_NN ._.
He_PRP should_MD at_IN once_RB remedy_JJ any_DT defect_NN found_VBN in_IN the_DT quality_NN of_IN lymph_NN or_CC in_IN the_DT vaccine_NN operation_NN generally_RB ._.
He_PRP should_MD keep_VB a_DT separate_JJ list_NN of_IN persons_NNS in_IN each_DT mauza_NN who_WP refuse_VBP vaccination_NN ,_, their_PRP$ village_NN ,_, Gosain_NNP ,_, caste_NN ,_, and_CC reason_NN for_IN refusing_VBG also_RB being_VBG clearly_RB stated_VBN ,_, and_CC submit_VB it_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ diary_NN ._.
[_JJ NLS_NNP note_NN :_: a_DT graphic_JJ appears_VBZ here_RB -_: see_VBP image_NN of_IN page_NN ]_NN F_NNP Resolution_NNP on_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Report_NNP for_IN 1885-86_JJ ._.

4,830_CD ,_, dated_VBN Shillong_NNP ,_, the_DT 19th_CD August_NNP 1886_CD ._.
READ_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) extension_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN Sibságar_NNP is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT exertions_NNS of_IN Dr._NNP Atkins_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ unfortunately_RB been_VBN transferred_VBN from_IN the_DT province_NN since_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
In_IN Nowgong_NNP ,_, the_DT reason_NN alleged_VBD for_IN the_DT decrease_NN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT ground_NN open_JJ to_TO vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN ,_, worked_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC only_RB the_DT exclusive_JJ castes_NNS remain_VBP ,_, who_WP obey_VBD the_DT dictates_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ Gohains_NNS in_IN refusing_VBG vaccination_NN ;_: but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ too_RB early_JJ yet_RB to_TO fall_VB back_RB upon_IN an_DT excuse_NN of_IN this_DT kind_NN ._.
It_PRP may_MD possibly_RB have_VB some_DT force_NN in_IN the_DT Gáro_NNP Hills_NNP ,_, with_IN their_PRP$ small_JJ population_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT protection_NN afforded_VBD is_VBZ already_RB so_RB effective_JJ that_IN there_EX were_VBD no_DT deaths_NNS from_IN small-_JJ pox_NN in_IN 1885-86_JJ ,_, and_CC only_RB one_CD outbreak_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD stopped_VBN at_IN once_RB by_IN a_DT vaccinator_NN going_VBG out_IN and_CC vaccinating_VBG the_DT whole_JJ village_NN ._.
The_DT decrease_NN in_IN Goálpára_NNP is_VBZ not_RB explained_VBN ._.
If_IN following_VBG the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN the_DT Census_NNP Report_NNP of_IN 1881_CD we_PRP assume_VBP that_DT population_NN increases_VBZ yearly_RB at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN 3_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
in_IN Cachar_NNP and_CC Lakhimpur_NNP ,_, at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN 2_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
in_IN Sibságar_NNP and_CC Nowgong_NNP ,_, and_CC at_IN 1½_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
elsewhere_RB ,_, then_RB the_DT following_VBG table_NN shows_NNS in_IN round_NN numbers_NNS the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS necessary_JJ in_IN order_NN to_TO keep_VB pace_NN with_IN the_DT growth_NN of_IN population_NN :_: (_( 3_CD )_) percentage_NN (_( 97.8_CD )_) ,_, that_WDT raises_VBZ the_DT general_JJ average_NN in_IN inspectors_NNS '_POS cases_NNS above_IN that_DT of_IN cases_NNS inspected_VBN by_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP ._.
The_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP is_VBZ glad_JJ to_TO find_VB that_IN the_DT tendency_NN to_TO overestimate_VB the_DT success_NN of_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ not_RB universal_JJ among_IN native_JJ inspectors_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Eteson_NNP comments_NNS on_IN the_DT great_JJ variety_NN exhibited_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ estimates_NNS ._.
It_PRP ought_MD to_TO be_VB possible_JJ for_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP to_TO teach_VB these_DT men_NNS some_DT few_JJ plain_NN rules_NNS to_TO regulate_VB their_PRP$ judgment_NN ._.
The_DT Sibságar_NNP ,_, Goálpára_NNP ,_, and_CC Sylhet_NNP figures_NNS seem_VBP to_TO show_VB that_IN inspectors_NNS are_VBP ready_JJ enough_RB to_TO take_VB the_DT cue_NN from_IN their_PRP$ official_JJ superiors_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO follow_VB any_DT standard_NN which_WDT the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP himself_PRP adopts_NNS ._.
Cases_NNS inspected_VBN by_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNPS were_VBD not_RB only_RB somewhat_RB more_RBR numerous_JJ than_IN last_JJ year_NN (_( 15,336_CD against_IN 14,788_CD )_) ,_, but_CC they_PRP were_VBD far_RB better_RBR distributed_VBN ,_, every_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP in_IN the_DT province_NN taking_VBG a_DT fair_JJ share_NN in_IN the_DT work_NN ,_, except_IN in_IN Lakhimpur_NNP ,_, where_WRB Dr._NNP Whitwell_NNP is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB had_VBN much_JJ of_IN his_PRP$ time_NN taken_VBN up_RP in_IN reading_VBG for_IN his_PRP$ examination_NN in_IN Assamese_NNP ._.
Last_JJ year_NN two-fifths_NNS of_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP '_POS inspections_NNS were_VBD due_JJ to_TO the_DT single_JJ district_NN of_IN Goálpára_NNP ._.
Cases_NNS tested_VBN by_IN native_JJ inspectors_NNS nearly_RB doubled_VBD their_PRP$ numbers_NNS (_( 43,558_CD against_IN 22,225_CD in_IN 1884-85_JJ )_) ,_, but_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN inspectors_NNS themselves_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN increased_VBN from_IN 5_CD to_TO 8_CD by_IN adding_VBG men_NNS in_IN Tezpur_NNP ,_, Sibságar_NNP ,_, and_CC Silchar_NNP ._.
There_EX is_VBZ now_RB an_DT inspector_NN in_IN every_DT plains_NNS district_NN ,_, except_IN Sylhet_NNP ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ two_CD ,_, and_CC Lakhimpur_NNP ,_, where_WRB none_NN has_VBZ yet_RB been_VBN provided_VBN ._.
The_DT Nowgong_NNP man_NN did_VBD less_JJR inspection_NN work_NN than_IN last_JJ year_NN :_: elsewhere_RB the_DT old_JJ inspectors_NNS bettered_VBD their_PRP$ record_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT three_CD new_JJ men_NNS show_VBP a_DT fair_JJ average_NN ._.
Sylhet_NNP is_VBZ the_DT district_NN where_WRB the_DT average_JJ stands_VBZ highest_JJS ,_, the_DT two_CD inspectors_NNS having_VBG tested_VBN 16,866_CD cases_NNS between_IN them_PRP ._.
Goálpára_NNP and_CC Kámrúp_NNP come_VBP next_JJ ._.
The_DT comparative_JJ density_NN of_IN population_NN is_VBZ probably_RB the_DT main_JJ cause_NN of_IN these_DT differences_NNS ._.
Vaccination_NNP staff_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT departmental_JJ staff_NN of_IN all_DT kinds_NNS in_IN each_DT district_NN during_IN 1885-86_JJ has_VBZ been_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: (_( 4_CD )_) Provincial_JJ vaccinators_NNS ._.

In_IN Goálpára_NNP ,_, the_DT licensed_JJ vaccinators_NNS are_VBP no_DT less_RBR carefully_RB supervised_VBN than_IN the_DT regular_JJ paid_NN vaccinators_NNS ,_, but_CC there_RB still_RB seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB a_DT want_NN of_IN proper_JJ supervision_NN in_IN Kámrúp_NNP ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT point_NN which_WDT should_MD be_VB pressed_VBN upon_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP 's_POS attention_NN ._.
During_IN 1885-86_JJ ,_, 4_CD new_JJ men_NNS in_IN Barpeta_NNP were_VBD added_VBN by_IN the_DT local_JJ board_NN ,_, notwithstanding_VBG the_DT injunctions_NNS which_WDT have_VBP repeatedly_RB been_VBN given_VBN against_IN any_DT addition_NN to_TO this_DT class_NN of_IN vaccina-_JJ tors_NNS in_IN Kámrúp_NNP without_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP 's_POS consent_NN ._.
The_DT attention_NN of_IN the_DT Deputy-Commissioner_NNP will_MD be_VB drawn_VBN to_TO the_DT remarks_NNS on_IN this_DT subject_NN in_IN paragraph_NN 45_CD of_IN Dr._NNP Eteson_NNP 's_POS report_NN ,_, and_CC timely_JJ notice_NN should_MD be_VB given_VBN of_IN any_DT future_JJ action_NN of_IN this_DT kind_NN contemplated_VBN by_IN a_DT local_JJ board_NN ._.
The_DT extremely_RB poor_JJ work_NN done_VBN by_IN these_DT four_CD Barpeta_NNP men_NNS is_VBZ in_IN itself_PRP the_DT strongest_JJS proof_NN that_IN supervision_NN ought_MD to_TO be_VB stricter_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP certain_JJ undeniable_JJ advantages_NNS in_IN employing_VBG this_DT class_NN of_IN operators_NNS ,_, under_IN proper_JJ guarantees_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Dobson_NNP in_IN Goálpára_NNP finds_VBZ them_PRP much_RB more_RBR efficient_JJ than_IN the_DT local_JJ board_NN vaccinators_NNS ,_, being_VBG at_IN once_RB keener_NN for_IN work_NN (_( they_PRP are_VBP paid_VBN according_VBG to_TO the_DT number_NN of_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS )_) and_CC possessed_VBN of_IN that_DT local_JJ interest_NN and_CC influence_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT paid_NN hands_NNS are_VBP generally_RB deficient_JJ ._.
But_CC all_DT this_DT is_VBZ in_IN a_DT great_JJ measure_NN the_DT result_NN of_IN a_DT strict_JJ and_CC regular_JJ system_NN of_IN supervision_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN must_MD now_RB be_VB introduced_VBN into_IN Kámrúp_NNP ._.
It_PRP will_MD never_RB do_VB to_TO depend_VB for_IN one-half_JJ the_DT vaccination_NN of_IN the_DT district_NN upon_IN men_NNS whose_WP$ work_NN is_VBZ never_RB tested_VBN ,_, and_CC can_MD not_RB be_VB trusted_VBN ._.
Next_JJ year_NN 's_POS report_NN should_MD show_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN licensed_JJ vaccinators_NNS '_POS operations_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN tested_VBN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP and_CC by_IN the_DT Inspector_NNP ._.
A_DT larger_JJR individual_JJ average_NN of_IN work_NN must_MD be_VB got_VBN out_IN of_IN these_DT men_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP may_MD ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, be_VB worth_JJ considering_VBG whether_IN a_DT special_JJ inspector_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB entertained_VBN to_TO look_VB after_IN this_DT army_NN of_IN licensed_JJ vaccinators_NNS ,_, or_CC ex-inoculators_NNS ,_, as_IN in_IN this_DT district_NN they_PRP better_VBP deserve_VB to_TO be_VB called_VBN ._.
Supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN ._.
11_CD ._.
The_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP procured_VBD 125_CD tubes_NNS of_IN lymph_NN from_IN England_NNP ,_, and_CC distributed_VBD them_PRP ,_, at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN ten_NN to_TO a_DT district_NN ,_, before_IN the_DT season_NN began_VBD ._.
They_PRP generally_RB proved_VBD very_RB good_JJ ._.
Lymph_NNP was_VBD also_RB indented_VBN for_IN directly_RB by_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP from_IN the_DT depôts_NN at_IN Dacca_NNP ,_, Calcutta_NNP ,_, Darjiling_NNP ,_, and_CC Almora_NNP ,_, and_CC turned_VBD out_RP to_TO be_VB of_IN variable_JJ quality_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, the_DT English_NNP lymph_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB decidedly_RB superior_JJ ._.
The_DT only_JJ exceptions_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN Cachar_NNP ,_, where_WRB six_CD of_IN the_DT ten_JJ tubes_NNS were_VBD failures_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN Shillong_NNP ,_, where_WRB ,_, for_IN some_DT unexplained_JJ reason_NN ,_, all_PDT the_DT ten_NN proved_VBD useless_JJ ._.
This_DT is_VBZ particularly_RB provoking_JJ ,_, because_IN vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT Khási_NNP Hills_NNP ,_, after_IN a_DT long_JJ and_CC seemingly_RB hopeless_JJ struggle_NN with_IN the_DT conservative_JJ prejudices_NNS of_IN this_DT very_RB obstinate_JJ hill_NN people_NNS ,_, has_VBZ suddenly_RB taken_VBN a_DT great_JJ start_NN within_IN the_DT last_JJ two_CD years_NNS ._.
The_DT average_JJ number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS among_IN the_DT Khásis_NNP used_VBD to_TO be_VB about_IN 1,800_CD annually_RB ;_: in_IN 1884-85_CD the_DT number_NN rose_VBD to_TO 3,659_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN 1885-86_JJ to_TO 4,279_CD ._.
Two_CD successive_JJ outbreaks_NNS of_IN small-_JJ pox_NN in_IN these_DT two_CD years_NNS have_VBP apparently_RB frightened_VBN the_DT Khásis_NNP out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ superstitions_NNS fof_VBP the_DT time_NN being_VBG ._.
Further_JJ progress_NN may_MD be_VB hoped_VBN for_IN ;_: but_CC the_DT first_JJ condition_NN is_VBZ that_IN vacci-_JJ nation_NN should_MD be_VB effectual_JJ ,_, i.e._FW ,_, that_IN the_DT operators_NNS should_MD have_VB good_JJ lymph_NN to_TO work_VB with_IN ._.

1_CD ._.
There_EX has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT change_NN introduced_VBD during_IN the_DT year_NN either_RB in_IN the_DT sources_NNS of_IN lymph_NN or_CC in_IN the_DT class_NN of_IN operators_NNS ._.

Sources_NNS of_IN lymph_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD 150_CD tubes_NNS of_IN English_NNP lymph_NN received_VBD through_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Com-_NNP missioner_NN with_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP on_IN the_DT 28th_CD Sep-_JJ tember_NN 1886_CD ,_, and_CC distributed_VBD without_IN delay_NN in_IN proportion_NN to_TO the_DT size_NN of_IN each_DT district_NN ._.
With_IN this_DT first_JJ stock_NN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP began_VBD local_JJ production_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT was_VBD supplemented_VBN all_DT through_IN the_DT season_NN by_IN periodical_JJ supplies_NNS from_IN the_DT depots_NNS in_IN Dacca_NNP ,_, Darjiling_NNP ,_, Calcutta_NNP ,_, and_CC Almora_NNP ._.
Quality_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
Very_RB especial_JJ pains_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN taken_VBN of_IN late_JJ years_NNS to_TO secure_VB the_DT purity_NN and_CC genuineness_NN of_IN the_DT vaccine_NN medium_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD recognized_VBN that_IN ,_, naturally_RB ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT main_JJ difficulties_NNS in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN winning_VBG the_DT people_NNS 's_POS confidence_NN would_MD gradually_RB disappear_VB if_IN the_DT absolute_NN protective_JJ quality_NN of_IN vaccination_NN was_VBD fairly_RB established_VBN ,_, that_IN in_IN order_NN to_TO secure_VB this_DT the_DT utmost_JJ care_NN must_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO establish_VB healthy_JJ vaccination_NN only_RB ,_, regardless_RB of_IN figures_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO support_VB it_PRP by_IN adequate_JJ inspection_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ as_IN yet_RB to_TO say_VB that_IN any_DT material_JJ results_NNS have_VBP affected_VBN the_DT Provincial_NNP population_NN at_IN large_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN mortality_NN from_IN small-pox_JJ have_VBP now_RB been_VBN unusually_RB small_JJ for_IN the_DT last_JJ three_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ frequent_JJ mention_NN in_IN the_DT district_NN reports_NNS that_IN the_DT confidence_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS is_VBZ being_VBG slowly_RB gained_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN many_JJ places_NNS there_EX would_MD be_VB no_DT difficulty_NN in_IN extending_VBG the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN Act_NNP V._NNP of_IN 1880_CD to_TO the_DT general_JJ population_NN ._.

4_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT 121,900_CD operations_NNS only_RB 571_CD were_VBD re-vaccinations_NNS ._.

9_CD ._.
The_DT year_NN was_VBD remarkably_RB free_JJ from_IN small-pox_JJ ,_, from_IN which_WDT disease_NN only_RB 564_CD deaths_NNS were_VBD recorded_VBN in_IN 1886_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Eteson_NNP states_VBZ that_IN in_IN his_PRP$ opinion_NN the_DT climate_NN of_IN Assam_NNP is_VBZ inimical_JJ to_TO this_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB possible_JJ ,_, by_IN prohibiting_VBG inoculation_NN by_IN law_NN and_CC giving_VBG a_DT free_JJ course_NN to_TO vaccina-_JJ tion_NN ,_, altogether_RB to_TO stamp_VB it_PRP out_IN of_IN the_DT Province_NNP ._.
Several_JJ Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNS have_VBP recorded_VBN statistics_NNS of_IN the_DT proportion_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS coming_VBG under_IN their_PRP$ observation_NN who_WP were_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB inoculated_VBN ,_, protected_VBN by_IN having_VBG had_VBD small-pox_JJ ,_, and_CC vaccinated_VBD ._.
At_IN Nowgong_NNP Dr._NNP McNaught_NNP found_VBD ,_, among_IN 1,396_CD patients_NNS at_IN the_DT dispensary_NN ,_, 501_CD who_WP had_VBD been_VBN inoculated_VBN ,_, 798_CD who_WP had_VBD had_VBN small-pox_NN ,_, and_CC only_RB 65_CD who_WP had_VBD been_VBN vaccinated_VBN ._.
At_IN Silchar_NNP Dr._NNP Partridge_NNP found_VBD ,_, out_IN of_IN 971_CD persons_NNS ,_, chiefly_NN schoolboys_NNS ,_, 487_CD who_WP had_VBD been_VBN inoculated_VBN ,_, 242_CD who_WP had_VBD been_VBN vaccinated_VBN ,_, 130_CD who_WP had_VBD had_VBN small-pox_NN ,_, and_CC 112_CD who_WP were_VBD unprotected_VBN ._.
These_DT observations_NNS should_MD be_VB continued_VBN ._.
The_DT large_JJ proportion_NN at_IN Nowgong_NNP who_WP had_VBD had_VBN small-_JJ pox_NNS hardly_RB bears_VBZ out_RP Dr._NNP Eteson_NNP 's_POS theory_NN that_IN the_DT climate_NN of_IN the_DT Province_NNP is_VBZ hostile_JJ to_TO the_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT extensive_JJ use_NN of_IN inoculation_NN proved_VBN by_IN these_DT statistics_NNS at_IN least_JJS shows_NNS that_IN the_DT people_NNS recognise_VBP small-pox_JJ as_IN a_DT danger_NN which_WDT requires_VBZ to_TO be_VB combated_VBN ._.
The_DT ages_NNS of_IN the_DT persons_NNS examined_VBD at_IN Nowgong_NNP are_VBP not_RB stated_VBN ;_: the_DT extensive_JJ spread_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, as_IN shown_VBN by_IN Statement_NNP IV_NNP ._.
appended_VBN to_TO the_DT report_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT matter_NN of_IN very_RB recent_JJ date_NN ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ effects_NNS can_MD hardly_RB yet_RB be_VB visible_JJ among_IN adults_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Eteson_NNP gives_VBZ reasons_NNS for_IN thinking_VBG that_DT inoculation_NN is_VBZ really_RB giving_VBG way_NN in_IN Assam_NNP before_IN vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Chief_NNP Com-_NNP missioner_NN hopes_VBZ that_IN this_DT may_MD be_VB the_DT case_NN ._.
The_DT religious_JJ objections_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, to_TO vaccination_NN entertained_VBN by_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT Gosains_NNP of_IN Upper_NNP Assam_NNP ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT Mahapurushiya_NNP sect_NN who_WP are_VBP numerous_JJ in_IN Kámrúp_NNP ,_, are_VBP still_RB far_RB from_IN being_VBG removed_VBN ._.

92S._CD ,_, dated_VBN Shillong_NNP ,_, the_DT 20th_CD February_NNP 1888_CD ,_, I_PRP reported_VBD that_IN no_DT advantage_NN corresponding_VBG to_TO the_DT additional_JJ expense_NN and_CC uncertainty_NN was_VBD likely_JJ to_TO result_VB ._.

It_PRP would_MD never_RB do_VB to_TO substitute_VB inefficient_JJ operations_NNS ._.

(_( 13_CD )_) A_DT ._.
(_( 14_CD )_) COMPARATIVE_NNP STATEMENT_NNP No_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._.
(_( 15_CD )_) APPENDIX_NNP A._NN Vaccination_NNP in_IN Tea-Gardens_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP has_VBZ the_DT medical_JJ charge_NN of_IN several_JJ tea-gardens_NNS in_IN this_DT district_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP received_VBN a_DT letter_NN from_IN him_PRP ,_, under_IN date_NN the_DT 7th_CD May_NNP ,_, explaining_VBG why_WRB so_RB little_JJ vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN performed_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ gardens_NNS during_IN the_DT past_JJ season_NN ._.
He_PRP states_VBZ that_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP has_VBZ a_DT staff_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN these_DT men_NNS are_VBP sent_VBN to_TO some_DT gardens_NNS and_CC not_RB to_TO others_NNS ;_: and_CC Dr._NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP further_RBR complains_NNS of_IN the_DT non-receipt_NN of_IN vaccine_NN lymph_NN ,_, and_CC desires_VBZ to_TO know_VB if_IN he_PRP should_MD undertake_VB the_DT responsibility_NN of_IN vaccination_NN work_NN in_IN all_DT gardens_NNS of_IN which_WDT he_PRP is_VBZ in_IN medical_JJ charge_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Dr._NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP is_VBZ wrong_JJ in_IN thinking_VBG that_DT Government_NNP supply_NN vaccinators_NNS for_IN tea-gardens_NNS ._.
The_DT vaccinators_NNS employed_VBN under_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP are_VBP intended_VBN for_IN the_DT general_JJ public_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB for_IN tea-_JJ gardens_NNS ._.
By_IN the_DT rules_NNS framed_VBN by_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP under_IN Act_NNP I._NNP of_IN 1882_CD ,_, the_DT duty_NN of_IN seeing_VBG that_IN all_DT children_NNS and_CC other_JJ unprotected_JJ persons_NNS in_IN gardens_NNS are_VBP properly_RB vaccinated_VBN rests_NNS with_IN the_DT manager_NN of_IN the_DT garden_NN ._.
Each_DT garden_NN must_MD employ_VB its_PRP$ own_JJ Native_NNP Doctor_NNP ,_, or_CC make_VB its_PRP$ own_JJ arrange-_JJ ments_NNS ._.
All_PDT that_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN of_IN a_DT garden_NN can_MD expect_VB is_VBZ a_DT supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN this_DT he_PRP should_MD indent_VB early_JJ in_IN the_DT season_NN ,_, in_IN fact_NN ,_, before_IN the_DT vaccination_NN season_NN begins_VBZ ,_, say_VBP ,_, in_IN September_NNP ;_: the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP will_MD then_RB send_VB the_DT lymph_NN as_RB early_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT indents_NNS he_PRP receives_VBZ and_CC the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN each_DT garden_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
Each_DT Government_NNP vaccinator_NN has_VBZ a_DT circle_NN allotted_VBN to_TO him_PRP ;_: if_IN a_DT garden_NN for_IN any_DT special_JJ reason_NN requires_VBZ outside_JJ aid_NN ,_, application_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN to_TO the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, and_CC he_PRP will_MD endeavour_VB to_TO cause_VB the_DT vaccinator_NN of_IN the_DT circle_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT garden_NN is_VBZ situated_VBN to_TO tender_VB his_PRP$ services_NNS to_TO the_DT manager_NN ;_: but_CC this_DT will_MD not_RB relieve_VB the_DT management_NN of_IN the_DT duty_NN of_IN causing_VBG vaccination_NN to_TO be_VB performed_VBN thorough-_JJ ly_NN and_CC efficiently_RB ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP is_VBZ the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP for_IN the_DT whole_JJ district_NN ,_, including_VBG gardens_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ his_PRP$ duty_NN to_TO see_VB that_DT vaccination_NN in_IN gardens_NNS is_VBZ being_VBG performed_VBN ,_, and_CC to_TO inspect_VB cases_NNS ;_: but_CC in_IN gardens_NNS where_WRB there_EX is_VBZ a_DT European_JJ Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP would_MD naturally_RB leave_VB the_DT supervision_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS to_TO that_DT officer_NN ,_, and_CC look_VB to_TO him_PRP for_IN a_DT report_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT best_JJS plan_NN would_MD be_VB for_IN Dr._NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP to_TO send_VB in_IN about_IN September_NNP a_DT list_NN of_IN gardens_NNS under_IN his_PRP$ care_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN an_DT indent_NN for_IN the_DT lymph_NN he_PRP may_MD need_VB for_IN those_DT gardens_NNS ;_: at_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT vaccination_NN season_NN the_DT necessary_JJ forms_NNS will_MD be_VB sent_VBN to_TO him_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP will_MD be_VB asked_VBN to_TO fill_VB them_PRP up_RP for_IN the_DT gardens_NNS on_IN his_PRP$ list_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO send_VB the_DT returns_NNS to_TO the_DT Deputy-Commissioner_NNP or_CC direct_JJ to_TO the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP with_IN any_DT explanatory_JJ remarks_NNS he_PRP may_MD think_VB necessary_JJ ._.
6_CD ._.
Similarly_RB ,_, managers_NNS of_IN gardens_NNS which_WDT do_VBP not_RB employ_VB the_DT services_NNS of_IN a_DT European_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP should_MD ,_, in_IN September_NNP ,_, indent_JJ direct_NN on_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP for_IN lymph_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT season_NN apply_NN for_IN and_CC obtain_VB printed_JJ forms_NNS ,_, which_WDT they_PRP should_MD fill_VB in_IN and_CC forward_RB to_TO the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ._.
With_IN few_JJ exceptions_NNS ,_, every_DT garden_NN has_VBZ a_DT Native_NNP Doctor_NNP ,_, and_CC with_IN a_DT proper_JJ supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN ,_, there_EX should_MD be_VB no_DT difficulty_NN in_IN carrying_VBG out_RP the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN the_DT law_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO Garden_NNP Vaccination_NNP ._.

13,356_CD ,_, against_IN Rs_NNP ._.

9_CD ._.
In_IN his_PRP$ concluding_VBG paragraph_NN Dr._NNP Eteson_NNP notices_VBZ a_DT suggestion_NN made_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP regarding_VBG the_DT use_NN of_IN buffalo_NN lymph_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN employed_VBN with_IN success_NN in_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT use_NN of_IN other_JJ lymph_NN is_VBZ objected_VBN to_TO ._.
The_DT Deputy-_NNP Surgeon-General_NNP has_VBZ already_RB reported_VBN on_IN the_DT subject_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP fears_VBZ that_IN ,_, for_IN the_DT reasons_NNS now_RB stated_VBN ,_, the_DT suggestion_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB usefully_RB adopted_VBN in_IN Assam_NNP ._.

Lymph_NNP supply_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Two_CD hundred_VBD tubes_NNS of_IN lymph_NN were_VBD received_VBN from_IN England_NNP and_CC distributed_VBN to_TO all_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP about_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN September_NNP 1888_CD ._.
The_DT results_NNS from_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN this_DT supply_NN were_VBD reported_VBN as_IN very_RB good_JJ and_CC generally_RB successful_JJ ._.
Tube_NNP lymph_NN produced_VBN in_IN India_NNP was_VBD as_IN a_DT rule_NN obtained_VBN direct_JJ by_IN most_JJS of_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP from_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Bengal_NNP ,_, and_CC Deputy-Sanitary-_NNP Commissioners_NNP ,_, Dacca_NNP and_CC Darjiling_NNP Circles_NNP ._.

10_CD ._.
At_IN present_JJ the_DT municipality_NN does_VBZ not_RB contribute_VB anything_NN for_IN vaccination_NN work_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
A_DT vaccinator_NN used_VBN to_TO be_VB entertained_VBN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN he_PRP did_VBD not_RB find_VB sufficient_JJ work_NN to_TO warrant_VB his_PRP$ retention_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT objections_NNS made_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS to_TO have_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS vaccinated_VBN ._.

of_IN 1880_CD ._.

25_CD ._.
The_DT preceding_VBG table_NN has_VBZ been_VBN drawn_VBN up_RP with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO illustrate_VB the_DT relation_NN between_IN the_DT state_NN of_IN protection_NN by_IN vaccination_NN and_CC the_DT pre-_JJ valence_NN of_IN small-pox_NN during_IN the_DT past_JJ five_CD years_NNS ,_, vide_IN para-_JJ graph_NN 12_CD of_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP 's_POS Resolution_NN on_IN the_DT An-_NNP nual_JJ Sanitary_NNP Report_NNP for_IN 1887_CD ._.
I_PRP should_MD here_RB remark_VB ,_, with_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT Chief_NNP Com-_NNP missioner_NN 's_POS direction_NN in_IN paragraph_JJ 7_CD of_IN the_DT Resolution_NNP on_IN the_DT Annual_NNP Sanitary_NNP Report_NNP for_IN 1888_CD ,_, that_IN I_PRP have_VBP acted_VBN in_IN strict_JJ compliance_NN with_IN the_DT orders_NNS contained_VBN in_IN the_DT Resolution_NNP on_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Report_NNP for_IN 1887_CD ,_, in_IN retaining_VBG for_IN and_CC embodying_VBG in_IN this_DT report_NN the_DT above_IN comparison_NN between_IN the_DT supposed_VBN protection_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS against_IN small-pox_JJ by_IN vaccina-_JJ tion_NN and_CC the_DT mortality_NN from_IN that_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT position_NN in_IN the_DT two_CD scales_NNS (_( columns_VB 2_CD and_CC 3_CD )_) occupied_VBN by_IN the_DT several_JJ districts_NNS shows_VBZ that_IN there_EX is_VBZ generally_RB very_RB little_JJ relation_NN between_IN the_DT supposed_VBN state_NN of_IN protection_NN and_CC the_DT supposed_VBN deaths_NNS from_IN small-pox_NN ._.
This_DT relation_NN does_VBZ not_RB in_IN any_DT case_NN correspond_NN exactly_RB ._.
In_IN Cachar_NNP the_DT figures_NNS correspond_VBP nearest_JJS ._.
We_PRP must_MD only_RB assume_VB ,_, as_IN a_DT cause_NN of_IN the_DT general_JJ want_NN of_IN relation_NN between_IN columns_$ 2_CD and_CC 3_CD ,_, that_WDT either_VBZ the_DT districts_NNS are_VBP not_RB vaccinated_VBN equally_RB well_RB in_IN every_DT part_NN so_RB as_IN to_TO give_VB equal_JJ pro-_NN tection_NN throughout_IN ,_, or_CC that_IN the_DT inspections_NNS of_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS by_IN Native_JJ Inspectors_NNS are_VBP unreliable_JJ ,_, or_CC that_IN false_JJ returns_NNS are_VBP made_VBN ,_, or_CC ,_, again_RB ,_, that_RB ,_, as_IN has_VBZ happened_VBN in_IN Darrang_NNP ,_, cases_NNS of_IN measles_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, are_VBP reported_VBN as_IN small-pox_NN ,_, and_CC thus_RB the_DT average_NN of_IN deaths_NNS for_IN that_DT disease_NN is_VBZ untruly_RB increased_VBN ._.
As_IN I_PRP know_VBP that_DT vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT Goálpára_NNP district_NN ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, is_VBZ most_JJS carefully_RB supervised_VBN and_CC inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB believe_VB that_IN the_DT relation_NN between_IN protection_NN and_CC deaths_NNS is_VBZ only_RB as_IN 3_CD is_VBZ to_TO 6_CD ,_, and_CC therefore_IN it_PRP must_MD be_VB quite_RB incorrect_JJ ._.
I_PRP think_VBP that_IN this_DT divergence_NN between_IN the_DT figures_NNS is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO faults_NNS (_( ignorance_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, )_) on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT vital_JJ statistics_NNS reporting_VBG agency_NN ._.
Nowgong_NNP and_CC Sibságar_NNP are_VBP not_RB the_DT best_JJS protected_JJ ,_, and_CC still_RB the_DT figures_NNS there_EX show_VBP comparatively_RB fewer_JJR deaths_NNS than_IN protec-_JJ tions_NNS ,_, which_WDT supports_VBZ the_DT idea_NN that_WDT imperfect_JJ registration_NN of_IN deaths_NNS explains_VBZ the_DT want_NN of_IN better_JJR and_CC more_RBR equal_JJ relation_NN between_IN columns_$ 2_CD and_CC 3_CD ._.
This_DT remark_NN applies_VBZ to_TO Sylhet_NNP also_RB ._.
On_IN looking_VBG over_IN all_PDT the_DT above_IN reasoning_NN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN imperfect_JJ registration_NN ,_, rather_RB than_IN any_DT deficiencies_NNS on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT vaccination_NN agency_NN ,_, will_MD explain_VB the_DT diver-_JJ gencies_NNS above_IN noted_VBN ._.
Now_RB that_IN we_PRP have_VBP began_VBD this_DT comparison_NN ,_, I_PRP hope_VBP that_IN the_DT columns_NN will_MD correspond_VB more_RBR with_IN the_DT actual_JJ results_NNS in_IN the_DT future_NN ._.

shows_VBZ the_DT progress_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS in_IN Assam_NNP for_IN the_DT past_JJ ten_NN years_NNS ._.

The_DT work_NN done_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP vaccinators_NNS has_VBZ fallen_VBN from_IN 40,464_CD in_IN 1887-88_CD to_TO 38,894_CD in_IN 1888-89_CD ._.

The_DT results_NNS of_IN examinations_NNS made_VBN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP among_IN certain_JJ classes_NNS of_IN the_DT general_JJ population_NN to_TO ascertain_VB to_TO what_WP extent_NN they_PRP were_VBD protected_VBN against_IN vaccination_NN are_VBP illustrated_VBN in_IN the_DT above_NN table_NN ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS examined_VBN was_VBD 27,070_CD ._.
Of_IN this_DT ,_, 6,921_CD were_VBD vaccinated_VBN ,_, 13,390_CD inoculated_VBD ,_, 5,466_CD had_VBD small-pox_NN ,_, and_CC 1,293_CD unprotected_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT results_NNS show_VBP to_TO what_WP extent_JJ inoculation_NN is_VBZ practised_VBN in_IN the_DT districts_NNS of_IN Cachar_NNP ,_, Groáipára_NNP ,_, Darrang_NNP ,_, Nowgong_NNP ,_, and_CC Gáro_NNP Hills_NNP ._.
In_IN Sylhet_NNP ,_, vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN greatly_RB interfered_VBN with_IN by_IN the_DT gunacks_NNS who_WP are_VBP much_JJ believed_VBN in_IN by_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC who_WP practice_NN inoculation_NN only_RB ,_, from_IN which_WDT practice_NN a_DT very_RB severe_JJ epidemic_NN of_IN small-pox_JJ broke_VBD out_RP in_IN the_DT past_JJ season_NN in_IN Lakhai_NNP in_IN the_DT Habiganj_NNP sub-division_NN of_IN that_DT district_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP recommended_VBN to_TO the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP that_IN all_DT inoculation_NN be_VB made_VBN penal_JJ in_IN Assam_NNP ,_, as_IN this_DT practice_NN of_IN unchecked_JJ inoculation_NN has_VBZ resulted_VBN in_IN serious_JJ epidemics_NNS of_IN small-pox_JJ and_CC loss_NN of_IN life_NN resulting_VBG therefrom_NNS ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN schoolboys_NNS examined_VBN was_VBD very_RB small_JJ ,_, as_IN compared_VBN with_IN other_JJ classes_NNS of_IN persons_NNS so_RB examined_VBD ,_, which_WDT arises_VBZ from_IN schools_NNS being_VBG but_CC occasionally_RB inspected_JJ ,_, whereas_JJ dispensaries_NNS and_CC jails_NNS are_VBP almost_RB daily_RB inspected_VBN at_IN sadr_JJ stations_NNS by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP ._.

The_DT statistics_NNS embodied_VBN in_IN paragraphs_JJ 8-22_CD of_IN the_DT report_NN ,_, which_WDT relate_VBP to_TO vaccination_NN in_IN municipal_JJ areas_NNS ,_, disclose_VB considerable_JJ differences_NNS in_IN the_DT results_NNS ,_, for_IN which_WDT no_DT sufficient_NN reasons_NNS are_VBP apparent_JJ ._.
Thus_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB understood_JJ why_WRB the_DT municipality_NN of_IN Goálpára-_NNP should_MD be_VB exempted_VBN from_IN the_DT necessity_NN laid_VBN upon_IN others_NNS of_IN contributing_VBG towards_IN the_DT payment_NN of_IN a_DT vaccination_NN staff_NN ,_, as_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ peculiarly_RB a_DT kind_NN of_IN charge_NN which_WDT municipal_JJ funds_NNS should_MD bear_VB ._.
Some_DT explanation_NN should_MD also_RB have_VB been_VBN given_VBN of_IN the_DT failure_NN which_WDT tool_NN place_NN in_IN the_DT Golághát_NNP Union_NNP ,_, where_WRB ,_, although_IN two_CD vaccinators_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN during_IN the_DT season_NN ,_, the_DT outturn_NN of_IN work_NN (_( less_JJR than_IN two_CD cases_NNS each_DT per_IN week_NN )_) compared_VBN very_RB un_JJ favourably_RB with_IN that_DT performed_VBN in_IN the_DT neighbouring_VBG union_NN of_IN Jorhát_NNP ._.
In_IN paragraph_NN of_IN the_DT Provincial_NNP Municipal_NNP Report_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1887-88_CD ,_, the_DT Chief_NNP Commissione_NNP expressed_VBD his_PRP$ hope_NN that_IN municipal_JJ authorities_NNS would_MD in_IN all_DT cases_NNS insist_VBP upon_IN due_JJ attention_NN being_VBG given_VBN to_TO the_DT matter_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC would_MD provide_VB effective_JJ supervision_NN over_IN municipal_JJ vaccination_NN where_WRB circumstances_NNS show_VBP this_DT to_TO be_VB necessary_JJ ._.
It_PRP was_VBD added_VBN that_IN there_EX should_MD be_VB no_DT hesitation_NN in_IN allotting_VBG adequate_JJ amounts_NNS for_IN expenditure_NN on_IN this_DT important_JJ object_NN ._.
The_DT present_JJ report_NN does_VBZ not_RB ,_, the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP regrets_NNS to_TO notice_VB ,_, show_VB that_IN this_DT hope_NN has_VBZ been_VBN realised_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ clear_JJ that_IN the_DT importance_NN of_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ it_PRP present_JJ only_RB imperfectly_RB appreciated_VBN in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS by_IN municipal_JJ bodies_NNS ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Westlard_NNP would_MD ,_, therefore_RB ,_, again_RB direct_JJ renewed_VBN attention_NN to_TO the_DT matter_NN ._.
In_IN future_JJ ,_, municipal_JJ bodies_NNS should_MD submit_VB a_DT separate_JJ report_NN on_IN vaccination_NN within_IN the_DT areas_NNS under_IN there_EX control_NN ,_, through_IN Deputy-Commissioners_NNS ,_, to_TO the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, who_WP will_MD be_VB requested_VBN to_TO give_VB especial_JJ attention_NN to_TO this_DT branch_NN of_IN vaccination_NN work_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
In_IN conclusion_NN ,_, the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP desires_VBZ to_TO notice_VB the_DT careful_JJ supervisior_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT consequent_NN success_NN ,_, of_IN Surgeon_NNP E._NNP Dobson_NNP ,_, Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Goálpára_NNP ._.

REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP THE_NNP PROVINCE_NNP OF_NNP ASSAM_NNP FOR_IN THE_NNP YEAR_NNP 1889-90_CD ._.
GENERAL_NNP SUMMARY_NNP ._.
Plan_NN of_IN the_DT report_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
As_IN a_DT detailed_JJ report_NN is_VBZ due_JJ for_IN the_DT year_NN 1889-90_JJ in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT Resolution_NNP of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department/Medical_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
28/1,579.95_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 15th_CD July_NNP 1887_CD ,_, the_DT remarks_NNS contained_VBN in_IN this_DT report_NN give_VB a_DT full_JJ history_NN and_CC general_JJ result_NN of_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT department_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN review_NN ._.
The_DT report_NN is_VBZ prepared_VBN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT plan_NN as_IN required_VBN in_IN the_DT above_NN noted_VBD Resolution_NNP ._.
The_DT statements_NNS appended_VBD to_TO this_DT report_NN first_RB show_VB the_DT work_NN done_VBN and_CC their_PRP$ results_NNS ;_: secondly_RB ,_, the_DT expenditure_NN ;_: thirdly_RB ,_, the_DT work_NN done_VBN in_IN the_DT dispensaries_NNS by_IN the_DT dispensary_JJ staff_NN ;_: and_CC ,_, fourthly_RB ,_, the_DT primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ results_NNS ._.
Lymph_NNP supply_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT first_JJ annual_JJ supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN from_IN England_NNP was_VBD received_VBN here_RB on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD September_NNP 1889_CD ,_, and_CC was_VBD distributed_VBN to_TO the_DT several_JJ Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP on_IN the_DT 27th_JJ September_NNP ._.
A_DT second_JJ supply_NN of_IN English_NNP lymph_NN was_VBD received_VBN from_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Bengal_NNP ._.
A_DT third_JJ and_CC fourth_JJ supply_NN of_IN English_NNP lymph_NN were_VBD received_VBN ,_, and_CC all_PDT these_DT were_VBD distributed_VBN to_TO the_DT several_JJ Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP ._.
The_DT results_NNS ,_, as_IN reported_VBN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP ,_, were_VBD very_RB successful_JJ in_IN every_DT district_NN except_IN Cachar_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN it_PRP did_VBD not_RB prove_VB to_TO be_VB successful_JJ ._.

The_DT Vaccination_NNP Act_NNP was_VBD compulsory_NN within_IN the_DT municipal_JJ area_NN ._.

180_CD in_IN 1889-90_JJ ._.

91_CD ._.
This_DT municipality_NN contributed_VBD nothing_NN to_TO meet_VB the_DT expenditure_NN on_IN vaccination_NN ._.
As_IN stated_VBN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN 's_POS report_NN ,_, the_DT inhabitants_NNS ,_, being_VBG chiefly_VB the_DT followers_NNS of_IN the_DT Mahapurusia_NNP religion_NN ,_, will_MD not_RB accept_VB vaccination_NN unless_IN and_CC until_IN it_PRP is_VBZ made_VBN compulsory_NN in_IN this_DT municipality_NN ,_, During_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN 82_CD children_NNS were_VBD vaccinated_VBN within_IN the_DT municipal_JJ limits_NNS by_IN the_DT Local_NNP Board_NNP vaccinator_NN and_CC by_IN the_DT Hospital-Assistant_NNP in_IN medical_JJ charge_NN of_IN the_DT dispensary_NN ._.
