(_( 22_CD )_) COMPARATIVE_NNP STATEMENT_NNP No_NNP ._.
IV.Resolution_NN on_IN the_DT Report_NNP on_IN Vaccination_NNP in_IN Assam_NNP for_IN 1889-90_JJ ._.
Extract_NN from_IN the_DT Proceedings_NNP of_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Assam_NNP in_IN the_DT General_NNP Department_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
5,909G._CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 30th_CD July_NNP 1890_CD ._.
READ_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) concerned_VBN ,_, and_CC he_PRP would_MD ask_VB the_DT Deputy-Surgeon-General_JJ to_TO consider_VB whether_IN some_DT steps_NNS might_MD not_RB be_VB taken_VBN to_TO bring_VB about_RP a_DT development_NN of_IN vaccination_NN at_IN that_DT place_NN by_IN increasing_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN municipal_JJ vaccinators_NNS ,_, or_CC by_IN such_JJ other_JJ measures_NNS as_IN may_MD appear_VB feasible_JJ ._.
Any_DT prejudicial_JJ influence_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB exercised_VBN by_IN kála_NN azár_NN affords_IN a_DT reason_NN tor_NN increasing_VBG rather_RB than_IN relaxing_VBG the_DT efforts_NNS not_RB only_RB in_IN regard_NN to_TO vaccination_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN regard_NN to_TO all_DT sanitary_JJ measures_NNS ._.
Paragraph_NNP 15_CD ._.
(_( Inoculation_NN in_IN Sylhet_NNP and_CC Cachar_NNP )_) 5_CD ._.
The_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP has_VBZ had_VBN under_IN his_PRP$ consideration_NN the_DT subject_NN of_IN inocu-_JJ lation_NN as_IN practised_VBN in_IN the_DT Province_NNP ,_, and_CC will_MD shortly_RB apply_VB to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP for_IN permission_NN to_TO bring_VB into_IN operation_NN the_DT Bengal_NNP Acts_NNP ,_, IV_NNP ._.
of_IN 1865_CD (_( which_WDT prohibits_VBZ inoculation_NN )_) and_CC III_NNP ._.
of_IN 1880_CD (_( which_WDT renders_VBZ vaccination_NN compulsory_NN )_) ,_, in_IN certain_JJ localities_NNS adjoining_VBG Bengal_NNP ._.
The_DT Acts_NNPS in_IN question_NN are_VBP already_RB in_IN force_NN in_IN the_DT adjoining_JJ Bengal_NNP districts_NNS ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ operation_NN could_MD be_VB fully_RB watched_VBN in_IN the_DT particular_JJ areas_NNS in_IN Assam_NNP to_TO which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ proposed_VBN to_TO apply_VB them_PRP ._.
Paragraph_NNP 16_CD ._.
(_( Employment_NN of_IN licensed_JJ vaccinators_NNS ._. )_)
6_CD ._.
The_DT employment_NN of_IN licensed_JJ vaccinators_NNS in_IN Goálpára_NNP ,_, as_IN supervised_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Dobson_NNP ,_, has_VBZ proved_VBN successful_JJ ;_: but_CC the_DT system_NN is_VBZ open_JJ to_TO obvious_JJ abuses_NNS ,_, which_WDT can_MD only_RB be_VB kept_VBN down_RP by_IN the_DT exercise_NN of_IN strict_JJ control_NN ._.
The_DT case_NN referred_VBD to_TO in_IN paragraph_JJ 16_CD of_IN the_DT report_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT a_DT vaccinator_NN demanded_VBD more_JJR than_IN the_DT sanctioned_JJ fee_NN (_( two_CD annas_NNS )_) ,_, attracted_VBD the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP 's_POS notice_NN when_WRB on_IN tour_NN at_IN Goál_NNP pára_NN last_JJ cold_JJ weather_NN ,_, and_CC such_JJ cases_NNS ,_, if_IN of_IN frequent_JJ occur-_JJ rence_NN ,_, would_MD outweigh_VB the_DT benefits_NNS attributed_VBN to_TO the_DT employment_NN of_IN this_DT agency_NN ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Shillong_NNP should_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO spare_VB more_JJR time_NN for_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN vaccina-_JJ tion_NN operations_NNS during_IN the_DT cold_JJ weather_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT European_NNP population_NN of_IN the_DT station_NN is_VBZ at_IN its_PRP$ lowest_JJS ._.
Paragraph_NNP 54_CD ._.
(_( Prevalence_NN of_IN small-pox_NN in_IN Nowgong_NNP ._. )_)
7_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ to_TO note_VB that_IN no_DT epidemic_NN of_IN small-pox_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN place_NN in_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Nowgong_NNP during_IN the_DT last_JJ five_CD years_NNS ,_, while_IN no_DT death_NN from_IN small-pox_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN during_IN the_DT last_JJ two_CD years_NNS ._.
This_DT fact_NN ,_, coupled_VBN with_IN the_DT statistics_NNS given_VBN in_IN the_DT report_NN ,_, affords_VBZ the_DT best_JJS testimony_NN to_TO the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT services_NNS of_IN Dr._NNP McNaught_NNP in_IN this_DT department_NN ,_, which_WDT Mr._NNP Quinton_NNP has_VBZ much_JJ pleasure_NN in_IN recognising_VBG ._.
Paragraph_NNP 58_CD ._.
(_( Work_VB done_VBN by_IN licensed_JJ vaccinators_NNS in_IN Sibságar_NNP )_) 8_CD ._.
The_DT plan_NN followed_VBD in_IN the_DT Sibságar_NNP district_NN in_IN the_DT matter_NN of_IN the_DT employment_NN of_IN ex-inoculators_NNS as_IN licensed_JJ vaccinators_NNS is_VBZ worthy_JJ of_IN adoption_NN elsewhere_RB ,_, when_WRB favourable_JJ conditions_NNS exist_VBP ,_, as_IN being_VBG likely_JJ to_TO conciliate_VB the_DT people_NNS towards_IN vaccination_NN ._.
Paragraphs_NNP 93-94_CD ._.
(_( Compulsory_JJ vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT Silchar_NNP and_CC Sibságar_NNP stations_NNS ._. )_)
9_CD ._.
The_DT proposal_NN to_TO introduce_VB the_DT Compulsory_NNP Vaccination_NNP Act_NNP into_IN the_DT stations_NNS of_IN Silchar_NNP and_CC Sibságar_NNP should_MD be_VB separately_RB submitted_VBN for_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP 's_POS consideration_NN and_CC orders_NNS ._.
Paragraphs_NNP 95_CD ,_, 96_CD ,_, 99._CD and_CC 100_CD of_IN report_NN (_( Results_NNP in_IN Shillong_NNP Station_NNP and_CC Habi-_NNP ganj_NN ,_, Jorhát_NNP ,_, and_CC Golághát_NNP Unions_NNP )_) 10_CD ._.
As_IN observed_VBN by_IN the_DT Deputy-Surgeon-General_NNP ,_, although_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ not_RB compulsory_JJ in_IN the_DT Shillong_NNP Station_NNP ,_, the_DT results_NNS are_VBP satisfactory_JJ ._.
The_DT results_NNS obtained_VBN in_IN the_DT Habiganj_NNP Union_NNP by_IN the_DT appoint-_JJ ment_NN of_IN a_DT special_JJ vaccinator_NN are_VBP good_JJ ,_, but_CC a_DT larger_JJR number_NN of_IN operations_NNS should_MD have_VB been_VBN shown_VBN ._.

As_IN regards_NNS the_DT Golághát_NNP Union_NNP ,_, the_DT sub-divisional_JJ officer_NN will_MD be_VB directed_VBN to_TO use_VB his_PRP$ influence_NN with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO forward_VB the_DT cause_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
11_CD ._.
The_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT small-pox_NN prevailed_VBD in_IN the_DT several_JJ municipalities_NNS and_CC stations_NNS of_IN the_DT Province_NNP is_VBZ shown_VBN in_IN the_DT Annual_NNP Sanitary_NNP Report_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT Chief_NNP Com-_NNP missioner_NN would_MD be_VB glad_JJ if_IN the_DT Deputy-Surgeon-General_NNP would_MD be_VB good_JJ enough_RB in_IN future_JJ to_TO embody_VB this_DT information_NN in_IN the_DT Annual_NNP Report_NNP on_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, so_IN that_IN a_DT judgment_NN may_MD readily_RB be_VB formed_VBN of_IN the_DT practical_JJ success_NN or_CC otherwise_NN of_IN vaccination_NN work_NN in_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT municipal_JJ areas_NNS ._.

28_CD 2_CD or_CC an_DT increase_NN of_IN 41,454_CD over_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ a_DT great_JJ improvement_NN ._.

of_IN 1880_CD to_TO certain_JJ selected_VBN areas_NNS in_IN the_DT Surma_NNP Valley_NNP ._.
14_CD ._.

of_IN 1880_CD to_TO such_JJ areas_NNS in_IN Assam_NNP as_IN may_MD be_VB selected_VBN by_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN prohibiting_VBG inoculation_NN in_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC has_VBZ been_VBN approved_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, under_IN certain_JJ restrictions_NNS ,_, in_IN paragraph_JJ -5_NN of_IN Home_NNP Department_NNP (_( Sanitary_NNP )_) No_NNP ._.
1_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 2nd_CD January_NNP 1891_CD ,_, to_TO the_DT Chief_NNP Com-_NNP missioner_NN of_IN Assam_NNP ,_, is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, most_RBS desirable_JJ for_IN certain_JJ areas_NNS in_IN the_DT Surma_NNP Valley_NNP districts_NNS ;_: but_CC ,_, previous_JJ to_TO applying_VBG it_PRP to_TO such_JJ selected_VBN areas_NNS ,_, I_PRP am_VBP inquiring_VBG from_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP of_IN the_DT Cachar_NNP and_CC Sylhet_NNP districts_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT places_NNS where_WRB it_PRP can_MD be_VB safely_RB applied_VBN ,_, especially_RB with_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT necessary_JJ condition_NN of_IN there-_JJ being_VBG sufficient_JJ means_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN open_JJ to_TO the_DT public_NN before_IN the_DT Act_NNP in_IN question_NN is_VBZ made_VBN applicable_JJ to_TO the_DT areas_NNS which_WDT may_MD be_VB so_RB selected_VBN ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN this_DT proviso_NN has_VBZ been_VBN complied_VBN with_IN ,_, I_PRP shall_MD propose_VB certain_JJ areas_NNS to_TO the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN the_DT enforcement_NN of_IN the_DT Act_NNP in_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC I_PRP hope_VBP that_IN by_IN this_DT means_VBZ inoculation_NN ,_, hitherto_NN so_RB common_JJ in_IN certain_JJ subdivisions_NNS ,_, notably_RB the_DT Habiganj_NNP subdivision_NN of_IN the_DT Sylhet_NNP district_NN ,_, may_MD be_VB discontinued_VBN ._.

11_CD ._.

223,185_CD tubes_NNS were_VBD distributed_VBN ,_, as_IN compared_VBN with_IN 111,475_CD in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, or_CC an_DT increase_NN of_IN 111,710_CD tubes_NNS so_RB distributed_VBD to_TO the_DT different_JJ districts_NNS ,_, gardens_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, including_VBG the_DT Manipur_NNP State_NNP ._.
The_DT outbreaks_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN in_IN the_DT Nága_NNP Hills_NNP and_CC in_IN the_DT Manipur_NNP State_NNP caused_VBD a_DT considerable_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT greater_JJR expenditure_NN of_IN lymph_NN ,_, the_DT quality_NN of_IN which_WDT 9_CD was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB excellent_JJ in_IN both_DT districts_NNS ,_, affording_VBG striking_NN and_CC gratifying_VBG results_NNS in_IN staying_VBG the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ in_IN Manipur_NNP and_CC the_DT Nága_NNP Hills_NNP ,_, and_CC also_RB at_IN least_JJS in_IN stamping_VBG it_PRP out_RP for_IN the_DT time_NN by_IN its_PRP$ protective_JJ power_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP sorry_JJ to_TO say_VB ,_, however_RB ,_, that_DT just_RB lately_RB another_DT epidemic_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN at_IN Manipur_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ being_VBG combated_VBN by_IN renewed_JJ vaccinations_NNS of_IN the_DT unprotected_JJ in_IN that_DT State_NNP ._.
The_DT expenditure_NN is_VBZ carefully_RB supervised_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Campbell_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ management_NN has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN every_DT way_NN a_DT great_JJ success_NN in_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, even_RB more_RBR so_RB than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, considering_VBG the_DT great_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN tubes_JJ sent_VBN out_RP ,_, the_DT quality_NN and_CC success_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT proportional_JJ moderate_JJ outlay_NN incurred_VBN ._.

A_DT statement_NN showing_VBG the_DT mortality_NN month_NN by_IN month_NN amongst_IN the_DT calves_NNS is_VBZ attached_VBN ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN February_NNP and_CC March_NNP are_VBP the_DT most_RBS fatal_JJ months_NNS ._.
The_DT chief_NN cause_NN is_VBZ the_DT scarcity_NN and_CC dryness_NN of_IN the_DT fodder_NN ._.
A_DT quantity_NN of_IN green_JJ food_NN is_VBZ purchased_VBN for_IN them_PRP ,_, but_CC of_IN course_NN while_IN out_RP with_IN the_DT shepherd_NN pasturing_VBG they_PRP eat_VBP a_DT quantity_NN of_IN hard_JJ dry_JJ fodder_NN ,_, which_WDT causes_VBZ a_DT form_NN of_IN gastro-enteritis_NN or_CC stoppage_NN of_IN the_DT bowels_NNS ._.

Revd_NNP ._.

No_DT experiments_NNS were_VBD made_VBN with_IN lanoline_NN during_IN the_DT season_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP required_VBD all_PDT the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT depôt_NN establishment_NN to_TO carry_VB on_IN the_DT routine_JJ work_NN of_IN loading_VBG tubes_NNS with_IN glycerine_JJ lymph_NN ._.

General_NNP remarks_NNS ._.
18_CD ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT drawbacks_NNS to_TO this_DT depôt_NN was_VBD the_DT want_NN of_IN a_DT proper_JJ water-supply_NN ,_, as_IN water_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB brought_VBN from_IN the_DT foot_NN of_IN the_DT hill_NN some_DT little_JJ way_NN off_IN ,_, and_CC this_DT was_VBD a_DT hardship_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT quantity_NN of_IN water_NN required_VBN for_IN flushing_NN and_CC cleaning_VBG out_RP the_DT two_CD calves_NNS '_POS sheds_NNS and_CC the_DT operation_NN room_NN was_VBD considerable_JJ ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN Assam_NNP has_VBZ sanctioned_VBN Rs_NNP ._.

8_CD ._.
The_DT above_NN table_NN No_NNP ._.
1_CD shows_VBZ the_DT vaccination_NN work_NN done_VBN in_IN each_DT district_NN and_CC on_IN tea_NN estates_NNS in_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT past_JJ three_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC also_RB compares_VBZ the_DT numbers_NNS of_IN the_DT operations_NNS of_IN each_DT year_NN with_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT succeeding_VBG year_NN ,_, showing_VBG the_DT differences_NNS between_IN them_PRP ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN offering_VBG a_DT comparison_NN of_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN the_DT past_JJ with_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT triennial_JJ period_NN which_WDT has_VBZ just_RB terminated_VBN the_DT yearly_JJ number_NN of_IN opera-_JJ tions_NNS has_VBZ increased_VBN from_IN 146,506_CD vaccinations_NNS in_IN the_DT season_NN 1889-90_JJ to_TO 224,943_CD in_IN the_DT season_NN ending_VBG on_IN 31st_CD March_NNP of_IN the_DT current_JJ year_NN ,_, or_CC an_DT increase_NN of_IN 78,437_CD vaccinations_NNS as_IN compared_VBN with_IN 17,673_CD ,_, the_DT corresponding_JJ increase_NN for_IN the_DT previous_JJ triennial_JJ period_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ a_DT considerable_JJ and_CC satisfactory_JJ improvement_NN ._.
This_DT increase_NN has_VBZ been_VBN very_RB steady_JJ and_CC continuous_JJ ,_, although_IN in_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN it_PRP has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN as_RB high_JJ as_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ explained_VBN by_IN vaccinations_NNS in_IN the_DT Nága_NNP Hills_NNP having_VBG aggregated_VBN 14,275_CD in_IN 1891-92_CD ,_, an_DT increase_NN of_IN 10,430_CD over_IN the_DT figures_NNS of_IN 1890-91_JJ ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT reasons_NNS given_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 9_CD below_IN ,_, and_CC also_RB to_TO Manipur_NNP having_VBG increased_VBN the_DT numbers_NNS of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN (_( 1891-92_JJ )_) by_IN 7,481_CD over_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT year_NN 1890_CD 91_CD ,_, a_DT considerable_JJ and_CC most_JJS exceptional_JJ increase_NN ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT special_JJ circumstances_NNS of_IN the_DT inclusion_NN of_IN the_DT returns_NNS from_IN Manipur_NNP for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN in_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN last_JJ year_NN 's_POS report_NN and_CC also_RB to_TO a_DT widespread_JJ epidemic_NN of_IN small-pox_JJ having_VBG so_RB alarmed_JJ the_DT people_NNS of_IN Manipur_NNP that_IN they_PRP willingly_RB submitted_VBD to_TO vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC even_RB sought_VBD for_IN it_PRP ._.
Sylhet_NN shows_NNS (_( see_VB the_DT figures_NNS for_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN )_) the_DT greatest_JJS increase_NN (_( 23,773_CD )_) over_IN the_DT figures_NNS of_IN 1889-90_JJ ,_, Kámrúp_NNP ,_, Manipur_NNP ,_, Darrang_NNP ,_, Nága_NNP Hills_NNP ,_, Nowgong_NNP ,_, Lakhimpur_NNP ,_, Cachar_NNP ,_, Goálpára_NNP ,_, and_CC tea_NN gardens_NNS show_VBP the_DT next_JJ highest_JJS figures_NNS in_IN the_DT order_NN given_VBN ._.
The_DT large_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT Sylhet_NNP district_NN is_VBZ very_RB creditable_JJ to_TO the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP and_CC the_DT civil_JJ authorities_NNS concerned_VBN ._.
The_DT increase_NN was_VBD first_JJ very_RB noticeable_JJ in_IN the_DT year_NN 1890-91_JJ ,_, and_CC is_VBZ referred_VBN to_TO in_IN paragraph_JJ 4_CD of_IN the_DT Provincial_NNP Annual_NNP Vaccination_NNP Report_NNP for_IN that_DT year_NN ._.
During_IN each_DT year_NN of_IN the_DT triennial_JJ period_NN ,_, and_CC commencing_VBG after_IN 1888-89_CD ,_, the_DT increases_NNS in_IN this_DT district_NN were_VBD continuous_JJ ,_, except_IN in_IN 1891-92_JJ ,_, and_CC very_RB remarkable_JJ ,_, and_CC I_PRP may_MD mention_VB that_IN Surgeon-_NNP Captain_NNP S._NNP H._NNP Henderson_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Partridge_NNP ,_, Surgeons-Major_NNP J._NNP W._NNP Macnamara_NNP ,_, and_CC H._NNP C._NNP Banerji_NNP were_VBD ,_, in_IN turn_NN ,_, in_IN medical_JJ charge_NN of_IN this_DT district_NN during_IN the_DT triennial_JJ period_NN under_IN review_NN ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN from_IN the_DT above_NN that_IN the_DT good_JJ progress_NN noted_VBD was_VBD effected_VBN chiefly_NN during_IN the_DT incumbencies_NNS of_IN Drs_NNP ._.
S._NNP H._NNP Henderson_NNP ,_, Partridge_NNP ,_, and_CC Banerji_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP Macnamara_NNP was_VBD on_IN furlough_NN from_IN 2nd_CD October_NNP 1889_CD to_TO 11th_CD October_NNP 1891_CD ,_, and_CC remained_VBD in_IN charge_NN until_IN 1st_CD March_NNP 1892_CD ,_, during_IN which_WDT latter_JJ period_NN there_EX was_VBD a_DT decrease_NN of_IN 123_CD as_IN compared_VBN with_IN the_DT corresponding_JJ period_NN in_IN 1890-91_JJ ._.
The_DT reason_NN of_IN the_DT increase_NN in_IN Manipur_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN given_VBN above_IN ._.
The_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT Kámrúp_NNP district_NN is_VBZ very_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.
The_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT Nága_NNP Hills_NNP district_NN from_IN 88_CD in_IN 1888-89_CD to_TO 14,275_CD in_IN 1891-92_CD ,_, even_RB with_IN the_DT comparatively_RB reduced_JJ figures_NNS 7,110_CD for_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, is_VBZ ,_, relatively_RB to_TO the_DT popu-_JJ lation_NN ,_, the_DT most_RBS satisfactory_JJ of_IN the_DT remaining_VBG districts_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT Khási_NNP and_CC Jaintia_NNP Hills_NNP the_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT triennial_JJ period_NN only_RB came_VBD to_TO 745_CD ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ but_CC a_DT poor_JJ result_NN ,_, arising_VBG partly_RB from_IN the_DT apparent_JJ inability_NN of_IN the_DT late_JJ Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP to_TO travel_VB about_IN in_IN his_PRP$ district_NN during_IN the_DT cold_JJ season_NN ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT heavy_JJ medical_JJ duties_NNS in_IN the_DT sadr_JJ station_NN of_IN Shillong_NNP as_IN reported_VBN to_TO me_PRP (_( see_VB this_DT office_NN No_RB ._.
3234C._CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 17th_CD December_NNP 1892_CD ,_, to_TO the_DT Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Assam_NNP )_) ._.
I_PRP hope_VBP the_DT present_JJ Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP will_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO effect_NN better_RBR results_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP happy_JJ to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN Dr._NNP Dobson_NNP does_VBZ not_RB think_VB that_IN there_EX will_MD be_VB any_DT difficulty_NN in_IN his_PRP$ doing_VBG so_RB during_IN his_PRP$ incumbency_NN which_WDT is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ as_IN ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, the_DT vaccination_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN this_DT district_NN has_VBZ suffered_VBN much_RB from_IN the_DT want_NN of_IN such_JJ constant_JJ and_CC personal_JJ supervision_NN in_IN the_DT interior_NN of_IN the_DT district_NN during_IN the_DT cold_JJ season_NN ._.
Remarks_NNS on_IN the_DT vaccination_NN results_NNS of_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, 1892-93_JJ ._.
9_CD ._.
Comparing_VBG the_DT figures_NNS of_IN the_DT past_JJ with_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT previous_JJ vaccination_NN season_NN ,_, the_DT grand_JJ total_JJ actual_JJ increase_NN for_IN all_DT districts_NNS was_VBD 18,612_CD ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ not_RB quite_RB as_RB high_JJ as_IN the_DT figures_NNS of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN (_( 19,221_CD )_) ,_, merely_RB because_IN in_IN that_DT year_NN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS was_VBD exceptionally_RB swollen_VBN by_IN the_DT figures_NNS for_IN the_DT Nága_NNP Hills_NNP and_CC Manipur_NNP ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT epidemic_NN of_IN small-pox_NN in_IN both_DT districts_NNS and_CC the_DT crowds_NN of_IN people_NNS in_IN them_PRP who_WP ,_, in_IN consequence_NN ,_, sought_VBD protection_NN against_IN that_DT disease_NN through_IN vaccination_NN ._.
So_RB that_RB ,_, in_IN reality_NN ,_, the_DT yearly_JJ increase_NN has_VBZ been_VBN continuous_JJ ,_, and_CC ,_, but_CC for_IN those_DT exceptional_JJ and_CC temporary_JJ causes_NNS ,_, would_MD have_VB been_VBN actually_RB much_RB more_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT largest_JJS increase_NN of_IN vaccination_NN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN in_IN any_DT one_CD district_NN (_( 13,357_CD )_) took_VBD place_NN in_IN the_DT Kámrúp_NNP district_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ a_DT strikingly_RB successful_JJ result_NN ,_, showing_VBG what_WP can_MD be_VB effected_VBN by_IN an_DT energetic_JJ Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, especially_RB when_WRB well_RB supported_VBN by_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, and_CC great_JJ credit_NN for_IN this_DT is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO Surgeon-Major_JJ J._NNP W._NNP Macnamara_NNP and_CC the_DT Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Teunon_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT same_JJ comparison_NN ,_, Sylhet_NNP ,_, Darrang_NNP ,_, Manipur_NNP ,_, and_CC Nowgong_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT order_NN given_VBN ,_, show_VBP the_DT most_RBS satisfactory_JJ work_NN ._.
Tea_NN gardens_VBZ show_VBP a_DT satisfactory_JJ increase_NN over_IN the_DT figures_NNS of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, together_RB with_IN the_DT increase_NN (_( 4,762_CD )_) since_IN 1888-89_CD ,_, shows_VBZ that_IN considerable_JJ attention_NN is_VBZ now_RB given_VBN to_TO 4_CD the_DT protection_NN of_IN the_DT coolies_NNS on_IN gardens_NNS against_IN small-pox_NN ._.
The_DT Gáro_NNP Hills_NNP show_VBP only_RB a_DT small_JJ increase_NN (_( 74_CD )_) over_IN the_DT figures_NNS of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, but_CC there_RB has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT general_JJ steady_NN ,_, though_IN slight_JJ ,_, increase_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN those_DT hills_NNS in_IN the_DT last_JJ five_CD years_NNS ._.
North_NNP Lushai_NNP appears_VBZ for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN in_IN this_DT table_NN with_IN 246_CD vaccinations_NNS ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ a_DT fair_JJ beginning_NN ,_, considering_VBG the_DT difficulties_NNS which_WDT had_VBD to_TO be_VB contended_VBN with_IN ._.
Although_IN the_DT Nága_NNP Hills_NNP show_VBP a_DT large_JJ decrease_NN (_( 7,165_CD )_) in_IN vaccinations_NNS as_IN compared_VBN with_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, it_PRP must_MD be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN the_DT exceptionally_RB high_JJ figures_NNS in_IN that_DT year_NN were_VBD altogether_RB due_JJ to_TO a_DT very_RB extensive_JJ outbreak_NN of_IN small-pox_NN (_( connected_VBN with_IN that_DT at_IN Manipur_NNP )_) ,_, which_WDT caused_VBD the_DT Nágas_NNP to_TO flock_VB in_IN crowds_NN to_TO the_DT district_NN dispen-_NN saries_NNS and_CC vaccination_NN centres_NNS for_IN protection_NN against_IN this_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT other_JJ districts_NNS which_WDT show_VBP decreases_VBZ ,_, as_IN compared_VBN with_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, are_VBP Goálpára_NNP ,_, Sibságar_NNP ,_, Lakhimpur_NNP ,_, and_CC Khási_NNP and_CC Jaintia_NNP Hills_NNP ,_, the_DT districts_NNS with_IN the_DT greatest_JJS decreases_NNS being_VBG given_VBN first_RB in_IN order_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ hoped_VBN that_IN in_IN the_DT current_JJ year_NN better_RBR results_NNS may_MD be_VB shown_VBN in_IN the_DT last_JJ three_CD districts_NNS ,_, although_IN I_PRP may_MD say_VB ,_, at_IN least_JJS for_IN Goálpára_NNP ,_, that_IN the_DT decrease_NN there_EX is_VBZ most_JJS unusual_JJ ,_, and_CC could_MD not_RB have_VB been_VBN due_JJ to_TO any_DT want_NN of_IN activity_NN or_CC supervision_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, but_CC may_MD have_VB been_VBN partly_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT large_JJ increase_NN (_( 4,117_CD )_) in_IN the_DT year_NN 1891-92_RB over_IN the_DT corresponding_JJ figures_NNS of_IN 1890_CD 91_CD ._.
An_DT Inspector_NN of_IN Vaccination_NNP was_VBD appointed_VBN to_TO the_DT Khási_NNP and_CC Jaintia_NNP Hills_NNP before_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT past_JJ vaccination_NN season_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT hope_NN that_IN vaccination_NN would_MD be_VB through_IN this_DT means_VBZ much_RB increased_VBN in_IN that_DT district_NN ,_, but_CC ,_, instead_RB of_IN an_DT increase_NN ,_, there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT decrease_NN of_IN 644_CD vaccinations_NNS from_IN the_DT number_NN vaccinated_VBN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ unsatisfactory_JJ and_CC arises_NNS from_IN the_DT reasons_NNS given_VBN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN paragraph_NN 8_CD above_IN ._.

13_CD ._.
The_DT above_NN table_NN is_VBZ intended_VBN to_TO show_VB the_DT increasing_VBG protection_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS against_IN small-pox_NN ._.
The_DT well-known_JJ fact_NN that_IN small-pox_JJ mortality_NN is_VBZ apt_JJ to_TO vary_VB from_IN year_NN to_TO year_NN should_MD be_VB taken_VBN into_IN considera-_JJ tion_NN in_IN reading_VBG it_PRP ._.
Notwithstanding_VBG this_DT ,_, it_PRP seems_VBZ that_IN our_PRP$ registered_JJ mortality_NN from_IN small-pox_NN has_VBZ decreased_VBN from_IN an_DT average_NN of_IN 1,812_CD yearly_RB in_IN the_DT quinquennial_JJ period_NN 1877_CD to_TO 1881_CD and_CC of_IN 3,336_CD in_IN the_DT corresponding_JJ period_NN 1882_CD to_TO 1886_CD to_TO 1,452_CD in_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ;_: and_CC ,_, as_IN our_PRP$ registration_NN has_VBZ decidedly_RB improved_VBN in_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN even_RB in_IN the_DT 6_CD previous_JJ four_CD years_NNS it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN better_JJR than_IN it_PRP was_VBD from_IN 1877_CD to_TO 1881_CD ,_, this_DT decrease_NN is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ as_IN showing_VBG the_DT much_RB increased_VBN protection_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN obtained_VBN by_IN the_DT successful_JJ vaccinations_NNS of_IN the_DT past_JJ five_CD years_NNS ._.

for_IN the_DT Sylhet_NNP district_NN in_IN favour_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN just_RB ended_VBN (_( 1892-93_JJ )_) as_IN calculated_VBN on_IN 54,737_CD vaccinations_NNS done_VBN by_IN the_DT regular_JJ vaccination_NN establishment_NN alone_RB ,_, not_RB counting_VBG those_DT effected_VBN by_IN the_DT licensed_JJ vaccinator_NN (_( 984_CD )_) or_CC by_IN dispensary_JJ vaccination_NN agency_NN (_( 5,326_CD )_) ._.

2_CD ,_, as_IN the_DT year_NN had_VBD been_VBN very_RB bad_JJ ,_, and_CC so_RB many_JJ had_VBD died_VBN that_IN the_DT contractor_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN out_IN of_IN pocket_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP would_MD have_VB been_VBN impossible_JJ to_TO get_VB him_PRP to_TO supply_VB calves_NNS unless_IN he_PRP could_MD make_VB something_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT transaction_NN ._.
The_DT account_NN of_IN the_DT calves_NNS during_IN 1892-93_JJ is_VBZ 13_CD The_DT past_NN season_NN has_VBZ been_VBN bitterly_RB cold_JJ ,_, colder_JJR than_IN the_DT previous_JJ years_NNS the_DT depôt_NN has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN existence_NN ,_, hence_RB the_DT greater_JJR mortality_NN in_IN November_NNP ,_, December_NNP ,_, and_CC January_NNP as_IN compared_VBN with_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT deaths_NNS in_IN February_NNP and_CC March_NNP on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN are_VBP loss_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT weather_NN was_VBD warm_JJ ,_, the_DT rain_NN came_VBD soon_RB ,_, and_CC there_EX were_VBD no_DT high_JJ west_NN winds_NNS ._.

Establishment_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
The_DT establishment_NN consists_VBZ of_IN one_CD second-grade_JJ Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP for_IN 12_CD months_NNS (_( and_CC a_DT supernumerary_JJ Hospital_NN Assistant_NN from_IN 24th_CD December_NNP )_) ,_, *_JJ two_CD coolies_NNS for_IN 12_CD months_NNS ,_, one_CD coolie_NN and_CC one_CD sweeper_NN for_IN 7_CD months_NNS ._.
The_DT cost_NN was14_NN Now_RB ,_, these_DT results_NNS are_VBP very_RB good_JJ in_IN some_DT districts_NNS and_CC only_RB really_RB bad_JJ in_IN Gáro_NNP Hills_NNP and_CC Sylhet_NNP ,_, as_IN also_RB to_TO a_DT less_RBR extent_NN in_IN Cachar_NNP and_CC Goálpára_NNP ._.
The_DT Principal_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Assam_NNP ,_, in_IN his_PRP$ letter_NN of_IN 28th_CD January_NNP appended_VBD says_VBZ &_CC quot_NN ;_: In_IN nearly_RB every_DT case_NN the_DT first_JJ supplies_NNS of_IN lymph_NN from_IN your_PRP$ depôt_NN were_VBD actual_JJ or_CC comparative_JJ failures_NNS ._.
&_CC quot_NN ;_: This_DT ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, can_MD hardly_RB be_VB considered_VBN correct_JJ ,_, after_IN carefully_RB considering_VBG the_DT reports_NNS tabled_VBD above_RB ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN at_IN a_DT glance_NN that_IN the_DT results_NNS obtained_VBD vary_JJ in_IN each_DT district_NN ,_, but_CC that_IN the_DT first_JJ six_CD districts_NNS ,_, Nowgong_NNP ,_, Sibságar_NNP ,_, Manipur_NNP ,_, Kámrúp_NNP ,_, Darrang_NNP ,_, and_CC Lakhimpur_NNP give_VBP on_IN the_DT whole_JJ very_RB good_JJ results_NNS ,_, the_DT other_JJ four_CD districts_NNS ,_, Cachar_NNP ,_, Sylhet_NNP ,_, Goálpára_NNP ,_, and_CC Gáro_NNP Hills_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, give_VB poor_JJ results_NNS ,_, more_RBR especially_RB Sylhet_NNP and_CC Gáro_NNP Hills_NNP ._.
I_PRP will_MD now_RB proceed_VB to_TO analyse_VB in_IN detail_NN the_DT lymph_NN supplied_VBD to_TO those_DT districts_NNS which_WDT gave_VBD bad_JJ returns_NNS and_CC try_VB to_TO explain_VB the_DT cause_NN of_IN the_DT failure_NN ._.
Firstly_RB ,_, then_RB ,_, as_IN regards_NNS the_DT lymph_NN supplied_VBD :_: Sylhet.15_NNP (_( d_NN )_) It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT good_JJ plan_NN to_TO perform_VB the_DT operation_NN in_IN the_DT shade_NN and_CC out_IN of_IN the_DT wind_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT heat_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN and_CC the_DT wind_NN make_VBP the_DT lymph_NN dry_NN on_IN the_DT arm_NN before_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN rubbed_VBN in_IN sufficient-_JJ ly_NN to_TO be_VB absorbed_VBN ._.
Should_MD it_PRP dry_VB too_RB quickly_RB ,_, all_DT that_DT is_VBZ necessary_JJ is_VBZ to_TO add_VB a_DT drop_NN of_IN pure_JJ water_NN and_CC go_VB on_IN rubbing_NN ._.
(_( e_NN )_) The_DT after_IN treatment_NN of_IN course_NN is_VBZ not_RB to_TO let_VB the_DT cloths_NNS get_VBP near_IN the_DT part_NN till_NN it_PRP is_VBZ dry_JJ ,_, nor_CC to_TO wash_VB the_DT arm_NN for_IN a_DT day_NN or_CC two_CD ,_, and_CC to_TO warn_VB the_DT parents_NNS to_TO take_VB care_NN that_IN when_WRB the_DT vesicle_NN rises_VBZ it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB broken_VBN ;_: but_CC ,_, besides_IN these_DT rules_NNS ,_, which_WDT if_IN not_RB carefully_RB carried_VBN out_RP affect_VBP the_DT results_NNS ,_, of_IN course_NN there_EX are_VBP certain_JJ rules_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT manufacture_NN of_IN lymph_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, if_IN neglected_VBN ,_, will_MD impair_VB the_DT efficacy_NN ._.
The_DT rules_NNS are16_VBP APPENDIX_NNP TO_NNP DEPÔT_NNP REPORT_NNP ._.
Results_NNS of_IN the_DT first_JJ three_CD supplies_NNS of_IN lymph_NN from_IN the_DT Shillong_NNP Animal_NNP Vaccine_NNP Depôt_NNP ._.

4_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT compulsory_NN areas_NNS ,_, where_WRB Act_NNP V_NNP (_( B.C_NNP ._. )_)
of_IN 1880_CD and_CC Act_NNP XIII_NNP of_IN 1880_CD are_VBP in_IN force_NN ,_, the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN increased_VBN from_IN 2,191_CD in_IN the_DT preceding_VBG year_NN to_TO 2,984_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN successful_JJ operations_NNS from_IN 2,009_CD to_TO 2,721_CD ._.

SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO submit_VB the_DT annual_JJ vaccination_NN statements_NNS of_IN the_DT province_NN of_IN Assam_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1893-94_CD ,_, in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT instructions_NNS contained_VBN in_IN Gov-_NNP ernment_NN of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, letter_NN No_NNP ._.
282_CD were_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB successful_JJ ,_, in_IN Goálpára_NNP the_DT successful_JJ percentage_NN by_IN licensed_JJ men_NNS was_VBD 94.57_CD ,_, whereas_NNS in_IN Nowgong_NNP and_CC Gáro_NNP Hills_NNP the_DT percentages_NNS of_IN primary_JJ cases_NNS found_VBD to_TO be_VB successful_JJ were_VBD respectively_RB 69.53_CD and_CC 62.85_CD ._.
In_IN all_DT districts_NNS a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinations_NNS done_VBN in_IN October_NNP and_CC November_NNP were_VBD unsuccessful_JJ ._.
As_IN many_JJ of_IN these_DT persons_NNS were_VBD successfully_RB vaccinated_VBN later_RB in_IN the_DT season_NN in_IN some_DT cases_NNS the_DT first_JJ unsuc-_JJ cessful_JJ operations_NNS ,_, done_VBN in_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT season_NN ,_, seem_VBP to_TO have_VB been_VBN excluded_VBN from_IN the_DT tables_NNS ,_, while_IN in_IN other_JJ cases_NNS they_PRP seem_VBP to_TO have_VB been_VBN included_VBN ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN persons_NNS successfully_RB vaccinated_VBN per_IN 1,000_CD of_IN population_NN for_IN the_DT province_NN as_IN a_DT whole_NN was_VBD 28.33_CD ,_, the_DT ratio_NN varying_VBG from_IN 17.17_CD in_IN the_DT Khási_NNP and_CC Jaintia_NNP Hills_NNP to_TO 65.40_CD in_IN the_DT Nága_NNP Hills_NNP ._.
The_DT average_JJ annual_JJ number_NN successfully_RB vaccinated_VBN per_IN 1,000_CD of_IN population_NN during_IN the_DT previous_JJ five_CD years_NNS was_VBD 26.03_CD ._.

6_CD ._.

III_IN it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN 12,464_CD vaccinations_NNS were_VBD done_VBN by_IN dispensary_JJ establishments_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 12,213_CD were_VBD primary_JJ cases_NNS ,_, and_CC 251_CD were_VBD cases_NNS of_IN re-vaccination_NN ._.

Districts_NNS giving_VBG the_DT largest_JJS decrease_NN ._.
11_CD ._.
In_IN Darrang_NNP there_EX were_VBD 36_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
fewer_JJR operations_NNS done_VBN than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, 14,314_CD vaccinations_NNS as_IN against_IN 22,522_CD in_IN 1892-93_JJ ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP states_VBZ that_IN the_DT large_JJ decrease_NN was_VBD due_JJ to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT first_JJ eight_CD supplies_NNS of_IN lymph_NN failed_VBD ,_, the_DT consequence_NN being_VBG that_IN no_DT work_NN was_VBD done_VBN till_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN December_NNP ._.
In_IN Nowgong_NNP there_EX were_VBD also_RB 36_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
fewer_JJR operations_NNS done_VBN than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, due_JJ ,_, the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP says_VBZ ,_, to_TO the_DT bad_JJ lymph_NN received_VBD during_IN the_DT first_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT season_NN and_CC to_TO the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN kála-azár_NN ._.
In_IN Goálpára_NNP there_EX were_VBD 26_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
and_CC in_IN Kámrúp_NNP 22_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
fewer_JJR operations_NNS done_VBN than_IN in_IN 1892-93_JJ ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Goálpára_NNP attributes_VBZ the_DT decrease_NN to_TO the_DT greater_JJR opposition_NN shown_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, especially_RB in_IN places_NNS where_WRB small-pox_NN was_VBD prevalent_JJ ._.
The_DT decrease_NN in_IN Kámrúp_NNP is_VBZ believed_VBN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP to_TO have_VB been_VBN due_JJ partly_RB to_TO the_DT bad_JJ lymph_NN received_VBD and_CC partly_RB to_TO the_DT disturbances_NNS which_WDT occurred_VBD during_IN a_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinating_NN season_NN ._.

There_EX were_VBD ,_, therefore_RB ,_, 4,808_CD fewer_JJR infants_NNS and_CC 27,294_CD fewer_JJR children_NNS between_IN 1_CD and_CC 6_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN successfully_RB vaccinated_VBN than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD 151,391_CD births_NNS registered_VBN in_IN the_DT province_NN during_IN 1893_CD ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT percentage_NN of_IN children_NNS born_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, who_WP were_VBD successfully_RB vaccinated_VBN ,_, was_VBD 24_CD 51_CD as_IN against_IN 26.89_CD ,_, the_DT percentage_NN successfully_RB done_VBN during_IN 1892-93_JJ ._.
Result_NN of_IN inspections_NNS made_VBN by_IN inspecting_VBG officers_NNS ._.
13_CD ._.
Statement_JJ No_NNP ._.
V_NNP gives_VBZ the_DT particulars_NNS of_IN the_DT vaccination_NN work_NN which_WDT was_VBD verified_VBN by_IN inspecting_VBG officers_NNS during_IN the_DT vaccinating_NN season_NN ._.

The_DT principal_JJ reason_NN why_WRB Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP ,_, as_IN a_DT whole_JJ ,_, did_VBD less_JJR inspection_NN work_NN during_IN 1893-94_JJ than_IN during_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, was_VBD that_IN the_DT first_JJ supplies_NNS of_IN lymph_NN failed_VBD ._.

Inoculation_NN ._.
25_CD ._.
From_IN the_DT reports_NNS of_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP the_DT practice_NN of_IN inoculation_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB gradually_RB dying_VBG out_RP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ still_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, practised_VBD to_TO a_DT considerable_JJ extent_NN in_IN the_DT Karimganj_NNP ,_, Habiganj_NNP and_CC Sunám-_NNP ganj_JJ subdivisions_NNS of_IN the_DT Sylhet_NNP district_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN several_JJ places_NNS in_IN Cachar_NNP ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Lakhimpur_NNP reports_NNS that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ still_RB widely_RB practised_VBN among_IN the_DT Assamese_NNP in_IN that_DT district_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Shillong_NNP states_NNS that_IN inoculations_NNS appear_VBP to_TO have_VB been_VBN lately_RB done_VBN in_IN a_DT village_NN not_RB far_RB from_IN Shillong_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT other_JJ districts_NNS of_IN the_DT province_NN ,_, inoculation_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB little_JJ practised_JJ ._.

26_CD ._.
In_IN accordance_NN with_IN orders_NNS conveyed_VBN in_IN Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Depart-_NNP ment_NN ,_, Sanitary_NNP letter_NN No_NNP ._.
49_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 8th_CD February_NNP 1894_CD ,_, the_DT following_VBG diagram_NN has_VBZ been_VBN prepared_VBN with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO illustrating_VBG the_DT death-rates_NNS from_IN small-pox_JJ per_IN 10,000_CD of_IN population_NN registered_VBN in_IN 1893_CD in_IN each_DT district_NN of_IN the_DT province_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT registration_NN of_IN vital_JJ statistics_NNS was_VBD in_IN force_NN previous_JJ to_TO 1891_CD ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT proportion_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN protected_VBN against_IN the_DT disease_NN by_IN successful_JJ vaccination_NN during_IN the_DT seven_CD years_NNS ,_, 1887-88_JJ to_TO 1893-94_JJ :_: Diagram_NNP showing_VBG the_DT death-rates_NNS from_IN SMALL-POX_NNP per_IN 10,000_CD of_IN population_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN 1893_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT proportion_NN of_IN population_NN protected_VBN during_IN the_DT seven_CD years_NNS 1887-88_JJ to_TO 1893-94_CD ._.
[_JJ NLS_NNP note_NN :_: a_DT graphic_JJ appears_VBZ here_RB -_: see_VBP image_NN of_IN page_NN ]_JJ NOTE.9_NNP From_IN the_DT diagram_NN it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ relation_NN between_IN the_DT death-rate_NN from_IN small-pox_JJ and_CC the_DT degree_NN of_IN protection_NN afforded_VBN by_IN successful_JJ vaccination_NN ._.
Were_WRB a_DT larger_JJR proportion_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN protected_VBD ,_, the_DT relation_NN would_MD doubtless_VB be_VB much_RB more_RBR obvious_JJ ._.
Animal_NNP lymph_NN depôt_NN at_IN Shillong_NNP ._.
27_CD ._.
The_DT annual_JJ report_NN of_IN the_DT animal_JJ lymph_NN depôt_NN at_IN Shillong_NNP by_IN Surgeon-Major_NNP Dobson_NNP is_VBZ given_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP A_NNP to_TO this_DT Report_NNP ._.
The_DT supplies_NNS of_IN lymph_JJ sent_NN from_IN the_DT depôt_NN to_TO Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinating_NN season_NN were_VBD quite_RB inert_JJ ._.
The_DT first_JJ five_CD supplies_NNS of_IN lymph_NN received_VBN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Sylhet_NNP were_VBD bad_JJ ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Lakhimpur_NNP states_NNS that_IN the_DT first_JJ seven_CD supplies_NNS he_PRP got_VBD were_VBD inert_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT general_JJ experience_NN of_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP was_VBD that_IN vaccinations_NNS done_VBN by_IN lymph_NN received_VBN from_IN the_DT depôt_NN up_RB to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN November_NNP were_VBD unsuccessful_JJ ._.
They_PRP are_VBP ,_, however_RB ,_, unanimous_JJ in_IN reporting_VBG that_IN the_DT lymph_NN received_VBD after_IN the_DT 7th_CD of_IN December_NNP was_VBD excellent_JJ ._.
On_IN learning_VBG that_IN the_DT depôt_NN lymph_NN had_VBD failed_VBN ,_, Surgeon-Colonel_NNP Warburton_NNP telegraphed_VBD to_TO the_DT Deputy_NNP Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Darjiling_VBG on_IN the_DT 13th_CD November_NNP 1893_CD to_TO send_VB 25_CD tubes_NNS of_IN vaccine_NN lymph_NN to_TO each_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Assam_NNP ,_, and_CC some_DT good_JJ work_NN was_VBD done_VBN by_IN means_NNS of_IN this_DT lymph_NN before_IN supplies_NNS of_IN lymph_NN of_IN good_JJ quality_NN began_VBD to_TO be_VB received_VBN from_IN Shillong_NNP ._.
The_DT failure_NN of_IN the_DT depôt_NN lymph_NN was_VBD principally_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT depôt_NN was_VBD inexperienced_VBN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD trans-_RB ferred_VBN to_TO the_DT depôt_NN only_RB on_IN the_DT 10th_CD of_IN August_NNP 1893_CD ,_, and_CC previous_JJ to_TO his_PRP$ arrival_NN he_PRP had_VBD no_DT opportunity_NN of_IN becoming_VBG acquainted_VBN with_IN the_DT work_NN ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, Surgeon-Major_NNP Dobson_NNP ,_, had_VBD also_RB had_VBN little_JJ previous_JJ experience_NN of_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT depôt_NN ._.
He_PRP had_VBD seen_VBN nothing_NN of_IN lymph_NN depôt_NN work_NN till_NN he_PRP joined_VBD his_PRP$ appointment_NN in_IN Shillong_NNP in_IN April_NNP 1893_CD ._.
Decrease_NN in_IN the_DT amount_NN of_IN work_NN done_VBN due_JJ principally_RB to_TO the_DT failure_NN of_IN the_DT depôt_NN lymph_NN in_IN the_DT begin-_JJ ning_NN of_IN the_DT season_NN ._.
28_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN that_IN the_DT decrease_NN in_IN the_DT amount_NN of_IN work_NN done_VBN during_IN the_DT vaccinating_VBG season_NN of_IN 1893-94_JJ ,_, as_IN compared_VBN with_IN last_JJ year_NN 's_POS results_NNS ,_, was_VBD principally_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT failure_NN of_IN the_DT vaccine_NN lymph_NN sent_VBD from_IN the_DT depôt_NN in_IN October_NNP and_CC November_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT small_JJ percentage_NN of_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS was_VBD also_RB princi-_JJ pally_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT same_JJ cause_NN ._.
When_WRB people_NNS found_VBD that_IN the_DT operations_NNS were_VBD failures_NNS ,_, they_PRP began_VBD to_TO lose_VB faith_NN in_IN vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN several_JJ places_NNS they_PRP afterwards_VBP refused_VBN to_TO allow_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS to_TO be_VB vaccinated_VBN ._.
To_TO prevent_VB a_DT similar_JJ failure_NN in_IN future_JJ ,_, the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT depôt_NN will_MD be_VB changed_VBN as_RB seldom_RB as_IN possible_JJ ._.
With_IN the_DT concur-_JJ rence_NN of_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, vaccine_NN lymph_NN will_MD also_RB not_RB be_VB sent_VBN to_TO the_DT districts_NNS in_IN the_DT plains_NNS till_VBP the_DT 1st_CD of_IN November_NNP ,_, and_CC Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP will_MD be_VB requested_VBN to_TO personally_RB test_VB the_DT first_JJ supplies_NNS of_IN lymph_NN received_VBN ,_, and_CC not_RB to_TO pass_VB it_PRP on_IN to_TO the_DT vaccinators_NNS till_VBP they_PRP satisfy_VBP themselves_PRP that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ of_IN good_JJ quality_NN ._.
Inoculation_NN of_IN goats_NNS ._.
29_CD ._.
At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN his_PRP$ report_NN on_IN the_DT animal_JJ lymph_NN depôt_NN ,_, Dr._NNP Dobson_NNP gives_VBZ the_DT results_NNS of_IN the_DT inoculation_NN of_IN 7_CD goats_NNS with_IN vaccine_NN lymph_NN ._.

5179G._CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 21st_CD July_NNP 1894_CD ._.
Read2_NNP 5_CD ._.
The_DT areas_NNS of_IN compulsory_NN vaccination_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT Act_NNP V_NNP (_( B.C_NNP ._. )_)
of_IN 1880_CD or_CC Act_NNP XIII_NNP of_IN 1880_CD are_VBP in_IN force_NN ,_, are_VBP the_DT chief_JJ towns_NNS of_IN the_DT plains_NNS districts_NNS (_( except_IN Nowgong_NNP and_CC Tezpur_NNP )_) ,_, and_CC the_DT three_CD subdivisional_JJ towns_NNS of_IN Goalpara_NNP ,_, Jorhat_NNP ,_, and_CC Golaghat_NNP ,_, containing_VBG a_DT total_JJ population_NN of_IN 62,127_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN successful_JJ vaccinations_NNS performed_VBN in_IN these_DT towns_NNS was_VBD much_RB less_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN not_RB a_DT single_JJ death_NN from_IN small-pox_JJ occurred_VBN in_IN the_DT compulsory_JJ areas_NNS during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
In_IN paragraph_JJ 25_CD of_IN the_DT report_NN reference_NN is_VBZ made_VBN to_TO the_DT practice_NN of_IN inoculation_NN which_WDT is_VBZ reported_VBN to_TO be_VB still_RB carried_VBN on_IN to_TO some_DT extent_NN in_IN parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Sylhet_NNP ,_, Cachar_NNP ,_, and_CC Lakhimpur_NNP districts_NNS ._.
The_DT question_NN was_VBD fully_RB considered_VBN as_IN regards_NNS Sylhet_NNP in_IN 1892_CD ,_, and_CC ,_, with_IN the_DT approval_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Act_NNP IV_NNP (_( B.C_NNP ._. )_)
of_IN 1865_CD ,_, which_WDT prohibits_VBZ the_DT practice_NN of_IN inoculation_NN ,_, was_VBD extended_VBN to_TO all_PDT the_DT sadr_NN and_CC subdivisional_JJ towns_NNS in_IN the_DT Surma_NNP Valley_NNP ._.
Gauhati_NNP is_VBZ the_DT only_JJ town_NN in_IN the_DT Assam_NNP Valley_NNP to_TO which_WDT the_DT Act_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN extended_VBN ,_, the_DT extension_NN having_VBG been_VBN notified_VBN in_IN 1873_CD when_WRB Assam_NNP formed_VBD a_DT part_NN of_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
The_DT only_JJ hill_NN district_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT practice_NN of_IN inoculation_NN has_VBZ been_VBN brought_VBN to_TO notice_NN is_VBZ that_IN of_IN the_DT Khasi_NNP Hills_NNP ,_, the_DT position_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO which_WDT is_VBZ somewhat_RB peculiar_JJ ,_, in_IN that_DT it_PRP consists_VBZ mainly_RB of_IN petty_JJ semi-independent_JJ States_NNPS where_WRB the_DT prohibition_NN could_MD hardly_RB be_VB enforced_VBN ._.
The_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP has_VBZ considered_VBN whether_IN Bengal_NNP Act_NNP IV_NNP of_IN 1865_CD should_MD not_RB be_VB extended_VBN to_TO other_JJ areas_NNS ,_, but_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, he_PRP has_VBZ come_VBN to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB expedient_JJ or_CC necessary_JJ to_TO take_VB such_JJ action_NN ,_, especially_RB as_IN the_DT practice_NN is_VBZ reported_VBN to_TO be_VB gradually_RB dying_VBG out_RP ._.
The_DT point_NN should_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, be_VB carefully_RB watched_VBN and_CC dealt_VBN with_IN by_IN executive_JJ action_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
An_DT account_NN of_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT Shillong_NNP animal_JJ lymph_NN depôt_NN is_VBZ appended_VBN to_TO the_DT report_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ much_JJ to_TO be_VB regretted_VBN that_IN the_DT lymph_NN supplied_VBD from_IN the_DT depôt_NN in_IN the_DT early_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT season_NN was_VBD found_VBN ineffective_JJ ._.
This_DT is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN due_JJ principally_RB to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT depôt_NN was_VBD inexperienced_VBN ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP also_RB had_VBD had_VBN no_RB previous_JJ experience_NN of_IN lymph_NN depôt_NN work_NN ._.
The_DT then_RB Principal_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP took_VBD all_DT possible_JJ steps_NNS to_TO remedy_VB the_DT failure_NN ._.
Lymph_NNP was_VBD procured_VBN from_IN Bengal_NNP for_IN immediate_JJ use_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ reported_VBN that_IN the_DT lymph_NN received_VBD from_IN the_DT Shillong_NNP depôt_NN after_IN the_DT 7th_JJ December_NNP was_VBD excellent_JJ ._.
The_DT Officiating_NNP Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP approves_VBZ of_IN the_DT measures_NNS proposed_VBN by_IN the_DT Principal_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN preventing_VBG a_DT recurrence_NN of_IN such_JJ failure_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ especially_RB important_JJ that_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP in_IN immediate_JJ charge_NN of_IN the_DT depôt_NN should_MD be_VB an_DT experienced_JJ man_NN ._.
Failures_NNS such_JJ as_IN this_DT not_RB only_RB vitiate_JJ operations_NNS in_IN hand_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB do_VBP much_RB harm_VB by_IN diminishing_VBG the_DT confidence_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN the_DT efficacy_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
By_IN order_NN of_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Assam_NNP ,_, P._NNP G._NNP MELITUS_NNP ,_, Offg_NNP ._.
Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Assam_NNP ._.
A._NNP S._NNP P_NNP O_NNP ._.
(_( Genl_NNP )_) No_VBD 48ANNUAL_CD VACCINATION_NNP REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP PROVINCE_NNP OF_NNP ASSAM_NNP FOR_IN THE_NNP YEAR_NNP 1893-94_CD ._.

2_CD ._.

I_PRP ._.
Including_VBG licensed_VBN and_CC apprentice_JJ vaccinators_NNS ,_, there_EX were_VBD 230_CD Inspectors_NNS and_CC vaccinators_NNS on_IN an_DT average_NN at_IN work_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, as_IN against_IN 217_CD in_IN 1893-94_CD ._.

Four_CD additional_JJ paid_VBN vaccinators_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN in_IN the_DT Sylhet_NNP district_NN ,_, three_CD in_IN Kámrúp_NNP and_CC two_CD in_IN the_DT Nága_NNP Hills_NNP district_NN ;_: there_EX were_VBD 11_CD vaccinators_NNS in_IN the_DT Nowgong_NNP district_NN as_IN against_IN 12_CD in_IN 1893_CD ._.

done_VBN successfully_RB last_JJ year_NN ._.

Districts_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT greatest_JJS increase_NN occurred_VBD ._.
10_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Kámrúp_NNP district_NN there_EX were_VBD 6,603_CD more_JJR vaccinations_NNS done_VBN than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
This_DT large_JJ increase_NN was_VBD partly_RB due_JJ to_TO three_CD additional_JJ vaccinators_NNS having_VBG been_VBN employed_VBN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD principally_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT great_JJ personal_JJ interest_NN which_WDT Surgeon-_NNP Major_NNP Campbell_NNP ,_, the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, took_VBD in_IN vaccination_NN work_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD also_RB a_DT substantial_JJ increase_NN of_IN 5,769_CD operations_NNS in_IN the_DT Sibságar_NNP district_NN ._.
Surgeon-Lieutenant-_JJ Colonel_NNP Borah_NNP ,_, the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, states_VBZ that_IN the_DT vaccination_NN staff_NN of_IN this_DT district_NN worked_VBD very_RB well_RB ,_, especially_RB those_DT employed_VBN in_IN the_DT Sibságar_NNP and_CC Jorhát_NNP subdivisions_NNS ;_: -_: and_CC much_JJ credit_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP for_IN the_DT increased_VBN energy_NN which_WDT he_PRP was_VBD able_JJ to_TO infuse_VB into_IN his_PRP$ subordinates_NNS ._.
Districts_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT greatest_JJS decrease_NN occurred_VBD ._.
11_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Sylhet_NNP district_NN there_EX were_VBD 12,055_CD fewer_JJR operations_NNS done_VBN than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, though_IN there_EX were_VBD four_CD more_JJR vaccinators_NNS at_IN work_NN ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP states_VBZ that_IN the_DT decrease_NN was_VBD due_JJ partly_RB to_TO the_DT bad_JJ quality_NN of_IN the_DT Shillong_NNP lymph_NN ,_, and_CC partly_RB to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN no_DT lymph_NN was_VBD received_VBN from_IN the_DT depôt_NN in_IN November_NNP ._.
From_IN his_PRP$ annual_JJ returns_NNS it_PRP would_MD appear_VB that_IN the_DT lymph_NN supplied_VBD to_TO him_PRP must_MD have_VB been_VBN ,_, on_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, good_JJ ,_, as_IN 94.12_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS done_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ paid_VBN vaccinators_NNS were_VBD successful_JJ ._.
There_EX were_VBD 3,543_CD fewer_JJR operations_NNS done_VBN in_IN the_DT Darrang_NNP district_NN than_IN in_IN 1893-94_JJ ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ worthy_JJ of_IN remark_NN that_IN there_EX were_VBD 8,208_CD fewer_JJR operations_NNS done_VBN in_IN that_DT district_NN in_IN 1893-94_CD than_IN in_IN 1892-93_JJ ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP states_VBZ that_IN the_DT decrease_NN was_VBD due_JJ to_TO the_DT inefficiency_NN of_IN the_DT Shillong_NNP lymph_NN ._.

Animal_NNP lymph_NN depôt_NN at_IN Shillong_NNP ._.

The_DT Annual_NNP Report_NNP of_IN the_DT Animal_NNP Lymph_NNP Depôt_NNP at_IN Shillong_NNP ,_, by_IN Surgeon-_NNP Captain_NNP Carroll_NNP ,_, is_VBZ given_VBN as_IN Appendix_NNP A_NNP to_TO this_DT report_NN ._.
The_DT expenditure_NN on_IN the_DT depôt_NN ,_, Rs_NNP ._.
6,815-2_JJ ,_, was_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
1,308-8-8_JJ in_IN excess_NN of_IN the_DT expenditure_NN incurred_VBN last_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT expendi-_JJ ture_NN was_VBD principally_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT larger_JJR number_NN of_IN calves_NNS inoculated_VBN and_CC to_TO the_DT increased_VBN mortality_NN among_IN the_DT calves_NNS ,_, cattle-disease_NN ,_, similar_JJ to_TO the_DT epidemic_NN of_IN 1890-91_JJ ,_, having_VBG been_VBN very_RB prevalent_JJ ._.
Lymph_NNP was_VBD not_RB sent_VBN from_IN the_DT depôt_NN till_VBZ the_DT end_NN of_IN October_NNP ,_, and_CC Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP agree_VBP in_IN reporting_NN that_IN the_DT first_JJ supplies_NNS were_VBD of_IN excellent_JJ quality_NN ._.
The_DT quality_NN of_IN lymph_NN supplied_VBN remained_VBD very_RB fairly_RB good_JJ till_NN about_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN December_NNP ,_, when_WRB it_PRP began_VBD to_TO deteriorate_VB ,_, and_CC that_IN supplied_VBD during_IN January_NNP and_CC the_DT first_JJ week_NN of_IN February_NNP to_TO most_JJS of_IN the_DT districts_NNS in_IN the_DT plains_NNS proved_VBD almost_RB inert_JJ ._.
The_DT lymph_NN supplied_VBD during_IN the_DT remainder_NN of_IN February_NNP and_CC the_DT whole_NN of_IN March_NNP was_VBD ,_, on_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, good_JJ ._.
On_IN finding_VBG out_RP that_IN lymph_NN of_IN bad_JJ quality_NN was_VBD being_VBG furnished_VBN by_IN the_DT Shillong_NNP depôt_NN ,_, I_PRP telegraphed_VBD to_TO the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT Darjeeling_NNP depôt_NN ,_, requesting_VBG him_PRP to_TO be_VB good_JJ enough_RB to_TO send_VB supplies_NNS of_IN bovine_NN lymph_NN to_TO the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP of_IN this_DT province_NN and_CC to_TO the_DT depôt_NN at_IN Shillong_NNP ._.
The_DT deterioration_NN in_IN the_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN was_VBD doubtless_JJ due_JJ to_TO the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Shillong_NNP ,_, in_IN his_PRP$ endeavour_NN to_TO supply_VB as_RB much_JJ lymph_NN as_IN possible_JJ ,_, sending_VBG out_RP lymph_RB taken_VBN from_IN calves_NNS inoculated_VBN with_IN lymph_NN which_WDT had_VBD passed_VBN directly_RB through_IN four_CD generations_NNS of_IN calves_NNS without_IN having_VBG been_VBN strengthened_VBN by_IN humanised_JJ lymph_NN ._.
On_IN finding_VBG that_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Shillong_NNP was_VBD supplying_VBG lymph_NN of_IN the_DT fifth_JJ generation_NN ,_, I_PRP directed_VBD him_PRP not_RB to_TO send_VB out_RP lymph_NN in_IN future_JJ which_WDT had_VBD passed_VBN more_RBR than_IN three_CD generations_NNS through_IN calves_NNS without_IN having_VBG been_VBN humanised_VBN ._.
The_DT lymph_NN sent_VBD out_RP in_IN January_NNP was_VBD not_RB altogether_RB inert_JJ ,_, as_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Manipur_NNP reports_NNS that_IN it_PRP was_VBD excellent_JJ ._.
The_DT results_NNS obtained_VBN in_IN the_DT Nága_NNP Hills_NNP during_IN that_DT month_NN were_VBD also_RB very_RB good_JJ ,_, and_CC a_DT portion_NN of_IN that_DT supplied_VBD to_TO Lakhimpur_NNP was_VBD efficient_JJ ._.
In_IN consequence_NN of_IN its_PRP$ not_RB having_VBG been_VBN sufficiently_RB strengthened_VBN by_IN the_DT addition_NN of_IN human_JJ lymph_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD not_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, sufficiently_RB strong_JJ to_TO resist_VB the_DT effects_NNS of_IN the_DT climate_NN in_IN the_DT Surma_NNP Valley_NNP and_CC the_DT lower_JJR portions_NNS of_IN the_DT Assam_NNP Valley_NNP ._.
By_IN arranging_VBG to_TO have_VB a_DT sufficient_JJ supply_NN of_IN active_JJ human_JJ lymph_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN not_RB sending_VBG out_RP any_DT lymph_JJ beyond_IN the_DT third_JJ generation_NN ,_, I_PRP believe_VBP that_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP will_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO supply_VB efficient_JJ lymph_NN next_IN season_NN from_IN the_DT Shillong_NNP depô_NN ._.

3510G._CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 25th_CD June_NNP 1895_CD ._.
Read2_NNP 5_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD noticed_VBN in_IN the_DT report_NN for_IN 1893-94_JJ that_IN no_DT deaths_NNS from_IN small-pox_NN had_VBD occurred_VBN in_IN the_DT towns_NNS (_( containing_VBG an_DT aggregate_JJ population_NN of_IN 62,127_CD )_) in_IN which_WDT Compulsory_NNP Vaccination_NNP Acts_NNPS were_VBD in_IN force_NN ._.

In_IN 1894-95_CD ,_, 49_CD deaths_NNS from_IN small-pox_JJ were_VBD registered_VBN in_IN these_DT towns_NNS ,_, the_DT death-rate_NN from_IN this_DT cause_NN having_VBG been_VBN 0.79_CD per_IN 1,000_CD ,_, as_IN compared_VBN with_IN a_DT provincial_JJ death-rate_NN of_IN 0.80_CD per_IN 1,000_CD ._.
The_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, glad_JJ to_TO see_VB that_IN a_DT larger_JJR number_NN of_IN persons_NNS have_VBP been_VBN successfully_RB vaccinated_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.

6_CD ._.

of_IN 1865_CD to_TO these_DT areas_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN frequently_RB considered_VBN by_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD considered_VBN again_RB last_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT decision_NN arrived_VBD at_IN was_VBD that_IN it_PRP was_VBD not_RB necessary_JJ or_CC expedient_JJ to_TO take_VB action_NN in_IN this_DT direction_NN as_IN regards_NNS areas_NNS outside_JJ towns_NNS ,_, especially_RB as_IN the_DT practice_NN is_VBZ reported_VBN to_TO be_VB gradually_RB dying_VBG out_RP ,_, but_CC that_IN the_DT point_NN should_MD be_VB watched_VBN and_CC dealt_VBN with_IN ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, by_IN executive_JJ action_NN ._.
The_DT Chief_NNP Commis-_NNP sioner_NN will_MD be_VB glad_JJ to_TO receive_VB a_DT fuller_JJ report_NN of_IN the_DT cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT small-pox_JJ epidemics_NNS in_IN the_DT Cachar_NNP district_NN are_VBP said_VBD to_TO have_VB originated_VBN directly_RB from_IN inoculation_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
An_DT account_NN of_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT Shillong_NNP Animal_NNP Lymph_NNP depôt_NN is_VBZ appended_VBN to_TO the_DT report_NN ._.
The_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP regrets_VBZ that_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT depôt_NN has_VBZ again_RB been_VBN unsatisfactory_JJ ,_, so_RB far_RB that_IN inert_JJ lymph_NN was_VBD supplied_VBN for_IN some_DT weeks_NNS during_IN the_DT vaccination_NN season_NN ._.
The_DT bad_JJ results_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN work_NN during_IN the_DT last_JJ two_CD years_NNS are_VBP ,_, no_DT doubt_NN ,_, due_JJ primarily_RB to_TO the_DT supply_NN of_IN ineffective_JJ lymph_NN during_IN a_DT portion_NN of_IN each_DT season_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP hopes_VBZ that_IN every_DT effort_NN will_MD be_VB made_VBN to_TO place_VB the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT depôt_NN on_IN a_DT satisfactory_JJ footing_NN ._.
As_IN pointed_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT Resolution_NNP on_IN last_JJ year_NN 's_POS report_NN ,_, such_JJ failures_NNS in_IN lymph_NN not_RB only_RB injure_VB the_DT vaccination_NN work_NN of_IN the_DT season_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB do_VBP much_RB indirect_VB harm_NN by_IN creating_VBG distrust_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT minds_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
The_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP observes_VBZ that_IN the_DT Principal_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP has_VBZ issued_VBN instructions_NNS to_TO remedy_VB the_DT defects_NNS in_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT depôt_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN efficient_JJ lymph_NN will_MD be_VB supplied_VBN from_IN the_DT depôt_NN throughout_IN next_JJ season_NN ;_: but_CC ,_, if_IN the_DT present_JJ results_NNS should_MD continue_VB ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO consider_VB whether_IN the_DT depôt_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB closed_VBN ._.

In_IN the_DT eleventh_JJ paragraph_NN of_IN his_PRP$ Report_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Carroll_NNP gives_VBZ the_DT number_NN of_IN loaded_JJ tubes_NNS supplied_VBD weekly_JJ to_TO Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Sylhet_NNP received_VBD ,_, on_IN an_DT average_NN ,_, 500_CD tubes_NNS and_CC the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Kamrup_NNP 2,000_CD tubes_NNS weekly_RB ;_: and_CC the_DT returns_NNS show_VBP that_IN 75,712_CD persons_NNS were_VBD vaccin-_JJ ated_VBN in_IN the_DT Sylhet_NNP and_CC 29,818_CD in_IN the_DT Kamrup_NNP district_NN ._.
As_IN only_RB 11,500_CD loaded_JJ tubes_NNS were_VBD received_VBN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Sylhet_NNP ,_, the_DT method_NN of_IN arm-to-arm_JJ vaccination_NN must_MD have_VB been_VBN extensively_RB resorted_VBN to_TO in_IN that_DT district_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Carroll_NNP observes_VBZ that_IN vaccinations_NNS done_VBN by_IN lanoline_JJ paste_NN in_IN the_DT Khasi_NNP and_CC Jaintia_NNP Hills_NNP gave_VBD excellent_JJ results_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP states_VBZ that_IN if_IN lanoline_JJ paste_NN was_VBD substituted_VBN for_IN glycerine_NN lymph_NN ,_, the_DT expenditure_NN incurred_VBN would_MD be_VB little_RB more_JJR than_IN one-half_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ expenditure_NN ._.
After_IN making_VBG experiments_NNS in_IN 1892_CD ,_, Dr._NNP Campbell_NNP came_VBD to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_WDT glycerine_VBP lymph_NN was_VBD more_RBR efficient_JJ than_IN lanoline_JJ paste_NN ._.
A_DT supply_NN of_IN lanoline_JJ paste_NN might_MD be_VB sent_VBN to_TO selected_VBN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP next_IN vaccinating_VBG season_NN for_IN favour_NN of_IN report_NN after_IN vaccinations_NNS have_VBP been_VBN done_VBN with_IN it_PRP under_IN their_PRP$ personal_JJ supervision_NN ._.
All_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNS have_VBP reported_VBN that_IN the_DT vaccine_NN lymph_NN supplied_VBN by_IN the_DT Shillong_NNP depôt_NN during_IN the_DT season_NN 1895-_JJ 96_CD was_VBD of_IN excellent_JJ quality_NN ._.
I_PRP inspected_VBD a_DT considerable_JJ number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS in_IN almost_RB all_PDT the_DT places_NNS which_WDT I_PRP visited_VBD during_IN my_PRP$ cold-weather_JJ tour_NN ,_, and_CC found_VBD that_IN the_DT results_NNS were_VBD in_IN almost_RB every_DT case_NN very_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.
Much_JJ credit_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO Surgeon-Captain_NNP Carroll_NNP for_IN the_DT very_RB efficient_JJ manner_NN in_IN which_WDT he_PRP supervised_VBD the_DT depôt_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
He_PRP reports_VBZ very_RB favourably_RB on_IN the_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP Chandra_NNP Nath_NNP Chand_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD in_IN subordinate_JJ charge_NN ,_, performed_VBD his_PRP$ duties_NNS ._.
Vaccination_NN with_IN fresh_JJ calf_NN lymph_NN ._.
29_CD ._.
The_DT results_NNS obtained_VBD during_IN the_DT past_JJ season_NN from_IN lymph_NN preserved_VBN in_IN glycerine_NN at_IN the_DT Shillong_NNP depôt_NN have_VBP been_VBN quite_RB as_RB good_JJ as_IN those-_NN which_WDT are_VBP obtained_VBN when_WRB fresh_JJ lymph_NN of_IN good_JJ quality_NN is_VBZ used_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, not_RB always_RB possible_JJ to_TO prepare_VB a_DT sufficient_JJ supply_NN of_IN efficient_JJ lymph_NN at_IN the_DT depôt_NN ,_, in_IN consequence_NN of_IN epidemic_JJ disease_NN occurring_VBG occasionally_RB among_IN calves_NNS and_CC for_IN other_JJ reasons_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, advisable_JJ to_TO arrange_VB to_TO have_VB an_DT independent_JJ source_NN of_IN supply_NN ._.
The_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP has_VBZ accordingly_RB directed_VBN that_IN arrangements_NNS be_VB made_VBN with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO adopting_VBG next_JJ season_NN the_DT method_NN of_IN vaccinating_VBG with_IN fresh_JJ calf_NN lymph_NN at_IN the_DT headquarters_NN stations_NNS of_IN districts_NNS ._.

The_DT increase_NN of_IN 5,633_CD in_IN the_DT Manipur_NNP State_NNP ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ at_IN times_NNS suffered_VBD severely_RB from_IN visitations_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN ,_, is_VBZ highly_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.

Statement_JJ No_NNP ._.
IV_NNP in_IN the_DT Appendix_NNP to_TO the_DT Report_NNP furnishes_VBZ an_DT interesting_JJ retrospect_NN of_IN the_DT progress_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN Assam_NNP by_IN all_DT agencies_NNS during_IN the_DT past_JJ decade_NN ._.
From_IN this_DT statement_NN it_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN in_IN 1886-87_CD there_EX were_VBD 128,262_CD primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 117,310_CD were_VBD successful_JJ ._.
In_IN 1891-92_CD the_DT figures_NNS were_VBD 197,572_CD and_CC 184,225_CD ,_, respectively_RB ._.
In_IN 1894-95_CD ,_, 195,703_CD primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS were_VBD recorded_VBN ,_, of_IN which_WDT 169,971_CD ,_, or_CC 86.9_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, were_VBD successful_JJ ,_, while_IN during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN review_NN there_EX were_VBD 253,641_CD vaccinations_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 245,839_CD ,_, or_CC 96.9_CD ,_, were_VBD successful_JJ ._.
The_DT high_JJ percentage_NN obtained_VBN in_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN review_NN is_VBZ an_DT indication_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ improvement_NN in_IN the_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN supplied_VBD from_IN the_DT Shillong_NNP Bovine_NNP Lymph_NNP Depôt_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT results_NNS reflect_VBP great_JJ credit_NN on_IN Surgeon-Captain_NNP Carroll_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT depôt_NN throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Details_NNS of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN at_IN the_DT depôt_NN are_VBP given_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP A_NNP to_TO the_DT Report_NNP ._.
The_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP approves_VBZ of_IN the_DT proposal_NN made_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Stephen_NNP in_IN paragraph_NN 28_CD of_IN the_DT Report_NNP ,_, that_IN experiments_NNS should_MD be_VB made_VBN next_JJ cold_NN weather_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO testing_VBG the_DT efficacy_NN of_IN lanoline_JJ paste_NN as_IN a_DT means_NN of_IN preserving_VBG the_DT lymph_NN ,_, this_DT paste_NN being_VBG considerably_RB cheaper_JJR than_IN glycerine_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ at_IN present_NN used_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
In_IN paragraph_JJ 29_CD of_IN the_DT Report_NNP ,_, the_DT Principal_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP has_VBZ pointed_VBN out_RP the_DT neces-_JJ sity_NN of_IN having_VBG an_DT independent_JJ source_NN of_IN lymph_NN supply_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP has_VBZ referred_VBN to_TO the_DT arrange-_JJ ments_NNS which_WDT have_VBP recently_RB been_VBN sanctioned_VBN by_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN vaccinating_VBG with_IN fresh_JJ calf_NN lymph_NN at_IN the_DT headquarters_NN of_IN districts_NNS ._.
No_DT reference_NN is_VBZ made_VBN in_IN the_DT Report_NNP to_TO the_DT method_NN of_IN vaccinating_VBG with_IN human_JJ lymph_NN ;_: the_DT Report_NNP for_IN 1896-97_JJ may_MD usefully_RB notice_VB to_TO what_WP extent_VB arm-to-arm_JJ vaccination_NN is_VBZ still_RB practised_VBN ,_, and_CC compare_VB the_DT results_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ with_IN those_DT obtained_VBN where_WRB animal_JJ vaccine_NN is_VBZ used_VBN ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT inspection_NN work_NN done_VBN by_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP and_CC Native_NNP inspectors_NNS is_VBZ summarised_VBN in_IN Statement_NNP No_NNP ._.
V_NNP of_IN the_DT Appendix_NNP ._.
Of_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN 244,268_CD persons_NNS vaccinated_VBD ,_, 29,886_CD were_VBD inspected_VBN by_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP and_CC 159,915_CD by_IN Native_JJ inspectors_NNS ,_, the_DT corre-_JJ sponding_NN figures_NNS for_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN being_VBG 193,779_CD ,_, 13,541_CD ,_, and_CC 120,796_CD ,_, respectively_RB ._.
These_DT figures_NNS show_VBP a_DT marked_JJ improvement_NN ._.

were_VBD found_VBN by_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP ,_, and_CC 97.95_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
by_IN Native_NNP inspectors_NNS ,_, to_TO be_VB successful_JJ ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT Compulsory_NNP Vaccination_NNP Act_NNP ,_, V_NNP (_( B.C_NNP ._. )_)
of_IN 1880_CD ,_, was_VBD extended_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN to_TO the_DT station_NN of_IN Shillong_NNP ,_, and_CC Act_NNP XIII_NNP of_IN 1880_CD was_VBD at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN brought_VBD into_IN force_NN in_IN the_DT Shillong_NNP Cantonment_NNP ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN small-pox_NN in_IN towns_NNS in_IN which_WDT Compulsory_NNP Vaccination_NNP Acts_NNP are_VBP in_IN force_NN ,_, was_VBD 132_CD ,_, against_IN 49_CD registered_VBD in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, the_DT death-rate_NN in_IN the_DT ten_JJ towns_NNS to_TO which_WDT one_CD or_CC other_JJ of_IN the_DT Acts_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN extended_VBN ,_, having_VBG been_VBN 1.92_CD per_IN 1,000_CD ,_, compared_VBN with_IN a_DT provincial_JJ death-rate_NN of_IN 0.77_CD per_IN 1,000_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT 132_CD deaths_NNS ,_, 115_CD were_VBD registered_VBN in_IN Dibrugarh_NNP alone_RB ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN persons_NNS successfully_RB vaccinated_VBN in_IN towns_NNS rose_VBD from_IN 2,523_CD in_IN 1894-95_JJ to_TO 3,828_CD in_IN 1895-96_JJ ._.
No_DT generalisations_NNS can_MD be_VB made_VBN in_IN comparing_VBG areas_NNS under_IN compulsory_NN vaccination_NN with_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT Province_NNP ;_: the_DT total_JJ population_NN in_IN the_DT areas_NNS where_WRB vacci-_JJ nation_NN is_VBZ compulsory_JJ is_VBZ rather_RB less_JJR than_IN 69,000_CD ,_, and_CC local_JJ conditions_NNS differ_VBP greatly_RB between_IN the_DT towns_NNS in_IN which_WDT this_DT population_NN is_VBZ found_VBN and_CC the_DT rural_JJ areas_NNS where_WRB vaccination_NN is_VBZ not_RB enforced_VBN by_IN law_NN ._.
